position: Project Sales Consultant អ្នកប្រឹក្សាលក់ជាគំរោង
Job Description:
KEY DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

Please note that this is not an exhaustive list of everything that needs to be done.  Sinh Hak Hout Team Member always find new ways to look after the business, their guests, and their team members.   Within this, the key responsibilities for this position are:
o	Uses strong project management skills to lead the delivery of medium to large sized projects within planned timelines, budget, margins and quality specifications.
o	Manage multiple and complex projects or sub-projects, including project financials. 
o	Organize and provide promotional plan and all supporting material to the sales team for proper implementation.
o	Directs the development and integration of project deliverables.
o	Understand the market trends by collecting all market information and suggestion to improve sales
o	Complete credit proposal form with relevant documents and recommendations to ensure that debts are monitors and collected following credit terms
o	Communicate & promote safe teamwork at all times so as to achieve all targets
o	Work with supervisor to ensure understanding the same direction
o	Prepare weekly sales activities and follow up report
o	Prepare monthly and quarterly sales forecast
o	Effectively identify and understand key competitors
o	Other tasks as requested by supervisor


HOW YOU CAN SUCCEED IN THIS ROLE
Within Sinh Hak Hout, the top-performing people who do this job always demonstrate the following attitude: 
•	Working with Others:
o	A genuine interest in the welfare of all company team member is the first and most critical requirement for this role.
o	They maintain the trust of the team member, and are regarded as fair, reasonable, approachable, and honest.  
o	They are passionate about improving staff welfare and guest satisfaction.  They are focused on achieving results and continual improvement.
o	They always try to anticipate and exceed the needs of customers and team member.
o	They use their own initiative and good judgement to solve problems in a calm and efficient way

o	They enjoy working with others to achieve common goals.  They volunteer as required to ensure the success of the team.
o	They act with personal professionalism and integrity at all times
•	Taking Responsibility:
o	Uses strong project management skills to lead the delivery of medium to large sized projects within planned timelines, budget, margins and quality specifications.
o	Manage multiple and complex projects or sub-projects, including project financials. 
o	Organize and provide promotional plan and all supporting material to the sales team for proper implementation.
o	Directs the development and integration of project deliverables.
o	Understand the market trends by collecting all market information and suggestion to improve sales. 
o	Complete credit proposal form with relevant documents and recommendations to ensure that debts are monitors and collected following credit terms
o	Communicate & promote safe teamwork at all times so as to achieve all targets
o	Work with supervisor to ensure understanding the same direction
o	Prepare weekly sales activities and follow up report
o	Prepare monthly and quarterly sales forecast
o	Effectively identify and understand key competitors
o	Other tasks as requested by supervisor
•	Delivering Results:
o	They are committed to meeting and exceeding all performance standards.
o	They constantly look to develop their own professional skills and abilities.
o	They perform job tasks in line with established policies and procedures.
o	They always try to provide a top-quality experience to all our team members and guests.
Company Profile:
Sinh Hak Hout is one of the leading home improvement centers in Cambodia. Starting from just a 50-square-meter retail space in 1999, we have expanded our current operations into a 6400-square-meter show space. Our mission is to provide an excellent customer experience through understanding our customers’ needs and delivering high quality home improvement products across every channel and market that we serve. Our key success is based on believing that When our team members are happy, they deliver great service. When guests experience great service, they are happy. Happy guests make our business a success.

company_name: Sinh Hak Hout Trading Co., Ltd
Job Description:
KEY DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

Please note that this is not an exhaustive list of everything that needs to be done.  Sinh Hak Hout Team Member always find new ways to look after the business, their guests, and their team members.   Within this, the key responsibilities for this position are:

Operational Ownership:
- Assists Departments in identifying training needs for their departments after discussion with the HR & Admin Director and respective Heads of Department.
- Develops & implements Departmental Training Systems.
- Conducts Train the Trainer program & ensures that the process operates effectively.
- Coordinates with the Constance Hospitality Academy on all external training activities.
- Assists Department Trainers in preparing their training sessions, achieving training objectives and reviews on a monthly basis. 
- Maintains standard resort training equipment & training library of resources. 
- Conducts hosts’ Orientation and develops induction plans for new hosts joining the team.
- Conducts and evaluates all on-the-job training. 
- Delivers briefings of all internal programs to division heads.
- Participates in developing and implementing various training programs to meet identified needs & ensure guest service quality, profit enhancement and employee security/safety.
- Contributes towards regional activities related to hosts development as directed by the DHR and the Senior Management from time to time.
- Assists in the implementation at host’s level of all the quality concepts introduced at the corporate level.
- Perform the ‘Manager on Duty’ shift.
- Perform any other duties as assigned by Management.

Administrative: 
- Prepares the Annual Training Plan and monitors its actualization.
- Monitors training effectiveness in relation to guest feedback systems, complaint analysis etc.
- Prepares monthly reports, calendars & briefs Director of Human Resources on its status.
- Assists Heads of Department in producing training plans for each department.
- Compiles the company’s training budget and monitors expenditure on a monthly basis. 
- Establishes & maintains team member, supervisory and management records of training. 
- Reviews training policies, procedures and recommends improvements to management.

Performance Indicators: 
- Cost effectiveness of training – benefit value of training compared to cost
- Impact of training on Customer Satisfaction as measured by improvement in guest satisfaction reviews
- No of in-house audits done
- Quality, timeliness and precision of audit and training reports
- No of training programs and no of training hours conducted by the departmental trainers
- Annual Average no of training hours per hosts
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Business, preferably in Human Resources or Personnel Management.
- One year or more of experience in the same role. 
- Demonstrate competent computer skills.
- Good general education with special industrial training in human resource management and development. 
- Highly interactive and people oriented.
- Very good command over written and spoken English.
- Excellent counseling and interpersonal skills.

	Guide, share, and communicate with team to deliver excellent customer service in term of graphic and interior design.
	Prioritize tasks to make sure overall projects get done on time.
	Coach, train and develop new and existing team members to make sure they know how to do their jobs.
	Clearly understanding SHH mission and vision to be able to communicate to the team. 
	Being a role model for the team to provide excellent customer service for both internal and external customers.
	Work collaboratively with your team to brain storm good ideas and help them increase innovative thinking among the team. 

Daily Task
	Develop SHH store as a source of inspiration, tips and ideas as well as a qualified Tile, Bath and Kitchen specialist. 
	Work with all Store Supervisors to make sure that product range presentation and visual merchandising in the store is optimized and that there is a common thread throughout each store.
	Provide a vibrant and exciting atmosphere that convinces the visitors to come back for more repeat visits.
	Ensure that all SHH stores are well presented, and follow all of the pre-set planogram and store design guideline.
	Walk the store once every two weeks to make sure the stores are well organized according to plan. 
	Together with the Store Supervisor, strive to reach the SHH positioning objectives and to position the store on the local market as the No. 1 choice for Tile Bath & Kitchen provider.
	Communicate with other departments and management to resolve any problems.
	Plan, execute and follow-up on the store promotional campaigns.
	Work with the Line Manager to plan and organize marketing activities.
	Plan and lead major changes in the store including building up new store.
	Brief with client after project completion to ensure that goals are met and the project are done according to the customer’s expectations.
	Work closely with technician team on kitchen and furniture installation to ensure that it follows the design plan. 
	Design banner, leaflet, booklet, name card, ID card, X-stand, promotion banner, and others related with design career.
	Manage project installation schedule using Project Management templates. 

Report 
	Prepare and present weekly and monthly report of your goal and achievement.
	Reviews the status reports of team members and addresses issues as appropriate.
	Prepare Project Installation Schedule and report project progress. 
	Evaluate on project performance for both internal and external installation team to ensure excellent customer service. 
	Other tasks as assigned by Management.
Job Requirement:
	BA in Interior Design or any relate field.
	At least 1 years working experience in Interior or graphic Design position.
	Highly personable, with the ability to quickly build relationships.
	Be able to travel to the site when needed.
	Be able to work under pressure. 
	Communication skills in speaking/Writing English. 
	Knowledge of computer literacy (Microsoft office word, Power point, Excel) 
	Good interpersonal and Communication skills. 
	Strong skill in organization.
	Very patience, flexible, honest and friendly
Company Profile:
Sinh Hak Hout is one of the leading home improvement centers in Cambodia. Starting from just a 50-square-meter retail space in 1999, we have expanded our current operations into a 6400-square-meter show space. Our mission is to provide an excellent customer experience through understanding our customers’ needs and delivering high quality home improvement products across every channel and market that we serve. Our key success is based on believing that When our team members are happy, they deliver great service. When guests experience great service, they are happy. Happy guests make our business a success.

Job Description:
KEY DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES	
Please note that this is not an exhaustive list of everything that needs to be done.  Sinh Hak Hout Team Member always find new ways to look after the business, their guests, and their team members.   Within this, the key responsibilities for this position are:
- Lead and Coordinate with all Operation team to regular fulfill in SHH document implement process 
- Control adequate stock of stationary, Tools and Equipment and PPE (Personal Protective Equipment) for all process of operation section
- Control and Monitor SHH document are properly filed.
- Apply stationary, tools, and equipment request form to relevant department at SHH Headquarter for stock replenishment 
- Support continuous improvement programs for both staff and equipment.
- Maintain all equipment/vehicle’s, ensuring equipment is serviced when needed and are clean and tidy at all times.
- Facilitate and pushing up with supplier speed up vehicles repair to improve dispatching/delivery on time to customer  
- Be understanding of SHH’s mission and vision policy then train or share to operation team be aware also
- Monitor security guard record truck in/out and into log book properly.
- Assist monitor all operation team wears PPE all the time during operation activities in and out warehouse.
- Guide to warehouse and operation team to know safety purpose in SHH
- Control and monitor around warehouse area always clean and tidy all the times to avoid messy warehouse.
- Check all goods and item of tools, equipment is identified correctly.
- Be sure all goods, tools, equipment and SHH properties put in order by correct location.
- Inspect workplace of office, warehouse and workshop clean and tidy before and after work.
- Record all everything in the list keeps as standard document. 
- Be able to communicate and explain SHH Mission, Vision and Policy to the team. so, they are aware of it and thrive to achieve the goals together  
- Work toward team and individual KPIs
- Other task as assigned by Management
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree Business Administration or Other relevant fields is advantage
- 2-year experience as administrative and 5S specialist
- Be able to understanding administration and 5S system
- Fully understand warehouse operational systems
- Knowledge of inventory and supply chain management 
- Proficiency in computer systems, including Microsoft Suite and data entry systems
- Ability to input, retrieve and analyze data
- Good time management and planning, Organizing and analytical skills
- Be able to use initiative and work independently
- Highly effective, dynamic, and result-oriented with strong sense of responsibility 
- Working time: 7:30am-5:30pm( 6 days per week)

Job Description: Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is seeking for one full-time Communication Service Manager to manage and coordinate the activities of the Communication Service and the actions related to the development of partnerships and fundraising of the Institute.Created in December 1953, the Pasteur Institute of Cambodia (IPC) is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.Under the hierarchical authority of the Director, the Communication Service Manager has the responsibility to manage and coordinate the activities of the Communication Service and the actions related to the development of partnerships and fundraising of the Institute.  MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES* Operation and organization of the service-  Follow and adapt the strategic orientations of the Communication Service in compliance with the organizational strategic orientation.-  Manage, plan and coordinate the activities of the Communication Service on a daily routine activities- Periodically assess the activities of the Communication Department and identify areas for improvement- Report about the activities of the Communication Service- Perform other duties assigned by the Direction in accordant with IPC’s activities.* Internal, external and event communications tasks for Institut Pasteur du Cambodge- Develop, propose and ensure the implementation of internal, external and event communication plans in accordance with IPC& communication orientations and priorities- Monitor the implementation of IPC&internal, external and event communication plans- Monitor the organization of activities related to internal, external and event communications- Support the research units in the communication related to their events- Implement and monitor alerts to update the database of scientific publication and inform the direction of published stories mentioning by IPC- Ensure the follow-up of internal and external communication media to be produced and developed- Ensure scientific communication content can be understood by the general public- Ensure the permanent updating of the web site and social media- Contribute to the drafting of written documents (articles, reports, etc.) and production of other media related to internal and external communications.- Coordinate and verify the use of the various media and communication channels: web site, IPC social networks, brochures, posters…- Contribute to the design, review and production of IPC scientific reports- Advise Management on the implementation of the communication strategy
Job Requirement: * RECRUITMENT CONDITIONS- Full time with one year Fixed duration contract (renewable and/or modifiable in a permanent contract)- Available to start: 01 of January 2023   CANDIDATE PROFILE* Training and professional experience- University degree (Bachelor or Master) in communication, journalism, Business communications, Public relations or a related fields is required- Successful experience in the field of communication and development of partnerships in Cambodia- Close relations with the local press- Experience in the health and/or scientific research sector in Cambodia is appreciated* Required skills- Good knowledge of the media, press and the environment related to communication and health sector in Cambodia- Good knowledge of news media, social media- Good knowledge of the use of the WordPress CMS- Computer skills (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Adobe Creative Suite software)- Photography skills, Good editorial quality- Proficiency in written and spoken English- Proficiency in French and Khmer language (oral and written) is appreciated- Good scientific culture is a plus- Sense of leadership and responsibility with good managerial capacity- Strength of proposals and persuasion- Autonomy, rigor, integrity, dynamism, interpersonal skills, initiative and innovation- Team spirit- Excellent interpersonal skillsThe complete application includes a cover letter – with salary expectations, copies of diplomas if any, work certificates, curriculum vitae with a recent photo, Identity Card photocopy - all certified documents to the originals – are to be sent to the Human Resources department of Institut Pasteur du Cambodge #5, Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh or by email to: recrutement@pasteur-kh.org, phone number: 092 777 665.* Deadline: December 20th, 2022
Company Profile: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, IPC is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  092 777 665 recrutement@pasteur-kh.org #5, Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh. 092 777 665

Job Description: Position Summary: We are looking for a versatile and highly-organized personal assistant to perforin personalized administrative duties for senior management. In this role, you will be responsible for scheduling meetings, taking notes, and handling correspondence on behalf of managers. You may also be required to make travel arrangements and assist with other duties when required.•	Organize the meetings in compliance with the company documents and take accurate minutes at the meetings for implementation by the management •	Assist the CEO in the business and transactional segments, assist him in the work arrangements with various departments, and do a good job of uploading and transmitting information.•	To be responsible for the reception of customer visits, and business visits accompanying, in need of occasions to act as a translator.•	To be responsible for taking minutes of meetings, arranging and coordinating business affairs, and reporting on the - progress of business matters, etc.•	Assisting the CEO to participate in the negotiation of transactional projects, collecting business information of related industries, and providing basic and analytical opinions.•	Handle the reasonable filtering and correct communication of information from various channels such as telephone, email, and fax involving the CEO's office.•	Serve as an adviser to the CEO in terms of corporate issue requirements for his accurate decisions and follow up on the implementation progress of CEO recommendations on a timely basis;•	Prepare the management resolutions and proposals on various issues for CEO approval•	Work closely with relevant staff and managers to get reports and information completed for submission to the CEO on a timely basis•	Coordinate managers meeting with the CEO for reporting and clarifications•	Provides high-level corporate support and assistance to the CEO.•	Performs clerical and administrative tasks including drafting letters, memos, invoices, reports, and other documents for the CEO.•	Schedules and attends meetings on behalf of the CEO, taking notes and recording minutes•	Receives incoming communication or memos on behalf of the CEO, reviews contents, determine importance, and summarizes and/or distributes contents to the CEO•	Assisting the CEO in arranging daily work schedules, travel arrangements, etc.•	Performs additional duties as assigned by the CEO
Job Requirement: 1.	Education Background: Bachelor’s Degree 2.	Experience: At least 3 - 5 years of working experience in the Assistant/Secretary or related field.3.	Language skills Good English listening, speaking, and writing skills, able to communicate with foreign businessmen4.	Strong organizational, coordination,5.	Computer literate (Microsoft Office and Internet – Email)Soft Skill: communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills and keen insight, with strong judgment and decision-making ability, planning and execution ability; good teamwork spirit, honesty, reliability, and of good character Good operation and management skills; and excellent supervisory skills.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Sothea Thannarith (Mr.)  070555494 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 070555494

Job Description: Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is seeking for one full-time Communication Service Manager to manage and coordinate the activities of the Communication Service and the actions related to the development of partnerships and fundraising of the Institute.Created in December 1953, the Pasteur Institute of Cambodia (IPC) is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is looking for a qualified nurse to work as a full-time staff at Rabies Prevention Center based in Kampong Cham province. The initial contract is offered for one year (renewable), as staff to the Vaccination Center, IPC.* Main responsibilities:- Ensuring the activities of the Rabies Prevention Center according to the standard operating procedures under the supervision of the medical supervisor of Kampong Cham RabiesPrevention Center.- Performing vaccination to clients- Providing basic wounds care related to animal bite- Assisting medical doctor in different activities of Rabies Prevention Center- Managing the cold chain for storage of vaccines and immunoglobulins- Managing animal specimens (specimen reception, shipment)- Ensuring the necessary opening of the center during certain public holidays for the benefit of patients.- Respecting IPC internal rules
Job Requirement: * Recruitment conditions:- Cambodian nationality- Language skill required: English and/or French in addition to Khmer- Willing to work based in Kampong Cham- Available to start: January 16th, 2023* Candidate Profile:- Experiences in performing vaccination- Willing to work in the prevention of rabies- Newly graduated are also encouraged to apply- High spirit of ethics responsibility- Proficiency in Khmer and English and/or French- Good teamwork- Good in communication, meticulous, autonomousThe complete application includes a cover letter – with salary expectations, copies of diplomas if any, work certificates, curriculum vitae with a recent photo, Identity Card photocopy -all certified documents to the originals – are to be sent to the Human Resources department of Institut Pasteur du Cambodge #5, Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh or by email to: recrutement@pasteur-kh.org phone number: 092 777 665.* Deadline: January 5th, 2023
Company Profile: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, IPC is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  092 777 665 recrutement@pasteur-kh.org #5, Monivong Blvd, Phnom Penh. 092 777 665

Job Description: Position Summary: the main role of the “Khan/District Operation Supervisor-Manager-Field” of the Operation Department is to ensure overall smooth operations - Field of the Cambodian Waste Management Company- 800 SUPER GAEA (CAMBODIA) CO., LTD.•	Oversee 800 SUPER GAEA (CAMBODIA) CO., LTD – KHAN’s operations regularly and ensure that they are being conducted and run smoothly at all times;•	Develop KHAN’s operations policies and procedures, and strategies, and oversee theimplementation by making use of human resources, and materials, including performanceappraisal in the KHAN’s operations department that own self in charge;•	Work collaboratively and effectively with other KHAN operations & departments within 800 SUPER GAEA (CAMBODIA) CO., LTD to make sure all KHAN operations policies and procedures are being followed and effectively implemented;•	Manage and provide leadership support as well as supervision and direction to theKHAN operations and Operation–Field Manager and other operations staff and workers;•	Develop KHAN operations staff and workers’ capacity through internal or external training;•	Coach and mentor KHAN operations staff and workers to ensure that they can deliver effective and quality fieldwork as assigned plan, target, and expectation, etc.•	To develop job descriptions for all KHAN operation’s staff and workers, to ensure carried out their jobs effectively, on time manner and properly.•	Ensure all KHAN operations properties are being utilized properly and effectively;•	Liaise with partner institutions, external agencies, and government and Management.•	Recruit, hire, and train subordinate staff and workers under he/she leadership to ensure the Khan’s operation in charge is qualified to meet expectations and target levels.•	Answer employees’ queries about KHAN operations-related issues and refer them to Operation Manager-Field accordingly and timely manner;•	Other tasks assigned by the Operation Manager-Field and Management

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Able to get one’s message understood by adopting a range of styles, tools and techniques appropriate to the audience

Job Description:
Under the direction of the Factory Manager, the QHSE Supervisor manages, maintains and improves QHSE systems and standards of the organization. In this leadership role, the successful candidate will direct the QHSE improvement activities; support the quality team members and colleagues with QHSE opportunities; develop and/or update QHSE policies and procedures; and develop QHSE programs that will foster a safety-first culture that drives value and efficiency to the organization. Your team will have responsibility for the development and implementation of policies, procedures and systems that support the company’s QHSE initiatives.

** Your main duties:
•	Collaborate with management and staff to ensure continued QHSE integration into core operations across the organization 
•	Identify and oversee continuous improvement initiatives 
•	Interact with Sales, Production and Logistics teams to maintain necessary compliance to QHSE standards 
•	Define and enhance quality procedures in conjunction with all departments 
•	Oversee effectiveness and efficiency of document control processes 
•	Liaison with customer’s auditors and ensuring the execution of internal corrective actions, customer complaint responses and supplier corrective actions 
•	Identify, monitor and execute quality and HSE trainings 
•	Promote understanding and compliance to HACCP, EU Organic Certificate, USDA and maintain the certifications including management of all registered audit activities
•	Assist in implementing and managing the International Food Safety (IFS) certification program
•	Determine and execute quality objectives for the company. Ensures that the Quality Policy is reviewed, communicated and understood 
•	Ensures, in accordance with corporate guidelines, the implementation, updating, review and auditing of the company HSE system 
•	Define and manage company’s KPI for quality, health and safety metrics and use the data to identify risks and opportunities 
•	Assist in all aspects of incident and/or near miss investigations by completing root cause analysis and implementing preventive actions across the organization 
•	Develop and execute health and safety plans in the workplace according to legal guidelines
•	Duties, responsibilities and activities may change at any time according to the organization’s needs.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor’s degree and/or three (3) plus years of related EHS or QA/QC experience 
•	Extensive knowledge of QHSE guidelines and requirements 
•	Experience with implementation and management of the ISO, HACCP, GMP or IFS Quality Management Standards
•	Ability to enhance the Company’s QHSE systems and encourage a culture of excellence and compliance 
•	Excellent written & oral communication and strong relationship building skills required 
•	Detail oriented with solid organizational skills and the ability to prioritize and handle different tasks in a fast-paced work environment 
•	Strong computer skills required including use of MS Office (Word, Excel & Outlook), with a willingness to learn new software programs 
•	Function in a team environment with employees in all levels of the organization 
•	Provide superior customer service and support company goals 
•	Valid driver’s license and ability to travel


Salary: US$700-US$900 upon skills and competence
Location: Battambang, Cambodia
Please send CV and letter to: contact@fedrice.com

Job Description: 1.	ការពារប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពបរិវេនសាលា និងសាធារណៈ ជូនដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស បុគ្គលិក លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ និងអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល- ចោរកម្មគ្រប់រូបភាព- ការសេព និងជូញដូរគ្រឿងញៀន- ការនាំចូលអាវុធជាតិផ្ទុះគ្រប់ប្រភេទ- ជនមិនស្គាល់មុខ ឬជនដែលគួរឲ្យសង្ស័យ- ការបៀតបៀនកេរ្តិ៍ខ្មាស់- សំណង់អគារចាស់ ឬសម្ភារដែលងាយនឹងបាក់ធ្លាក់គ្រប់រូបភាព- កន្លែងដែលមិនមានសុវត្ថិភាពដូចជា កន្លែងរអិល កន្លែងអាចប៉ះក្បាល កន្លែងមានហ្គាស- កន្លែងមានចរន្តអគ្គិសនី និងកន្លែងដែលមានចរាចរណឆ្លងកាត់- សម្ភារ និងឧបករណ៌ដែលអាចបង្កគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់សិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិក- ប្រព័ន្ធសង្រ្គោះ និងពន្លត់អគ្គិភ័យ- ប្រព័ន្ធប្រកាសអាសន្នពេលមានផ្សែង ឬអគ្គិភ័យ- ប្រព័ន្ទប្រកាសអាសន្នពេលជណ្តើរយន្តមានបញ្ហា- ប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពពេលជណ្តើរយន្តមានបញ្ហា- ប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពពេលដាច់អគ្គិសនី- ប៉ារ៉ែតភ្លើង និងកុងតាក់ភ្លើងតាមជាន់- សម្ភារដែលផុតកំណត់កាលប្រើប្រាស់ (ហួសដឺឡេ)- អាហារ និងភេសជ្ជៈនំាចូលពីមជ្ឍដ្ឋានខាងក្រៅ- ទទួលស្វាគមន៍ភ្ញៀវ អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិកគ្រប់ជាន់ថ្នាក់- ថែរក្សា និងការពារទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិក្រុមហ៊ុន- កត់ត្រាឱ្យបានជាក់លាក់នូវហេតុការណ៍ដែលខុសប្រក្រតី- របាយការណ៍ឲ្យបានលម្អិតនូវឧបទ្ទហេតុដែលគួរឲ្យសង្ស័យណាមួយ- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពតាមច្រកចេញ ចូលអគារ- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងគ្រប់គ្រងរាល់ប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពតាមជាន់- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធសុវត្ថិភាពតាមចំណត និងជុំវិញបរិវេណអគារ- ចម្លងផ្លូវសិស្សានុសិស្ស បុគ្គលិក អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល និងសាធារណជន- អន្តរាគមន៍រាល់ពេលមានជម្លោះ ឬការផ្តុំគ្នាដែលគួរឲ្យសង្ស័យ- ប្រត្តិកម្មរហ័យទៅនឹងកណ្តឹងប្រកាសអាសន្ន និងចាប់ផ្តើមធ្វើការស៊ើបអង្កេតភ្លាមៗ- ទាក់ទងទីភ្នាក់ងារមានសមត្ថកិច្ចឱ្យមកដោះស្រាយហេតុការណ៍បន្ទាន់ផ្សេងៗ- ផាកពិន័យ ឬណែនាំសិស្សានុសិស្ស បុគ្គលិក លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ ដែលប្រព្រឹត្តខុសច្បាប់ដែល បានចែង- សម្របសម្រួលរាល់សកម្មភាព និងព្រឹត្តការណ៌របស់សាលា- ត្រួតពិនិត្យអាវុធ សត្វ និងសម្ភារហាមឃាត់ផ្សេងៗ- ជួយសង្រ្គោះបឋម- របាយការណ៌រាល់ដំណើរការ និងបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗទាក់ទងនឹងការងាររបស់ខ្លួនជូនប្រធានសន្តិសុខ។
Job Requirement: - កម្រិតវប្បធម៌ចាប់ពីចាប់ថ្នាក់ទី៦ ឡើងទៅ- ចេះអាន និងចេះសរសេរភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ- មានកំពស់ចាប់ពី 1.65 ម៉ែត្រ ឡើងទៅ- មានកាយសម្បទារឹងមាំ- មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18ឆ្នាំ ដល់ 40ឆ្នាំ- បទពិសោធន៍បម្រើការងារផ្នែកសន្តិសុខយ៉ាងតិច ២ឆ្នាំ - អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា និងម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន - មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ - មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ - មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402 Sangkat Tomnup teuk, Khan ChomkaMorn. phnom penh 012 797 939

job title: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកអនាម័យ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកអនាម័យ
Job Description: - សម្អាត និងថែទាំអនាម័យក្នុងបន្ទប់ទឹក (ស្ងួត និងអនាម័យល្អ)- សម្អាត និងថែទាំអនាម័យក្នុងបន្ទប់រៀន (មុនពេលសិស្សចូលរៀន និងក្រោយពេលសិស្សចេញពីរៀន)- សម្អាតផ្លូវដើរ និងបរិវេណខាងក្រៅបន្ទប់រៀន- សម្អាត និងរក្សាអនាម័យក្នុងបន្ទប់ការិយាល័យ (សម្អាតការ៉ូ កញ្ចក់ និងប្រមូលសម្រាម)- ប្រចាំការតាមគោលដៅដែលបានកំណត់ដើម្បីត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលបញ្ហាអនាម័យ និងបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗ- ថែរក្សា និងសន្សំសំចៃសម្ភារដែលផ្តល់ជូន- ស្នើរសុំបើកសម្ភារបន្ថែម និងរៀបចំទុកដាក់សម្ភារសម្អាតឲ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់- សហការណ៌ជាមួយសន្តិសុខក្នុងការតាមដាន និងមើលការខុសត្រូវសុវត្ថិភាពតាមជាន់- ជំនួសបុគ្គលិកដែលអវត្តមាន ឬធ្វើការបន្ថែមនៅពេលដែលមានបុគ្គលិកអវត្តមាន- បោកគក់កម្រាលសាឡុង វាំងនន និងសម្ភារប្រើប្រាស់ផ្សេងៗ- សម្អាតអគារលម្អិតអំឡុងពេលវិស្សមកាល (Vacation or Term Break)- របាយការណ៌រាល់បញ្ហា និងដំណើរការណ៌ការងារជូនប្រធានសន្តិសុខ និងអនាម័យប្រចាំអគារ- សម្អាតលម្អិត (សម្អាតសើម) តាមគោលដៅរបស់ខ្លួន ១ ក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ- ជូតសម្អាតបន្ទប់ទឹក និងបរិក្ខាក្នុងបន្ទប់ទឹក (សម្អាតលម្អិត២ដង)- ថែទាំអនាម័យក្នុង បន្ទប់ទឹកគ្រប់ពេលមានបញ្ហា- បោសសម្អាតតាមផ្លូវដើរ, កន្លែងទទួលភ្ញៀវ និងកន្លែងដែលប្រឡាក់ ឬមានធូលី- ដាក់ផ្លាកសញ្ញាប្រយ័ត្នរអិលជានិច្ចមុនពេលជូតសម្អាត- ដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យគោលដៅរបស់ខ្លួន និងធ្វើការសម្អាតភ្លាមពេលឃើញមានបញ្ហា- សម្អាតក្រណាត់ជូត និងធុងគាប់ ជាប្រចាំក្រោយពេលសម្អាតរួច- រៀបចំទុកដាក់សម្ភារៈអោយមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ តាមការណែនាំ- លាងសម្អាតធុងសម្រាមនៅតាមគោលដៅរបស់ខ្លួនមុនពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ- បែងចែកសម្រាមតាមប្រភេទ (សម្រាមស្ងួត សម្រាមសើម និងកំប៉ុង)- ប្តូរថង់សម្រាមតាមបន្ទប់ទឹក- គូសសញ្ញា () លើតារាងសម្អាតបន្ទប់ទឹក ក្រោយពេលសម្អាតរួចហើយ- ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលសម្ភារប្រើប្រាស់ ដើម្បីជៀសវាងការខ្វះខាតពេលត្រូវការយកមកប្រើ- ស្នើសុំបើកសម្ភារតាមតម្រូវការជាក់ស្តែង (មានការឯកភាពពីប្រធានផ្នែក)- របាយការណ៌រាល់បញ្ហាជួសជុលទៅប្រធានផ្នែក ឬបុគ្គលិកថែទាំអគារ- ប្តូរទឹក និងលាងសម្អាតធុងគាប់ក្រណាត់ ក្រោយពេលជូតសម្អាតរួចហើយ- ហាលសម្ងួតក្រណាត់ (ឱ្យមានរបៀប) ក្រោយពេលសម្អាត- បិទភ្លើងក្រោយពេលសម្អាត ឬបិទភ្លើងខ្លះមុនពេលសម្អាត (បើកវាំងននបង្អូច)- ត្រួតពិនិត្យកន្លែងរៀងៗខ្លួនមុនពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ- សហការណ៌ជាមួយសន្តិសុខក្នុងការតាមដាន និងមើលការខុសត្រូវសុវត្ថិភាពតាមជាន់- របាយការណ៌រាល់បញ្ហា និងដំណើរការណ៌ការងារជូនប្រធានសន្តិសុខ និងអនាម័យប្រចាំអគារ- ត្រូវមានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ស្វាគមន៍ចំពោះសិស្ស និងអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល - ត្រូវសហការជាមួយសន្ដិសុខ បើឃើញសិស្សប្រព្រឹត្ដខុសពីច្បាប់ និងវិន័យសាលា ត្រូវរបាយការណ៍ ប្រាប់សន្ដិសុខអោយនាំទៅការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស ដើម្បីអោយគ្រូដោះស្រាយ និងណែនាំ ។- ពេលសិស្សចេញលេងត្រូវជួយដើរមើលសកម្មភាពសិស្ស ជាពិសេសនៅតាមបន្ទប់ និងតាមគៀនកោះ - ត្រូវធ្វើការសម្អាតភ្លាម នៅពេលដែលសិស្សសំណូមពរអោយជួយ រឺក៏ឃើញមានទឹកកំពប់ ។- ត្រូវឧស្សាហ៍សង្កេតមើលសិស្សដែលចូលក្នុងបន្ទប់ទឹកយូពេកព្រោះអាចមានបញ្ហាអ្វីមួយ រឺក៏មានសិស្ស ប្រឡែងគ្នាក្នុងបន្ទប់ទឹក - ពេលដល់ម៉ោងចូលរៀន អ្នកអនាម័យត្រូវជួយប្រាប់អោយសិស្សចូលេរៀន លើកលែងតែសិស្សមជ្ឈមណ្ឌលភាសា អេ អាយ អាយ ដែលមានអាយុលើ១៦ឆ្នាំ
Job Requirement: - កម្រិតវប្បធម៌ចាប់ពីចាប់ថ្នាក់ទី៦ ឡើងទៅ- ចេះអាន និងចេះសរសេរភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ- មានកាយសម្បទារឹងមាំ- មានអាយុចាប់ពី 20ឆ្នាំ ដល់ 40ឆ្នាំ- បទពិសោធន៍បម្រើការងារផ្នែកអនាម័យចាប់ពី១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ - អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា និងម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន - មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ - មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ - មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Sourcing from other sources, purchase goods and services and negotiate for best price and good term of payments
• Cooperate with Shops, Standard Company or wholesale for purchase
• Search for new suppliers, and competitors to compete with existing suppliers
• Issue stationery stock and dispatching the stock from MTT to CA if necessary
• Prepare Debit note and Credit note
• Cooperate and build good relationship with relevant departments to identify the specific needs
• Make sure the purchased items matches with the requirement
• Manage Petty Cash and prepare expense report and credit daily in computer for Procurement Supervisor
• Make sure to check with stock keeper before ordering
Job Requirement:
• A bachelor degree in Business Administration, Accounting or any other relevant fields
• At least 1-2 years of work experiences in Procurement and sourcing
• Familiar with Windows Live Mail and MS. Office is highly desired, not mandatory for SUN system
• Understanding logistics concepts
• Familiarity with sourcing, vendor management and warehouse stock report and control
• Solid judgement along with decision making skills;
• Good oral and written both English and Khmer communication skills;
• Be friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure and workload.
• Good negotiation, Communication, and interpersonal skills and problem-solving skills;
• Ability to Prioritize tasks

•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

Company Profile:
Cambodia Airports develops and manages Cambodia’s network of international airports located in Phnom Penh, Siem Reap, and Sihanoukville. Its teams plan and design the development of airport infrastructure, build and maintain the facilities, handle commercial activities and provides services to stakeholders, including The Royal Government of Cambodia, passengers, airlines, and tenants.

Since its inception in 1995, Cambodia Airports has generated immense economic and social benefits for Cambodia by connecting the country to the world. Its leadership in airport development and operations translates in advanced working environment, staff benefit, and Corporate Social Responsibility policies.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description: - Update all information of company, competitors, market, economic development into the database via digital platforms.- Assist R&D team to develop online/offline report/dashboard for management review on the business performance, customers’ information, competitors’ movement, the trends of the market and economics.- Track trends of the market and economic development and competitors' movements.- Collect data including opinion polls, questionnaires, and surveys by using digital tools.- Assist R&D team to develop digital survey plate forms for the market intelligence team to collect the information from the targeted respondents, customers, competitors, business partners, etc.- Assist to R&D team to design, develop, and modify data infrastructure to accelerate the processes of data analysis and reporting.- Collect, record and analyze data on the economy, market, competitors and consumers.- Update customer database and tools to track important customer information, competitors, and business partners.- Work with stakeholders and other business members to identify opportunities for improvement.- Others are assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement: - Fresh graduate or university student.- Sales and Demand Planning: demand forecast, forecast variances, salesman performance and customer performance.- Required Research Skills: social research, market research, sampling methodology, research methodology, questionnaire development, data collection, data analysis and reporting.- Marketing Skills: ATL marketing strategy, BTL marketing strategy, branding development and digital marketing strategy.- Product Development: new product development concept and strategy; and product monitoring and evaluation.- Business Development: business development concept, business plan development, business strategical development.- Required Analytical Tools (online/offline): Power BI, SPSS Statistics, Excel or another analytical program. - Required Survey Tools (online/offline): Google Form, Microsoft Form, or other survey tools.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Keep under review all corporate governance arrangements or developments which might impact the Company to ensure that the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trust are fully briefed on these matters and has regard to them when taking decisions.• Provide specialized advice and guidance to Executive and Non-Executive and Managements on all matters of governance, legality, risk, compliance and business conduct and will manage and reconcile conflicting views in relation to governance issues.• Ensure that the Executive and Non-Executive remains compliant with applicable standards of corporate governance and has the necessary infrastructure to support the governance rationale and governance framework.• Ensure that the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, Board’s and each of Trustees and each of their committees conduct their business in compliance with applicable legal and regulatory frameworks and associated codes of governance and practice, and in a manner which is otherwise appropriate for a public body.• Take corporate responsibility for the formulation and implementation of a framework for the development and management of legal and compliance procedural documents (policies, procedures, protocols and guidance) and to ensure its implementation.• Address any non-compliance with the applicable Codes of Conduct and Accountability.• Monitor the suitability and efficacy of risk management provisions and advise on improvements in support of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees ability to make quarterly (or monthly) and annual statements and returns to the Regulator.• Ensure good information flows within the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees and its committees and between senior management, non-executive directors and managements. • Ensure that the requisite types of governance information are made available, either on the company’s website or in documents circulated to stakeholders;• Ensure the preparation, publication, distribution and presentation of the annual report;• Make available, where appropriate, for public inspection:  o A copy of the current constitution, registrations  o A copy of the latest annual accounts and any report of the auditor on those accounts  o A copy of the latest annual report• Ensure that all returns and self-certifications required by monitor, the Independent Regulator, are submitted in full and on time.• Ensure that the company complies with its constitution and that amendments to it are drafted and incorporated in line with correct procedures;• Attend Executive Management Team meetings to ensure congruence between the business of the Executive Management Team.• Bring to the attention of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees any areas of unmanaged risk, or unique risks that are not otherwise addressed;• Ensure that appropriate arrangements are made for the planning and production of agendas, reports and the subsequent minutes for meetings of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Boar of Trustees. • Contribute to a range of corporate projects relating to business proposals and developments.Legal Service• Provide a comprehensive Legal Service to deal with legal issues including inquests, employment law, litigation, commercial and contract law, and other judicial processes such as the management of claims arising from clinical negligence, complaints, disciplinary procedures and where relevant, untoward incidents reports and external enquiries;• Manage in-house staff and external legal service contract and associated budgets.• Ensure that appropriate procedures and protocols in place for the management of requests for legal advice and instructions on behalf of the Company;• Establish and communicate procedures for Management to take legal advice if required;
Job Requirement: • Master’s Degree in Law, private law, and corporate law.• 5 years management experience.• Strong knowledge in commercial and business laws, civil code, civil procedure,legal statutes and legislations on construction, development, and land laws.• Khmer and English (other languages are an advantage).• Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel…• Hand-on legal practitioner.• Relational and People-centered.• Attention to Detail and Focus.• Trustworthy and Professional.• Committed and Loyal.• Highest level of Character and Integrity.• Strong leadership and management skills.

Job Description: • ទទួលផែនការពីប្រធានផ្នែកអំពីការងារដែលត្រូវជួលជុល• ផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានទៅប្រធានផ្នែកពីគុណភាពគ្រឿង• របាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកវិញនូវចំនុចដែលខូចខាត ដើម្បីពិភាក្សាជួសជុល ឬផ្លាស់ប្តូរ• ដាក់លិខិតស្នើសុំទៅកាន់ផ្នែកឃ្លាំងតាមរយៈប្រធានផ្នែកដើម្បីស្នើសុំសម្ភារៈ• ការជួសជុលត្រូវផ្តោតទៅលើពេលវេលា គុណភាព សោភ័ណភាព និងសុវត្ថិភាពខ្ពស់• សរុបរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកនូវសកម្មភាពពេលបញ្ចប់ការជួសជុល• សម្អាតបរិវេណ និងរថយន្ត ឱ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ពេលបញ្ចប់ការជួសជុល• ត្រូវជួយការងារដល់ជាងដទៃទៀតនៅពេលដែលមិនទាន់ទទួលបានផែនការពីប្រធានផ្នែក• ត្រូវបញ្ចប់ការងារដែលខ្លួនបានធ្វើទោះបីជាដល់ម៉ោងចេញក៏ដោយ• អាចមកធ្វើការថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រសិនជាមានការស្នើសុំពីប្រធានផ្នែក• បាញ់ថ្នាំឡានគ្រប់ប្រភេទ• បាញ់ថ្នាំលើទ្វាររ៉ូត• លាយថ្នាំបាញ់ឱ្យស៊ីពណ៌សាច់ឡាន• បៀកកាវឱ្យស្មើរសាច់ដែក• ខាតកាវបៀកឱ្យស្មើរសាច់ដែក• ឆាបដែកឱ្យស្មើរគ្នា• សម្អាតតួរថយន្តឱ្យស្អាតមុន និងបាញ់ថ្នាំ ឬបាញ់ស្លាកសញ្ញា• បិទក្រដាសកាសែតកន្លែងដែលមិនត្រូវបាញ់ថ្នាំ កុំឱ្យសាចថ្នាំប្រឡាក់• សហការជាមួយលេខាធិការយានដ្ឋាន អំពីតម្រូវការ ការស្ទីកគ័របាញ់ថ្នាំ• បាញ់ថ្នាំយ៉ាន់ និងតាបួររថយន្ត• តោនឱ្យស្មើរសាច់ដែក និងភ្លី• ប្តូរមេឡានពុក• តោន បាត សាច់ជញ្ជាំង ដំបូល និង ទ្វាររថយន្ត• រៀបចំលួសទុកសម្រាប់ផ្សា• កាត់ដំបូលក្បាលឡាន ទុកសម្រាប់ប៉ះកន្លែងខូចខាតរបស់រថយន្ត• រៀបចំផ្លាស់ប្តូរ ថ្មស្អុយ និងអុកស៊ីសែន• រៀបចំកៅស៊ូមេ ប្រឡុង ខ្ចៅ វីស• លាបឡាំងកូតបាតរថយន្ត• បិទស្ទីកគ័រលើឡាន កញ្ចក់ ដែក ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង ការ៉ូ• រៀបចំដែកកេះ ស្កុតក្រដាស កំបិតតូច ធំ• រៀបចំបិទស្ទីកគ័រកាត់រូបភាព អក្សរ និងក្រដាសគំរូត្រូវបិទ• រៀបចំក្រណាត់ទុកជូត
Job Requirement: • ធ្លាក់ ឬជាប់ថ្នាក់ទី12• មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18 ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ• បទពិសោធន៍ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការងារបើកបរ យ៉ាងហោចណាស់ 1 ឆ្នាំ• អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់• មានការព្យាយាម ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ និងការលះបង់ខ្ពស់• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ• មានចំណេះដឹងក្នុងការដឹកនាំក្រុម ចេះនិយាយ ចេះសរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរបានរបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQE ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh. 012 797 939

Job Description:

Job Description:
** This role is responsible to:
• Carry out the In-Field Audit with the Sales Teams with objectives to uplift the Sales Capabilities.
• To Prepare the Field Audit reports by Region and by Province with the objective of closing the Sales Capabilities Gaps.

** Main Duties 
• Carry out Field Audits with Sales Rep focus on company’s 4 Key Enablers (Sales Tools, Winning Team, Perfect Serve, Excellent Outlet Execution) and 5 Winning’s Behaviors (Learn to Improve, Keep It Simple, Life-Saving Rules, Collaborate Through Trust, Speed & Action)
• Track and monitor the performance of the Sales Team against the standards (FIT, PICOS & EOE), identify the gaps, and propose the training program to meet the changes in the markets and competition’s condition.
• Identify the Performance and Sales Capabilities gaps, propose the actions plans and work together with the SAM to close the gaps.
• Provide feedback on the In-Field Coaching program and standard, propose to Improve the measurements for perfect execution in the market.
• Collaborate with Sales Development Supervisor in the assigned Region to work out the quick and instant training to close the performance or sales capability gaps.
• Update the Track, Rank & Publish (TRP) results in the assigned Region on daily basis.
• Track and Monitors the efficiency and effectiveness of FIT (Focus, Implementation & Tracking) and Picture of Success (PICOS) implementation in the Region.
• People Development 
  - Learn to Improve and Self Development Behaviors
  - To conduct the In-Field Audit with Sales Reps and provide the guidance to improve the performance
Job Requirement:
• Preferably a minimum of 4 years in an FMCG environment with at least 2 years Supervisor experience in Sales and Training or Coaching roles, ideally in an FMCG/beer environment
• Having experience in Training Consultant is highly preferred
• Mobile and required to travel between the Provinces on a regular basis
• Integrity, Self-Discipline, Trustworthy and reliable
• Excellent communication skills (interpersonal/presentation/Computer)
• Good at interpersonal skills, coaching, and mentoring skills
• Solid analytical, Planning, and Organizing skills
• Excellent business acumen and a good understanding of the market with entrepreneurial zest
• Self-starter mindset, Self-Confident, good work Ethic, Assertive and Problem-solving skills
• Effective, Positive and Energetic Attitude
• Ability to communicate clearly - Decent presentations skills
• Strong Leadership skills, Team-orientation, and ability to coach the team
• Action-oriented, persistent and result-oriented
Company Profile: Hanuman Beverages is the Cambodian beverage master who commits to creating best-in-class beverages that innovate new tastes for the Cambodian people. With an investment of over 160 million US dollars, creating direct and indirect employments for over 1,000 people whilst supporting thousands more external stakeholders, Hanuman Beverages is committed to contributing to the economic growth of Cambodia. With our passion, we will be sure to make a positive mark on the beverage industry in Cambodia.

Company Profile:
Golden Rice is a Cambodian rice miller and exporter international standard company,specialized in producing high-quality Cambodian Jasmine Rice product since 2009,equipped with state-of-the-art machinery and technology for drying, milling and packaging rice for export market, and winner of the Best Rice in the World award in 2012.
Beside its rice processing and exporting activities, Golden Rice is developing its own construction and engineering projects, such as industrial building construction, machinery & electrical installation, and R&D on agricultural engineering.

Job Description:
- Prepared and updated activity work plan and organize team to do work follow by Schedule and Checklist.

Company Profile: Cambrew Ltd.  the largest and most modern brewery in the country, produces a variety of national and international beer, stout, soft drink and water. Its brewery is situated in the main port city of Cambodia known as Sihanoukville, about 230km west of the capital Phnom Penh.Cambrew (Angkor Beer) portfolio of Beers, Stouts, Soft Drinks and bottled water in Cambodia. Our brands include the Kingdom’s most loved beer – Angkor Premium Beer, Angkor Premium Extra Stout, Klang, Black Panther, Turbog, Carlsberg, Guinness, Pepsi, Angkor Puro and many more. Keen to embark on a career with a portfolio of renowned local and international brands?Join us and be part of a dynamic and exciting team today!

Job Description:
•	Design and build applications for the iOS platform 
•	Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code 
•	Design, build and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable code 
•	Ensure the best performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications

Job Description:
* Strategic Summary
- Khmer Cold Chain’s vision is to be the leading third-party provider of temperature-controlled logistics, delivering international quality services to the Cambodian and regional farmers, agribusiness, food processers, pharmaceutical companies, food retailers and hotels, restaurants and caterers/institutional (HORECA/HRI), at competitive prices.
* Job Summary
The Human Resource and Administration Manager will lead and direct all functions of the Human Resources and Administration department including recruitment, interview processes and hiring of new employee, compensations & benefits, learning & development, labour compliance, Employee services and enforcing company policies and practices. 

-	To implement HR guidelines, policies and procedures to complied with company business, standard required and labour law
-	To identify and evolve HR strategies in consonance with overall business strategy
-	Ensure company is complied with Labor Laws and other international standard requirement
-	Recruitment & Selection: Manages the recruitment process, which will include recruitment, interviewing, and hiring of qualified job applicants; collaborates with all hiring manager and to understand skills and competencies required for openings
-	Compensation and Benefits: Manage and conduct monthly payroll processes, and other remunerations calculations and ensure the completeness and correctness of the payroll process within a timeline and comply with labour law
-	Employee Services: Lead company internal survey process including complaining, reporting & feedback communications
-	Manager employees’ integration, training, KPI and performance appraisal review system
-	To diagnose problems to determine appropriate solution particularly the human resources areas
-	Food Safety & Work Safety: legal, company international standards including HACCP
-	Administration: Manager general administration, transportation and cleaning
-	Other tasks assigned by Management team
Job Requirement:
* Minimum Qualification:
- Minimum 3 Years’ experience Human resources Manager level
- Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources Management, Public Administration  or related fields
* Knowledge, skills, and training :
- Certificate of training related with labour compliance, KPI Setting and Performance Management etc
Company Profile: The vision of Khmer Cold Chain Co., Ltd (KCCC) is to be the leading third-party provider of temperature-controlled logistics, delivering international quality services to the Cambodian and regional farmers, agribusiness, food processers, pharmaceutical companies, food retailers and hotels, restaurants and caterers/institutional (HORECA/HRI), at competitive prices. We seek to offer the most competitive combination of efficiency, quality, and price to our customers at our facilities, through a management team that joins seasoned emerging market entrepreneurs, experienced operational managers, together with innovative blended finance expertise. Please check our website: https://khmercold.com/ for further understanding about our company and business.

Job Description:

Khmer Cold Chain’s vision is to be the leading third-party provider of temperature-controlled logistics, delivering international quality services to the Cambodian and regional farmers, agribusiness, food processers, pharmaceutical companies, food retailers and hotels, restaurants and caterers/institutional (HORECA/HRI), at competitive prices.
* Job Summary:
Procurement Manager will manages a company’s supply of products and services. Their main duty is to ensure the company sources quality and affordable products in a reasonable time. 

* Summary of Essential Job Outcomes:
	Supplier list establishment:
•	Manager supplier list (Select, Negotiate, Evaluate timeframe re-evaluation)
•	Set up document template for each procurement process
•	Set up Approve Authority Matrix
•	Update vendor list annually
•	Participate communication negotiation vendor
•	Developing strong relationships with business stakeholders and strategic supply partners to improve business
	Purchasing:
•	Implement procurement policies, procedure and processes to meet company’s vision 
•	Performing all procurement activities including pre-qualification, negotiating supplier agreements, preparation of contracts and tender management
•	operational Ensure policies, processes any relevant documents are in place and up-to-date
•	Handle all purchasing both local and oversea
•	Follow up delivery against time, quantity, quality process
•	Provide training to team about purchasing process
	Contract Management:

•	Develop standard contract template for different products and services
•	Follow up product/service delivery against contract
•	Other tasks assigned by Management Team
Job Requirement:
* Minimum Qualification:
- Minimum 3 Years’ experience Procurement Manager
- Bachelor’s degree in related fields
* Knowledge, Skills and training:
+ Knowledge, skills, and training 
- Good Understanding with procurement processes in Temperature controlled logistics sector, Good Negotiation skills.
