Job Description:
* Strategic Summary
Khmer Cold Chain’s vision is to be the leading third-party provider of temperature-controlled logistics, delivering international quality services to the Cambodian and regional farmers, agribusiness, food processers, pharmaceutical companies, food retailers and hotels, restaurants and caterers/institutional (HORECA/HRI), at competitive prices.
* Job Summary
The Facility Manager/Warehouse Manager will focus on Produce a situational analysis report with recommendations and implementation plan, Review SOPs, operations, and the level of implementation and adherence to policies and procedures. Offer recommendations, Improve performance within the warehouse and Ensure that warehousing SOPs are being adhered to at all times.
•	To Manage the day-to-day operations of the warehouse
•	Conduct baseline stock inventory of warehouse
•	Ensuring the proper receipt and storage of all received commodities
•	Ensuring the prompt entry of all orders
•	Ensuring the correct picking, packing and distribution of orders
•	Identifying and segregating expired product for? Disposal
•	Identifying current and potential product shortages
•	Identifying and implementing process changes as required to ensure more efficient operations of the warehouse
•	Making changes to the layout and organization of? the warehouse to facilitate efficient operations, as required with the assistance of a short term assistance of a logistician and local staff assigned to this function
•	Promptly informing the management of any issues which have? an adverse impact on warehouse operations
•	Regularly review progress made in the process for product recognition within the supply chain system, with emphasis on identification of a specific item and its owner in the warehouse.? This includes the product ID and other partner coding systems and the need to frequently change product pack and carton sizes
•	And perform other tasks assigned by manager

* Minimum Qualification:
- Manage general warehouse and distribution warehouse,  familiar with LWMS
- Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Facility Management or related fields
- Driving License
* Knowledge, Skills and training
- Knowledge, skills, and training: Any software for manage the warehouse , inventory

Job Description:
* Job brief:

The Web Developer is responsible for developing and/or designing websites and/or web applications.
Execute works of the system planning, system analysis & design, reporting, and other 
administration-
related. Working with team members in creating, maintaining, and updating websites and/or web
applications. Maintain the deadline of the project to all tasks assigned.

* Duties and Responsibilities:

• Write well-designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development 
practices.
• Involve with the team to resolve technical issues.
• Preparing and designing temporary work requested from the project.
• Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
• Dealing with the problem coming up from the application development.
• Prepare and review the technical like technical specification document before sending it out.
• Maintains technical knowledge and understanding of the latest development methodologies and best practices.
• Working with team members in creating, maintaining, and updating websites and/or web
applications.
• Coordinate the team when working across with other departments.
• Be responsible for maintaining, expanding, and scaling our site.
• Can use GIT or other similar tools.
• Developing ideas for new programs, products, or features.
• Working with Adobe XD or Figma or similar tools.
• Create website layout/user interface by using standard HTML/CSS practices.
• Coding with C#, ASP.NET, Javascript.
• Working with SQL queries.
• Integrate data from various back-end services and databases.
Job Requirement:
- Experience min 3 years in computer applications development.
- Knowledge of the System Analysis and Design.
- Able to multitask and thrive in a fast-paced, fluid work environment.
- The ability to adapt to changing priorities.
- Able to analyse and resolve problems at both a strategic and a functional level.
- Demonstrate and uphold all of Power Design’s core values, which include integrity,
accountability, teamwork, innovation, and growth.
- Proficient knowledge of Web Programming like JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3.
- Familiarity with Web User Interface Design (UI), Security Principles, Object-Oriented Design, Web Services (REST/SOAP), Multimedia Content Development, API.
- Can work with back-end programming languages like C#, ASP.NET, JavaScript, etc.
- In-depth understanding of web development.

Job Description:
* Job brief:

The Web Developer is responsible for developing and/or designing websites and/or web applications.
Execute works of the system planning, system analysis & design, reporting, and other 
administration-
related. Working with team members in creating, maintaining, and updating websites and/or web
applications. Maintain the deadline of the project to all tasks assigned.

* Duties and Responsibilities:

• Write well-designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development 
practices.
• Involve with the team to resolve technical issues.
• Preparing and designing temporary work requested from the project.
• Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
• Dealing with the problem coming up from the application development.
• Prepare and review the technical like technical specification document before sending it out.
• Maintains technical knowledge and understanding of the latest development methodologies and best practices.
• Working with team members in creating, maintaining, and updating websites and/or web
applications.
• Coordinate the team when working across with other departments.
• Be responsible for maintaining, expanding, and scaling our site.
• Can use GIT or other similar tools.
• Developing ideas for new programs, products, or features.
• Working with Adobe XD or Figma or similar tools.
• Create website layout/user interface by using standard HTML/CSS practices.
• Coding with C#, ASP.NET, Javascript.
• Working with SQL queries.
• Integrate data from various back-end services and databases.
Job Requirement:
- Experience min 3 years in computer applications development.
- Knowledge of the System Analysis and Design.
- Able to multitask and thrive in a fast-paced, fluid work environment.
- The ability to adapt to changing priorities.
- Able to analyse and resolve problems at both a strategic and a functional level.
- Demonstrate and uphold all of Power Design’s core values, which include integrity,
accountability, teamwork, innovation, and growth.
- Proficient knowledge of Web Programming like JavaScript, JQuery, HTML, HTML5, CSS, CSS3.
- Familiarity with Web User Interface Design (UI), Security Principles, Object-Oriented Design, Web Services (REST/SOAP), Multimedia Content Development, API.
- Can work with back-end programming languages like C#, ASP.NET, JavaScript, etc.
- In-depth understanding of web development.

Job Description:
* Strategic Summary
Khmer Cold Chain’s vision is to be the leading third-party provider of temperature-controlled logistics, delivering international quality services to the Cambodian and regional farmers, agribusiness, food processers, pharmaceutical companies, food retailers and hotels, restaurants and caterers/institutional (HORECA/HRI), at competitive prices.
* Job Summary
•	Able to work in provincial area around Phnom Penh independently.
•	Knowledge about area of Agriculture plantation fruits and vegetable.
•	Capable to work with Ministry of Agriculture provincial level
•	Ability to bargain price (knowledge of local retails prices of fruits and vegetable
•	Manage to gets community group as cooperative fruits and vegetable to supply products to KCC for value added for local distribution and export. 
•	(KCC work like NGO support local fruits and vegetable for sustainability growth of their community)
•	Have own transportation will be advantage (company pay of Gasoline and 
•	Traveling expenses) 
Summary of Essential Job Outcomes:
Convince agriculture plantation, and local community to supply fruits and Vegetable to KCC, KCC will act as their representative distributor.
Job Requirement:
* Minimum Qualification
- Intermediate level of Experience (minimum 2 years of job-related 
experience)
- Bachelor’s Degree in Sales and Marketing, Business Administration or other related fields
- Trained by NGO organization which support agriproducts
* Knowledge, Skills and abilities
+ Knowledge, skills, and abilities [Top 2 or 3 most important only]
- Field sales work for products that relate to Agriculture plantation.
Representative of NGO support food and Agriculture 

+ Training or knowledge required [ Before joining Company]
- On Job Trainings for KCC Products and knowledge to elaborate scope of KCC services with will help support local Fruits and Vegetable to Reach GMP Hygiene fruits and vegetable to value added their goods.
Company Profile: The vision of Khmer Cold Chain Co., Ltd (KCCC) is to be the leading third-party provider of temperature-controlled logistics, delivering international quality services to the Cambodian and regional farmers, agribusiness, food processers, pharmaceutical companies, food retailers and hotels, restaurants and caterers/institutional (HORECA/HRI), at competitive prices. We seek to offer the most competitive combination of efficiency, quality, and price to our customers at our facilities, through a management team that joins seasoned emerging market entrepreneurs, experienced operational managers, together with innovative blended finance expertise. Please check our website: https://khmercold.com/ for further understanding about our company and business.

Job Description:
* Job brief:

The Back-end Developer is responsible for developing and/or designing the applications, managing the interchange of data between the server and the users. The primary focus will be the development of all server-side logic, definition, and maintenance of the central database, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end. Execute works of the system planning, system analysis & design, reporting, and other administration-related. Working with team members in creating, maintaining, and updating the applications. Maintain the deadline of the project to all tasks assigned.


* Duties and Responsibilities:

- Write well-designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development practices.
- Involve with the team to resolve technical issues.
- Preparing and designing temporary work requested from the project.
- Gather and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.
- Dealing with the problem coming up from the application development.
- Prepare and review the technical like technical specification document before sending it out.
- Maintains technical knowledge and understanding of the latest development methodologies and best practices.
- Working with team members in creating, maintaining, and updating the applications.
- Coordinate the team when working across with other departments.
- Be responsible for maintaining, expanding, and scaling our site.
- Can use GIT or other similar tools.
- Developing ideas for new programs, products, or features.
- Compile and analyse data, processes, and codes to troubleshoot problems and identify
areas for improvement.
- Coding with C#.
- Working with SQL queries.
- Design and implementation of data storage solutions.
- Integration of user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server-side logic.
- Building reusable code and libraries for future use.
- Optimization of the application for maximum speed and scalability.
- Implementation of security and data protection.
Job Requirement:
- BA degree in Computer Science or similar relevant field.
- Experience min 3 years in computer applications development.
- Knowledge of the System Analysis and Design.
- Able to multitask and thrive in a fast-paced, fluid work environment.
- The ability to adapt to changing priorities.
- Able to analyse and resolve problems at both a strategic and a functional level.
- Demonstrate and uphold all of Power Design’s core values, which include integrity, accountability, teamwork, innovation, and growth.
- Proficient knowledge of programming languages like C#, ASP.NET, etc.
- Familiarity with front-end languages such as HTML, JavaScript, and CSS.
- Understanding differences between multiple delivery platforms such as mobile vs desktop, and optimizing output to match the specific platform

Job Description: •	Working independently or with consultant architects/engineers, designs and prepares plans and specifications, develops cost estimates, and coordinates implementation of capital improvement projects, oversees the work and administers consultant construction.•	Develops construction bid proposals, reviews bid specifications, recommends contract approval and administers contracts with consultant architects and engineers.•	Participates in final inspection of improvement projects and makes recommendation regarding acceptance of construction work. •	May review building plans and site design for aesthetics, environmental acceptability, compliance with codes and standards and accessibility requirements. •	Prepares reports and correspondence.•	Designs projects and/or review architectural or engineering plans, specifications and contract documents to ensure compliance with government codes, laws and regulations.•	Advises Subcontractors on the interpretation of plans, recommends changes when necessary.•	Prepares and/or review preliminary designs, working drawings, specifications and cost estimates related to the project.•	Provides technical expertise in development or review of policies and procedures in relation to architectural structures and systems and construction/safety codes.•	Provides advice and develop design documents to initiate and modify architectural, interior design and space planning solutions.•	Performs design drafting including preliminary drawings, working drawings and full detail drawings for architectural, structural and mechanical works associated with building construction or improvement projects.•	Reviews Subcontractor's shop drawings to ensure compliance with specifications and contract agreements by checking them for technical accuracy according to accepted guidelines.•	Works with customers and Clients to gather facts, defines design and space planning problems, conceptualize possible solutions and secure approvals of proposals.•	Collaborates and energizes the design team to develop solutions to design problems.•	Originates and develops creative design concepts and design documents in all phases.•	Using computer programs such as AutoCAD Architecture, 3D Studio MAX, Sketch up Pro., V-Ray Plug-in, Adobe Creative Suites at Very good level or higher.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelors or Master’s Degree in Architecture.•	Proven track record with 3 year experience.  •	Good analytical and problem-solving skills.•	Be confident, assertive and independent.•	Possesses intermediate knowledge of applicable codes, and implications on design.•	Demonstrated success in taking projects through design review process.•	Ability to discuss and debate philosophical design issues and solve complex project issues.•	Demonstrated ability to lead the client, project stakeholders and project team in an integrated design process.•	Advanced design, visual and graphic presentation skills required.•	Knowledge of Building Information Modeling (BIM) and Project Delivery methods, preferable.•	Proficiency with physical models.•	Ability to work in team environment and supervise others.•	Ability to communicate both verbally and in writing in English.•	Ability to plan and manage design team efforts to effectively meet deadlines.•	Good interpersonal skill in English and attention to detail.

• Others works have assigned by management team.

Job Description: មន្ទីរពិសោធន៍ MEDLATEC CAMBODIA ជាកម្មសិទ្ធិរបស់ក្រុម MEDLATEC ជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកផ្នែកគណនេយ្យធ្វើការនៅភ្នំពេញ៕(ព័ត៌មានអំពីជីវកម្ម MEDLATEC៖ គេហទំព័រ៖ www.medlatec.vn)🧨ការពិពណ៌នាការងារ៖• បិទប្រាក់ចំណូល (តាមថ្ងៃ សប្តាហ៍ ខែ ឆ្នាំ)• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងគណនេយ្យចំណូល៖ ចំណូល ចំណាយ ប្រាក់ចំណេញ...• សរុបទិន្នន័យប្រាក់ចំណូលបែងចែកប្រាក់ខែ• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍អាជីវកម្មប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ប្រចាំខែ• ប្រៀបធៀបនិងបិទបំណុលផ្ទៃក្នុង• តាមដានឧបករណ៍ ទ្រព្យសកម្មថេរដែលកើតឡើង• ការងារដែលកើតឡើងផ្សេងទៀតតាមតម្រូវការ🧨 តម្រូវការ៖• បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ សវនកម្ម ឬមុខជំនាញផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ• បទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងមុខតំណែងដូចគ្នា > ២ ឆ្នាំ។• រហ័សរហួន ស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ត់ចត់• ស្ទាត់ជំនាញភាសាខ្មែរ និង ភាសាវៀតណាម 💚អត្ថប្រយោជន៍បេក្ខជន៖• ប្រាក់ចំណូលប្រកួតប្រជែង សមស្របតាមសមត្ថភាព ($500 - $1000)• ទទូលបានតាមដំណើរការអាជីវកម្មរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ប្រាក់ រង្វាន់ចូលឆ្នាំបុណ្យទាននិងប្រាក់ ខែ ទី១៣++• ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភអាហារ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភការទទួលខុសត្រូវ ថ្លៃសាំង។ល។• របបធ្វើដំណើរក្នុងស្រុក និងក្រៅស្រុកសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក• របបថែទាំសុខភាពសម្រាប់ខ្លួនអ្នក និងមនុស្សជាទីស្រលាញ់របស់អ្នក។• ការធានារ៉ាប់រងសង្គម និងរបបធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពស្របតាមបទប្បញ្ញត្តិ• បរិស្ថានវិជ្ជាជីវៈ ឱកាសឡើងតំណែងច្រើន។
Job Requirement: មន្ទីរពិសោធន៍ MEDLATEC CAMBODIA ជាកម្មសិទ្ធិរបស់ក្រុម MEDLATEC ជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកផ្នែកគណនេយ្យធ្វើការនៅភ្នំពេញ៕(ព័ត៌មានអំពីជីវកម្ម MEDLATEC៖ គេហទំព័រ៖ www.medlatec.vn)🧨ការពិពណ៌នាការងារ៖• បិទប្រាក់ចំណូល (តាមថ្ងៃ សប្តាហ៍ ខែ ឆ្នាំ)• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងគណនេយ្យចំណូល៖ ចំណូល ចំណាយ ប្រាក់ចំណេញ...• សរុបទិន្នន័យប្រាក់ចំណូលបែងចែកប្រាក់ខែ• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍អាជីវកម្មប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ប្រចាំខែ• ប្រៀបធៀបនិងបិទបំណុលផ្ទៃក្នុង• តាមដានឧបករណ៍ ទ្រព្យសកម្មថេរដែលកើតឡើង• ការងារដែលកើតឡើងផ្សេងទៀតតាមតម្រូវការ🧨 តម្រូវការ៖• បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ សវនកម្ម ឬមុខជំនាញផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ• បទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងមុខតំណែងដូចគ្នា > ២ ឆ្នាំ។• រហ័សរហួន ស្មោះត្រង់ ម៉ត់ចត់• ស្ទាត់ជំនាញភាសាខ្មែរ និង ភាសាវៀតណាម 💚អត្ថប្រយោជន៍បេក្ខជន៖• ប្រាក់ចំណូលប្រកួតប្រជែង សមស្របតាមសមត្ថភាព ($500 - $1000)• ទទូលបានតាមដំណើរការអាជីវកម្មរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ប្រាក់ រង្វាន់ចូលឆ្នាំបុណ្យទាននិងប្រាក់ ខែ ទី១៣++• ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភអាហារ ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភការទទួលខុសត្រូវ ថ្លៃសាំង។ល។• របបធ្វើដំណើរក្នុងស្រុក និងក្រៅស្រុកសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក• របបថែទាំសុខភាពសម្រាប់ខ្លួនអ្នក និងមនុស្សជាទីស្រលាញ់របស់អ្នក។• ការធានារ៉ាប់រងសង្គម និងរបបធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពស្របតាមបទប្បញ្ញត្តិ• បរិស្ថានវិជ្ជាជីវៈ ឱកាសឡើងតំណែងច្រើន។

Job Description: កាតព្វកិច្ចសំខាន់ៗនិងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ/Essential Duties and Responsibilities: •	Responsible to develop Branch goals and active sales management effectively •	Responsible to analyst of competitor’s products and services. Responsible to new develop and plan for loan disbursement, arears, and par •	Responsible to solving problems for City Business•	Responsible to prepare training schedule, training, coaching, and development and work closely with HR department •	Responsible to orientation to new credit staffs •	Responsible to make sure all BM and staffs are well trained and •	provide good service also meet performance expectation and work closely with HR department •	Responsible to conduct and performance appraisal also work closely with HR department •	Responsible and work closely with HR department regarding management and implementation of staff performance in order to improve their capacities •	Managing staff by priority work. •	Regularly monitor the quantity and quality of loan portfolio. •	Monitoring the performance of the plan, laying down staff and activities related to credit. •	Create a working group to seek for improvement and improve work. •	Head of Corporate Responsibility and Operation Areas. •	Representing a city institution in public relations in offices and in operational areas. •	Prepare branches for security, safety, order and good hygiene. •	Check the listing of cash flows into cash books. •	Check daily cash withdrawal. •	Handling of Cash Transfers - In accordance with the principles stated and protected with caution. •	Check balance of cash regularly. •	Prepare a cash plan •	Check out the monthly, long-term, monthly and monthly plan work plans of staff. •	Monitoring of documents and loan application. •	Resolve staff disputes and commend and encourage all concerned eye staff. •	Resolve consumer complaints. •	Issues that are in the area of   operations they manage. •	Monitoring and controlling cash balances on a regular basis. •	Problem solving and late collection of debt efficiently. •	Monitor and monitor Debt Settlement Problems.•	Other tasks will be assigned by Consulting Director/ General Manager •	Make reports and send to Director by Weekly and Monthly•	Responding and involve NPL and Legal Cases •	Works closely with CITY’s Lawyer to issues legal cases
Job Requirement: •	Good appearance •	Good looking •	Good Health •	Honesty

CITY Microfinance Institution PLC has full permission to provide loan service to all Cambodian people who are micro, small and medium entrepreneurs and who want to expand or establish a new business.

job title: មន្ត្រីជំនួយការព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា ចំនួន០១រូប
position: មន្ត្រីជំនួយការព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា ចំនួន០១រូប
Job Description:
ដោយមានតម្រូវការជាចាំបាច់សម្រាប់អនុវត្តការងារជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃឲ្យមានភាពរលូន និងរហ័ស ផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និង ត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងវាយតម្លៃ នៃអ.គ.ហ. មានតម្រូវការជ្រើសរើស បុគ្គលិកជាប់កិច្ចសន្យាសម្រាប់មុខតំណែងជាមន្ត្រីជំនួយការព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា ចំនួន០១រូប សម្រាប់ទទួលបន្ទុកលើបំពេញការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃលើការគាំទ្រព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា និងបច្ចេកទេស ជូនអ.គ.ហ. ក្នុងក្របខណ្ឌនៃកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ។ 
មន្ត្រីព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា មានលក្ខណសម្បត្តិ និងបទពិសោធន៍ដូចខាងក្រោម៖
- មានសញ្ញាបត្រជំនាញ រចនា និងកាត់តវីដេអូ ឬ Graphic design
- មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច០៣ឆ្នាំ លើការងាររៀបចំវីដេអូ កាត់តរូបភាព និងរចនា
- មានចំណេះដឹងជាមូលដ្ឋាន និងបទពិសោធនៃការគ្រប់គ្រងម៉ាស៊ីនមេ កុំព្យូទ័រ និង Hardware ផ្សេងៗ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍លើការប្រើប្រាស់ MS 365 រួមទាំង SharePoint, OneDrive, Power Automate
- មានចំណេះដឹងប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator និង Adobe Premiere ជាដើម
- មានការយល់ដឹងអំពីបច្ចេកវិទ្យា ចំណេះដឹងថ្មីៗ ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ចុងក្រោយបង្អស់ ប្រព័ន្ធទាក់ទងនឹងបច្ចេកវិទ្យា។
Job Requirement:
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងដាក់ឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប សម្រាប់ទាក់ទងសាកសួរពត៌មានដោយមាន (e-mail address, telephone or fax numbers)។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន ប៉ុន្តែផ្តល់ជូនអទិភាពជូនដល់មន្រ្តីរាជការដែលស្ម័គ្រចិត្តព្យួរការងារនៅអង្គភាពដើម ដើម្បីមកបម្រើការងារពេញម៉ោងនៅអគ្គលេខាដ្ឋាន។

បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច (Email)  ឬ នៅអាស័យដ្ឋានខាងក្រោមរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការយ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃពុធ ១៣រោច ខែមិគសិរ ឆ្នាំខាល ទោស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៦ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី២១ ខែធ្នូ ឆ្នាំ២០២២ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកលេខទូរស័ព្ទ ឬតាមអាស័យដ្ឋានដូចខាងក្រោម៖

Job Description: JOB SUMMARYTo prepare technical specification documents, to modify, configuration/development, and technically testapplications and interfaces interacting with the Enterprise Service Bus, Integration Systems, Mobile BankingBackend and APIs according to agreed requirements and specifications.RESPONSIBILITIESTranslate business requirements to technical documents inaccordance with agreed templates;Take ownership and ensure high quality and timely delivery ofmultiple configuration, cusotmization and developments inaccordance with related development plans;Participate in project implementation assignes by Manager;Test software to ensure the code is correct, fixing ('debugging')errors where they occur, and rerunning and rechecking the programuntil it produces the correct results;Recommend improvements to existing Enterprise Service Bus,Mobile Banking Backend and APIs and business processes in orderto meet requirements;Develop customizations Enterprise Service Bus and IntegrationSystems in conformance with development standards;Collaborate closely with the quality assurance team to ensure thework before moving to user acceptance test;Participate in the design and planning of projects in conjunction withthe external partners, other IT, and business users;Responsible to make sure the long-term solutions are providedwithin the SLA on the Enterprise Service Bus and IntegrationSystems;Develop, implement and document systems, the internalmethodology, processes and procedures, for software developmentadhering to ISO & SDLC standards.
Job Requirement: REQUIREMENTSBachelor of Computer Science or MIS;2 years professional experience in IT programmingpreferably in Banking or Microfinance industry;Web based application development and strong knowledgeand skills on Java, C#, ASP.NET, and Web ServicesDevelopment (SOAP, JSON);Knowledge in Windows and Linux operating system andstrong in MS SQL Server or Oracle database development.
Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment and Job Management  092333020 jobs@amret.com.kh Phnom Penh #80, Street 315, Sangkat Boeung Kak2, Khan Toul Kok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 092333020

Job Description: • Prepares selection of Project Consultants• Briefs all Consultants on the client’s requirements and coordinates with the Lead Consultant and his team on the Design and other technical matters.• Conducts Client-Consultant Meetings and ensures flow of documentation/information is controlled.• Prepares the Development Schedule for the Project.• Reviews with Consultant QS on Cost Plans for Project with updates.• Liaises with Consultants on the provision of documents for the various submissions to authorities to ensure timely approval according to schedule.• Coordinates with Consultants to ensure calling and the award of tenders for various packages is done according to schedule and with the proper documentations and monitor the tendering process and tendering evaluation.• Establishes the contract administration procedures.• Prepares the Project Quality Plan and disseminates to Consultants, Contractors and Supervising Staff.• Monitors the Contractors ‘submissions and comments/replies by Construction Manager/Consultants• Ensures various critical milestones are incorporated in the Contractors’ programmes and are executed accordingly and to proper procedures.• Keeps track of the issued and potential variation orders and other controls to ensure that the project completes within budget.• Checks all payment claims by contractors and recommends for approval/payment.• Prepares monthly reports on site progress and other pertinent issues to the Employer.• Monitors various quality/safety control measures on site. Keeps tracks that all regulatory requirements to be adhered to by Contractors are followed.• Conducts regular meetings with Contractors on progress and other matters.• Ensures all procedures of handing over are complied with according to authorities and the Client’s requirements.• Monitors feedback on defects after handing over and the execution of the rectification works to address the complaints/defects.
Job Requirement: • Good attitude and energy level• Good communication• Good in budget planning• Good in management skill• Fluency English and other language is a plus• Proven experience as Project Manager or relevant role• Demonstrable competency in strategic project planning• Working knowledge of data analysis and performance/operation metrics• Working knowledge of IT/Business infrastructure and MS Office• Outstanding organizational and leadership abilities• Excellent interpersonal and public speaking skills• Aptitude in decision-making and problem-solving• BSc in Engineering; MSc/MBA is a plus

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description: 1.	Sales Growth Strategies-	Develop, implement, and manage sales forecasting activities, targets, sectors, markets, and territories.-	Prepare and implement comprehensive business plans to facilitate achievement by planning cost-effective operations and market development activities.2.	Overall Management and Governance-	Define, uphold, and where relevant review the department’s policies, procedures, frameworks, tools, etc to ensure the highly implemented corporate governance and compliant culture.-	Drive and engage for high-performance culture in the belonged department under control.-	Perform the necessary work to assure the portfolio quality, not limited to proper loan application process, assessment, and approval.3.	Budget and Financial Management-	Develop the departmental relevant budget and closely track on the actual expenses to ensure the effective cost optimization management.-	Analyze to address the key discrepancies and/or preventive actions to avoid of fraud activities on the cash flow management.-	Well cooperate with Finance and Treasury departments to ensure the liquidity, cashflow as well as funds effectiveness management. 4.	Partnership Management-	Develop a stakeholder map to identify and prioritize the most relevant partners for roll-out and development of Chamroeun’s Credit+ services.-	Promote Chamroeun across the stakeholder map of Cambodia as a leading social microfinance provider, actively engaged in ensuring adapted and pro-poor microfinance services to poor and vulnerable families.-	Lead in spearheading the development of new partnerships with both public and private sector actors, including working with the operations, risk and marketing departments on developing adapted financial and other services, and in structuring MoUs to effectively frame these partnerships;-	Ensure that these MoUs effectively address the shared risks and concerns raised by both Chamroeun and its partners, and that the end-products and services developed are adapted to the vulnerabilities, cashflows, and real needs of the end-users;-	Hold regular meetings with partners to regularly address concerns of related parties;5.	Reporting and Project/Grant Coordination-	Provide timely, accurate and complete information to all relevant parties for the purposes of financial and operational reporting.-	Prepare regular reports to the line manager, the Executive Committee members and to the Board, on at least a monthly basis, via a reporting framework of KPI and objectives that has been previously agreed.-	Contribute to the development of proposals prepared for the purposes of fundraising.-	Ensure alignment and effective implementation of all programs, as per organizational or other external targets set.-	Represent Chamroeun when relevant with external stakeholders involved in supporting or promoting Chamroeun’s credit plus department.
Job Requirement: -	Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration or equivalent fields related to international development.  -	At least 5 years’ experience in microfinance – mandatory.-	Experience with implementation of inclusive and responsible finance initiatives.Strong understanding of: -	Microfinance operations.-	The social performance management framework.-	The double-bottom line concept and its applicability to microfinance.-	Poverty drivers generally, and as applicable to both rural and urban households, to specific vulnerable groups, etc.-	Cambodia’s microfinance landscape.-	Demonstrated high proficiency in English speaking, reading, and writing.-	Computer literate (MS Word, Excel, Power Point, Email, and Internet).-	Ability to handle multiple tasks and complexities as several different projects will be implemented at the same time.-	Ability to work independently and take initiative.-	Ability to work well under pressure to meet deadlines.-	Demonstrated ability to liaise and negotiate effectively with both public and private institutions. -	Demonstrated commitment to the social business mode. -	Demonstrated integrity, accountability, commitment, and passion towards working to improve the lives of poor households.
Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.

job title: ចាងហ្វាងរងក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ មត្តេយ្យ និងបឋមសិក្សា
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: ចាងហ្វាងរងក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ មត្តេយ្យ និងបឋមសិក្សា
Job Description: ក. គ្រប់គ្រងដំណើរការរៀន និងបង្រៀនប្រចាំថ្ងៃ1.ជួយដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្សជាមួយចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក។ 2.ជួបអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សទាក់ទងនឹងបញ្ហាវិន័យ និងការសិក្សា ជាមួយចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក។3.តាមដានការបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ និងការរៀនរបស់សិស្សានុសិស្ស(Doround)។4.ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារដែលចាងហ្វាងប្រគល់ជូន និងអនុវត្តឱ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា។5.ទទួលបន្ទុកក្នុងការចាត់ចែងគ្រូជំនួសថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ ពេលគ្រូជំនាញសុំច្បាប់។ 6.ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង។7.ជួយផ្សព្វផ្សាយបញ្ជូនព័ត៌មានពីនាយិកាចាងហ្វាង ចាងហ្វាងទៅលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ ឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។8.បំពេញភារកិច្ចផ្សេងៗតាមការចាំបាច់របស់គណៈគ្រប់គ្រងសាលា។9.ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្សជាមួយលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ និងចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក លើករណីផ្សេងៗ។10.ជួយមើលការខុសត្រូវសម្ភារ បរិស្ថាន និងអនាម័យក្នុងអគារសិក្សា។ខ. ការងារបច្ចេកទេសគរុកោសល្យ1.ដឹកនាំលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូរៀបចំ និងអភិវឌ្ឍកម្មវិធីសិក្សាប្រចាំឆ្នាំពីថ្នាក់ក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ ដល់ថ្នាក់ទី៦។2.ការចុះសង្តេតខ្លីលើការបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ (Sport Check)។3.ចុះអធិការកិច្ច និងវាយតម្លៃលើការបង្រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូប្រចាំឆមាសលើកទី១ និងឆមាសលើកទី២ និងធ្វើការផ្តល់មតិយោបល់លើការបង្រៀន (Feed-Back)។4.ចូលរួមប្រជុំក្រុមបច្ចេកទេសជាប្រចាំតាមកម្រិតថ្នាក់។5.ដឹកនាំលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូរៀបចំថ្នាក់និទស្សន៍តាមកម្រិតថ្នាក់។6.សហការ និងជួយដឹកនាំកម្មវិធីចុះកម្មសិក្សារបស់សិស្សានុសិស្សថ្នាក់ក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ ដល់ថ្នាក់ទី៦។7.សហការ និងជួយដឹកនាំកម្មវិធីទស្សនកិច្ចសិក្សារបស់សិស្សានុសិស្សថ្នាក់ក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ ដល់ថ្នាក់ទី៦។8.ធ្វើការស្រាវជ្រាវចំណេះដឹងផ្សេងៗដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍខ្លួន គុណភាពបង្រៀន និងគុណភាពសិក្សារបស់សិស្សស្របតាមគុណភាពអប់រំនៃបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពរបស់ប្រទេស និងពិភពលោក។ 9.រៀបចំកម្មវិធីបំពាក់បំប៉នគរុកោសល្យជូនដល់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូបន្ថែម។គ. ការងារគ្រប់គ្រងរដ្ឋបាល1.ជាមួយចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក ជួយគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារគ្រូបង្រៀន សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិកការិយាល័យសិក្សា។ 2.ជួយពិនិត្យ និងគ្រប់គ្រងឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលដែលទាក់ទងនឹងថ្នាក់ក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ ដល់ថ្នាក់ទី៦។3.គ្រប់គ្រង និងធ្វើឯកសាររដ្ឋបាលដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗទាក់ទងថ្នាក់ក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ ដល់ថ្នាក់ទី៦។ 4.រៀបចំធ្វើពិន្ទុប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាស ឆមាស និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ5.រៀបចំធ្វើពិន្ទុឆមាស និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំទៅការិយាល័យអប់រំខណ្ឌ6.ជួយរៀបចំគម្រោងផែនការការងារប្រចាំឆ្នាំ សម្រាប់សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង។7.ចូលរួមប្រជុំគណៈកម្មការសាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង។8.ចូលរួមប្រជុំតាមការចាំបាច់របស់គណៈគ្រប់គ្រង សាលា ឬស្ថាប័ន និងផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ។9.ជួយរៀបចំកម្មវិធី និងគណៈកម្មការអនុរក្សប្រឡងឆមាស និងឆមាសថ្នាក់ទី៦។ 10.ចូលរួមប្រជុំរៀបចំផែនការការងារសម្រាប់ឆ្នាំសិក្សាបន្តបន្ទាប់។11.ជួយរៀបចំកម្មវិធីប្រឡងឡើងថ្នាក់ ជូនចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក និងនាយិកាចាងហ្វាង។12.ស្វែងរកទីតាំង រៀបចំកម្មវិធី បញ្ជីឈ្មោះសិស្ស និងដឹកនាំសិស្សចូលរួមដំណើរទស្សនកិច្ចសិក្សា។13.ចូលរួមប្រជុំជាមួយផ្នែកលេខាកម្មវិធីសិក្សា ឬផ្នែកផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។14.ចូលរួមប្រជុំជាមួយលោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់។15.ជួយសម្របសម្រួល និងត្រួតពិនិត្យ Time Sheet ប្រចាំខែរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូជំនាញថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ ។16.ត្រួតពិនិត្យ Time Sheet ប្រចាំខែរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូផ្នែកជំនាញមធ្យមសិក្សា។ 17.ត្រួតពិនិត្យ Sick Leave / Annual Leave ប្រចាំខែរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូក្រោមមត្តេយ្យ មត្តេយ្យ និងបឋមសិក្សា។ 18.ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យាការងាររបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ។ 19.ចូលរួមសម្ភាសសិស្សថ្មីដែលចូលរៀននៅសាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង។  ឃ. Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
1. Completes store operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees; follow up on assigned tasks.
2. Maintains store staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees.
3. Maintains store staffs’ job results by coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; planning, monitoring, and appraising job performance.
4. Achieves financial objectives by preparing an annual budget; scheduling expenditures; analyzing variances; initiating corrective actions.
5. Identifies current and future customer requirements by establishing rapport with potential and actual customers and other persons in a position to understand service requirements.
6. Ensures availability of merchandise and services by approving contracts; maintaining inventories.
7. Formulates pricing policies by reviewing merchandising activities; determining additional needed sales promotion; authorizing clearance sales; studying trends.
8. Markets merchandise by studying advertising, sales promotion, and display plans; analyzing operating and financial statements for profitability ratios.
9. Secures the safety of merchandise by implementing security systems and measures.
10.Protects employees and customers by providing a safe and clean store environment.
11. Maintains the stability and reputation of the store by complying with legal requirements.
12.Work with marketing agency to determine marketing strategy and executions that deliver sale
13.Maintains professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing professional publications; establishing personal networks; participating in professional societies.
14.Maintains operations by initiating, coordinating, and enforcing program, operational, and personnel policies and procedures.
15.Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
16.Working closely with accountants, supply chain manager to provide track record of the sales inventory
Job Requirement:
- Background in fashion retail store environment; luxury brands, authentic brands,
supplement brands and skin care product ranges are the most wanted
- Proven spoken and written good command of English
- Person who is very customer-centric , great interpersonal skill, team play spirit,
fashion market knowledge, social-able character.
- Experience in fast-pace environment, people skill, result driven, management proficiency, good motivational skill.
- Has extensive knowledge about customer care, and experience in social media marketing
- Has the ability to lead and drive a group of diversified staff.
- Be able to handle pressure and very solution oriented.

Interested candidates are invited to submit a detailed resume with a recent photograph and a cover letter to the HR department via hr@modestore.asia or via Telegram; 095 772 267.

DEADLINE OF APPLICATION: 31 December 2022
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.

job title: Fashion and Lifestyle Videographer and Editor
position: Fashion and Lifestyle Videographer and Editor
Job Description:
- ​Taking the raw footage under the supervision and direction of the content manager and​editing them into video content.
- Working with the content manager and CMO to develop an outline, scenario and /or​script for shooting.
- Assemble the footage and photos into video content.
- Review the existing footage and create the most appropriate video for digital content.
- Conducting best output generation by cutting and connecting various footage, adding sound effects and graphics and fine-tuning the completed video content.
- Working with the content team to follow a script, screenplay or outline provided.
- Inputting sound to enhance footage, which may include selecting music and voice-overs
- Inputting graphics to enhance footage
- Digitally splicing film and video and synchronising them into one rough cut file.
- Improving and correcting lighting, colouring and faulty footage
- Working closely with the Content Manager to present a final cut
Job Requirement:
- Certificate of training in multimedia or equivalent.
- Gain good knowledge of camera and digital gears
- At least 3 years of experience in the video and editing field.
- Proficiency in handling camera and editing software programs
- Good understanding of computers and digital equipment and knowledge of new and cutting-edge technology
- Ability to take and follow directions while also having a creative eye for improvements
- A creative talent individual with a background in multimedia, art, communication, photography, videography and/or technology.
- Advanced understanding of editing software.
- Excellent knowledge of Live Streaming and Premier tools and software.
- Extensive knowledge of camera and lighting.
- Willing to learn and catch on to the fashion trend.
- Caring about props, tools and equipment.
- Working well in a fast-paced environment and working well in a team environment.
- Good knowledge of social media and understanding of the needs of photography for content creation and e-commerce platforms.
- Flexible working hours and environment.

Interested candidates are invited to submit a detailed resume with a recent photograph and a cover letter to the HR department via hr@modestore.asia or via Telegram; 095 772 267.

DEADLINE OF APPLICATION: 31 December 2022
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.

Job Description:

Company Profile:
"vKirirom Pine Resort" is a new concept for enriching people's lives in the future. It is located amongst the pine trees on the top of Kirirom National Park. Our main goal is to provide an atmosphere and location that people can enjoy their lives in the great nature.

We also hope that Kirirom will be the best place for those who want to lead a slow life on the mountain as well as being innovative together. 

With the natural environment of Kirirom Mountain, we offer you the opportunity to experience the life in one with nature that is peaceful and tranquil.

If you are tired of living in city which is full of pollution, then vKirirom Vacation Home will be the best choice for your next home. It may sound far apart from business when saying living on the mountain, but our main purpose is together with nature.

Kirirom Institute of Technology is an Institute-Industry based approach collaborating with entrepreneurs to act upon the fast changing world of technology. We provide high standard of education and higher chances to specialize in leadership development.

Manage merchandising planogram to dominate facing and volume share contribution 3. Generate order based on weekly stock rules to ensure sufficient stocks for sales and achieve sales target (KPI target)4. Implement trade promotion based on annual business and budget plan; post mortem report after ending trade promotion is required to evaluate purchasing performance of customers. 5. Expand more modern trade outlets and opportunity for all product SKUs to increase more customers6. Build good relationship with merchandiser and/or category manager of outlets7. Implement Picture of Perfect Outlet method to communicate brand visibility to consumers. 8. Observe activities of competitors within its coverage9. Other tasks assigned by line manager

1. Education: 
o Bachelor Degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or relevant fields
2. Experiences: 
o Possess 1-year experience in sales, preferably with FMCG or Trading 
o Experience in Modern Trade channel  
3. Skills and knowledge: 
o Demonstrate good communication 
o Demonstrate good command of English and Khmer 
o Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Power Point)
o Ability to learn and use new technology

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Sothea Thannarith (Mr.)  070555494 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 070555494

position: គ្រូវិន័យ និងកីឡា
Job Description: វិន័យ ត្រូវត្រូតពិនិត្យមើលវិន័យសិស្សទៅលើចំណុច• ការតុបតែងខ្លួន ៖   ការផាត់មុខ លាបក្រែមម្សៅ ក្រចកដៃមានពណ៌ ..............................។ល។• ឯកសណ្ឋាន ៖  សិស្សស្រី៖ សំពត់ក្រោមជង្គុង អាវមានបូរពណ៌ក្រហម  (មានស្លាកសញ្ញាLogo សាលា)  សិស្សប្រុស៖ ខោខ្លីត្រឹមជង្គុង (សិស្សកម្រិតបឋមសិក្សា) ខោជើងវែង (សិស្សមធ្យមសិក្សា)  អាវក្នុងខោ និងក្រវាត់កពណ៌ក្រហម (មានស្លាកសញ្ញាLogo សាលា)• សក់ ៖  សិស្សស្រី ៖ ពណ៌ខ្មៅ  សិស្សប្រុស ៖ សក់ខ្លី ពណ៌ខ្មៅ  ករណីសិស្សសក់ពណ៌ ត្រូវបញ្ចូនសិស្សនោះទៅការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស  ករណីសិស្សសក់វែង ត្រូវបញ្ចូនសិស្សនោះទៅការិយល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស• ស្បែកជើង ៖   សិស្សស្រី និងសិស្សប្រុស ៖ ពាក់ស្បែកជើង ប៉ាតាក្លុប ឬក្រវាត់កែង ហាមពាក់ស្បែកជើងផ្ទាត់• ការយឺត ៖   ពេលព្រឹក ៖ ចាប់ពីម៉ោង ៧៖១០ នាទីទៅ យឺតត្រូវនាំ ឬប្រាប់សិស្សទៅការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស  ពេលរសៀល ៖ ចាប់ពីម៉ោង ១៖១០ នាទីទៅ យឺតត្រូវនាំ ឬប្រាប់សិស្សទៅការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស• ហាមប្រើ ៖ ទូរសព្ទដៃ ចុចលេងហ្គេម ក្នុងម៉ោងសិក្សា ក្នុងបរិវេណសាលា• ដើរមើលតាមជាន់នូវសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ទូទៅសកម្មភាពសិស្ស និងគ្រូតាមបន្ទប់រៀននីមួយៗ • ត្រូវចេះអង្កេតមើលការប្រើប្រាស់ពាក្យសំដីរបស់សិស្សានុសិស្ស នូវពាក្យអសុរោះ• អង្គេតមើលការចូលមកដល់ថ្នាក់រៀនរបស់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូ ក៏ដូចជាសិស្សានុសិស្ស• ពេលសិស្សចេញលេង៖ មើលសិស្សពេលចេញលេង នៅកន្លែងអាហារដ្ឋាន និងPlayground ក៏់ដូចជាការលេងរបស់    ប្អូនៗសិស្សានុសិស្ស ថាតើមានបង្កគ្រោះថ្នាក់ ឬអត់• ពេលសិស្សចូលរៀន៖ ដើរ Do round តាមជាន់ ១. មានគ្រូ ចូលតាមថ្នាក់គ្រប់ ២. គ្រូចូលតាមថ្នាក់បង្រៀនសិស្សយឺត........៣. ត្រួតពិនិត្យតាមបន្ទប់ទឹក ពេលសិស្សចូល (សិស្សខ្លះលួចប្រើប្រាស់ទូរសព្ទ និងមើលឯកសារពេលប្រឡង សិស្សប្រឡែងគ្នា...............)• កណ្តឹងរោទិ៍មុន៥នាទី និងចូលរៀន៖ ត្រូវតឿនសិស្សចូលថ្នាក់រៀន • សិស្សមានបញ្ហា៖ ត្រូវចូលរួមពន្យល់ណែនាំ និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា តាមច្បាប់សាលា• ជួបអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល និងដោះស្រាយ រាល់ពេលមានបញ្ហា ជាមួយក្រុមប្រឹក្សាវិន័យ និងចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុក។គ្រូកីឡានៅថ្ងៃសៅរ៍• គោរពពេលវេលាឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់ • ស្លៀកពាក់សមរម្យតាមជំនាញនីមួយៗ• ត្រូវមានវត្តមានមុនចាប់ផ្តើមប្រជុំជួរសិស្ស៥នាទី• តម្រង់ជួរសិស្សឱ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ មុនហៅវត្តមានសិស្ស• ហៅវត្តមានសិស្ស ដោយគូសឱ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ (អវត្តមានត្រូវដាក់ A ករណីសុំច្បាប់ត្រូវដាក់P ករណីមកយឺតមានភ្ជាប់ជាមួយលិខិតអនុញ្ញាត ត្រូវដាក់L  មិនត្រូវចំហរចោលទេ)។• ត្រួតពិនិត្យឯកសណ្ឋានកីឡា (អាវយឺតពណ៌ស និងខោខ្លីពណ៌ក្រហម មានស្លាកសញ្ញាAIS) ស្បែកជើងកីឡាដែលមានស្រោមជើង និងពាក់ID• ត្រូតពិនិត្យសក់ពណ៌ (សិស្សស្រីត្រូវចងសក់) ក្រចកដៃ និងផាត់មុខ • មិនអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យសិស្សហ្វឹកហាត់ទេ ករណីសិស្សមកយឺតប្រើមធ្យោបាយផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនទៅទីតាំងហ្វឹកហាត់• មិនអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យសិស្សចេញទៅក្រៅបរិវេណហ្វឹកហាត់• គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងរបស់សាលា• អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីសិក្សាឱ្យស្របតាមកម្មវិធីសិក្សារបស់ក្រសួងអប់រំ យុវជន និងកីឡា។                 • អនុវត្តកិច្ចតែងបង្ហាត់ ឬការត្រៀមសង្ខេបមេរៀនក្នុងការបង្ហាត់សិស្សជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។• ផលិត និងប្រើប្រាស់នូវសម្ភារឧបទេស (ការបង្កើតដោយផ្ទាល់ដៃ ឬការទិញស្រាប់) ដែលទាក់ទងនឹងខ្លឹមសារមេរៀនឱ្យមានលក្ខណៈសម្បូរបែប។• បង្កើតសំណួរ ឬវិញ្ញាសា និងអត្រាកំណែ ប្រឡងប្រចាំខែ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី១ ពាក់កណ្តាលឆមាសលើកទី២  ឆមាសលើកទី១ និងឆមាសលើកទី២ ប្រកបដោយគុណភាព បច្ចេកទេស។• វាយតម្លៃប្រចាំខែ លើការសិក្សារបស់សិស្សតាមរយៈសកម្មភាពសិក្សាក្នុងថ្នាក់ ( វិន័យ និងសីលធម៌ ២០%  សកម្មភាពប្រតិបត្តិពេលហ្វឹកហាត់នៅលើទីលាន ២០%  អវត្តមាន១០%)  និងពេលប្រឡង៥០%។• សិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវបន្ថែម លើវិធីសាស្រ្តល្អៗក្នុងការបង្ហាត់ និងបង្កើតវប្បធម៌ចែករំលែកគ្នារាល់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ។• ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាបន• គោរពមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈគ្រូបង្រៀនឱ្យបាន១០០%ការអប់រំសីលធម៌• ចូលរួមសកម្មភាពផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលាសម្រាប់ផ្តល់នូវការអប់រំសីលធម៌ដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស។• នៅឱ្យកៀកជាមួយនឹងសិស្ស ដើម្បីក្តាប់យកព័ត៌មាន ក៏ដូចជា ស្ថានភាពជាក់ស្តែងរបស់សិស្ស ព្រមទាំងបញ្ជូននូវព័ត៌មានទាំងឡាយណា ដែលជាបញ្ហាទៅកាន់ផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីរកដំណោះស្រាយ                និងជំនួយឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។• ធ្វើខ្លួនជាគំរូល្អ ទៅកាន់សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិករួមការងារ។• ផ្តល់ និងផ្សព្វផ្សាយនូវតម្លៃ និងសីលធម៌ដល់សិស្ស ដើម្បីឱ្យពួកគេអាច បញ្ចូលខ្លួន និងអភិវឌ្ឍខ្លួននៅក្នុងសង្គម។

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: Senior Officer, Core Banking System Support
position: Senior Officer, Core Banking System Support
Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment and Job Management  092333020 jobs@amret.com.kh #80, Street 315, Sangkat Boeung Kak2, Khan Toul Kok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 092333020

Job Description:
Acquire and service customers for Car sales

- Show about the product of car
- Perform general sales administration support and orders coordination
- Provide support on preparing sales documents.
- Organize and participate in marketing campaigns or events
- Handle client enquiries and customer support
- Coordinate with internal departments & external partners
- Perform ad-hoc tasks as assigned by management
- Resolves customer complaints, maintain and develop relationships with customers
- Other tasks assigned by Manager
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Sales & Marketing or related fields.
- 2 years of related working experience, Fresh graduates also encouraged to apply
- Computer literacy (Ms. Office: word, Excel, internet and Email)
- Can work outdoor, drive and able to travel to provinces
- Good command in English or Chinese is a plus
- Can driver and know about car
- Willing to learn and can work under pressure
- Honest, punctual, responsible, and teamwork

Benefit
- Salary negotiation according to work experience 
- Working: 8:30am – 5:30pm
- Commission	
- Publish Holiday
- Annual Leaves 18 day
- Insurance NSSF

Job Description:
- សិក្សា និងទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការត្រួតពិនិត្យរាល់បច្ចេកទេសប្លង់ទឹក-ភ្លើង ហើយរៀបចំផែនការដែលតាម គម្រោង នីមួយៗ និងអនុម័ត បន្ទាប់ពីបានរបាយការណ៍ពីការិយាល័យនីមួយៗ។
- សិក្សាគម្រោងប្លង់អគ្គីសនីបណ្តាញមេសម្រាប់គម្រោងទាំងមូល។
- សិក្សា និងដោះស្រាយរាល់បញ្ហាផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេសប្លង់អគ្គីសនី ជាមួយអគ្គីសនីកម្ពុជា រឺក៏ស្ថាប័នដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
- សិក្សាគម្រោងប្លង់បណ្តាញបំពង់មេទឹកស្អាតសម្រាប់គម្រោងទាំងមូល។
- សិក្សាការងារថែមថយ (Redesigned) នៃប្រព័ន្ធប្លង់ទឹកភ្លើង រួចអនុម័ត។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងអនុម័តការងារឡើងលុយទឹក-ភ្លើង ត្រូវប្រាកដថាត្រឹមត្រូវ និងមានតម្លាភាព។
- អនុម័តផែនការនៃការបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈទឹក-ភ្លើងទៅតាមគម្រោងនីមួយៗ អោយទាន់ផែនការ។
- ត្រូវមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវ និងការសម្រេចចិត្តខ្ពស់  ចំពោះការគ្រប់គ្រង ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបន្ទាន់ៗចំពោះមុខ។
- ប្រជុំ និងរៀបចំចាត់ចែងការងារ ដាក់ផែនការ តាមដានលទ្ធផលការងាររបស់ការិយាល័យក្នុងបន្ទុកនីមួយៗ។
- ប្រជុំណែនាំពីផែនការថ្មីៗអោយបានទាន់ពេលវេលា ដើម្បីការងារអនុវត្តន៍គ្មានបញ្ហា។
- ណែនាំដល់បុគ្គលិកថ្នាក់ក្រោម អំពីទស្សន´វិស័យ និងគោលដៅរបស់នាយកដ្ឋាន ដើម្បីជ្រាបច្បាស់ក្នងការ អនុវត្តន៍ផែនការអោយកាន់តែបានលទ្ធផលល្អប្រសើរ។
- ការងារផ្សេងៗនឹងត្រូវចាត់ចែងដោយ នាយកប្រតិបត្តិ ដើម្បីចាត់ចែងផែនការទៅមុខទៀត។
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬ អនុបណ្ឌិតផ្នែក អគ្គិសនី ឬផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ 
- មានបទពិសោធន៍លើផ្នែកទឹក-ភ្លើង យ៉ាងតិច ៤ ទៅ ៥ឆ្នាំ ក្នុងវិស័យអចលទ្រព្យ
- មានចំនេះដឹងបច្ចេកទេសគ្រប់គ្រាន់លើជំនាញទឹក-ភ្លើង 
- មានភាពជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ 
- ស្ទាត់ជំនាញលើការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និង មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ
- មានភាពរហ័សរហួន និង តស៊ូនឹងការងារ

Job Description:
- Serve as the first point of contact for customers seeking technical assistance over the phone or email
- Work with the CMO to introduce a comprehensive CRM / ERP system for the organizations
- Perform remote troubleshooting through diagnostic techniques and pertinent questions
- Determine the best solution based on the issue and details provided by customers
- Walk the customer through the problem-solving process
- Direct unresolved issues to the next level of support personnel
- Provide accurate information on IT products or services
- Record events and problems and their resolution in logs
- Follow-up and update customer status and information
- Pass on any feedback or suggestions by customers to the appropriate internal team
- Identify and suggest possible improvements on procedures
- Ensure security and privacy of networks and computer systems.
- Organize and schedule upgrades and maintenance without deterring others from completing their work.
- Ensure that all computers are secured effectively by installing and updating antivirus software
- Ready to serve as the network administrator
- Manage server and user data
- Configure, and connect CCTV camera to phone and/or on status of CCTV and be on standby 24/7 for troubleshooting and action.
- Manage the inventory of computer or network equipment by anticipating renewals and replacement timings.
- Perform troubleshooting to diagnose and resolve problems (repair or replace parts, debugging.)
- Oversee social media content posting, coordinate with content generators and assist their tasks to completion so as to ensure the work is delivered on time in full.
- Drive new initiatives to improve workflow and processes within the digital media team
- Work with advertising tools from Google, Facebook, Twitter, and other digital media platforms
- Perform research on current benchmark trends and audience preferences
- Generate, edit, publish and share engaging content daily (e.g. original text, photos, videos and news)
- Monitor SEO and web traffic metrics
- Collaborate with all function groups such as Marketing, Sales and Customer Service to ensure communication tools are optimally designed and implemented
- Oversee social media accounts’ design (e.g. Facebook timeline cover, profile pictures and blog layout)
- Suggest and implement new features to develop brand awareness, like promotions and competitions
- Other tasks as assigned by manager
- Stay up-to-date with current technologies and trends in social media, and applications to maintain and manage hardware inventory ensure its frequently kept up to date.
Job Requirement:
- Proven experience as a IT & Social Media technician or other customer support role
- Tech savvy with working knowledge of office automation products, databases and remote control
- Good understanding of computer systems, mobile devices and other tech products
- Ability to diagnose and resolve basic technical issues
- Proficiency in English
- Excellent communication skills
- Customer-oriented and cool-tempered
- BSc/BA in IT, Computer Science or relevant field
- Minimum 3 years’ experience in related fields

Interested candidates are invited to submit a detailed resume with a recent photograph and a cover letter to the HR department via hr@modestore.asia or via
Telegram; 095 772 267.

DEADLINE OF APPLICATION: 31 December 2022
Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview
Company Profile:
MODESTORE is a total fashion, lifestyle, beauty & wellness physical and digital buying
platform.
Since launching in 2017, modestore enjoys its fast-growing and exciting journey and
celebrates its success in the high-end fashion industry despite the recent pandemic.
Now it is seeking to hire a competent Sales Manager to join its wonderful and
self-motivated team to grow together in the industry.

Job Description:
1. Working closely with Business Director & Senior Director (Marketing & Strategy) to formulate project proposals.
2. Producing internal briefing document and brief to the relevant departments.
3. Work with creative, digital, media and PR team(s) to bring ideas to life. Offer suggestions, research findings, consumer insight, ability to share & constantly and learn new things.
4. Works proactively and be exceptionally responsive to provide supports and solutions on a daily basis to clients on marketing, brand communication and branding needs.
5. Manage project cost, budget and client expectations.
6. Anticipate and make recommendations for client needs.
7. Understanding the client’s needs and the availability of the internal resources.
8. Coordinating projects by communicating effectively with client & internal teams to follow all steps to ensure projects stay on track.
9. Providing excellent customer service and relationship with a positive attitude to every client, on every occasion.
10.Obtaining client briefings and working with cross departments to translate the brief into actions.
11. Conducting presentations to the prospective clients and follow up to close sale-deals.
12.Supports in New Business Development.
Job Requirement:
1. Strong written & verbal communications skills and the ability to balance multiple priorities.
2. At least a Bachelor's degree graduated with minimum 5 years of working experience in the field of sales, marketing and, client service management, business development and/or project management.
3. The Client Manager should be a leader, forward thinking, analytical, creative, detailed oriented and a team player.
4. Must be well organized person and withhold strong accountability and entrepreneurship spirit.
5. Excellent people skills and the ability to work with a wide range of people.
6. Professional appearance and personality.
7. Working long hours, especially under tight deadlines.
8. Travel to the provinces and abroad maybe required on ad-hoc basis.
9. Must be able to handle pressure well.
10.Proven self-motivated and have a passion to win spirit.
11. Background in advertising service agency is an advantage.
1. Advanced working knowledge of Microsoft Office, especially the PowerPoint, Excel and social media.

Interested candidates are invited to submit a detailed resume with a recent photograph and a cover letter to the HR department via hr@modestore.asia or via Telegram; 095
772 267.

Job Description:
Summary of Position
Ensure all the marketing events and activities that are approved in the marketing roadmap are successfully implemented with quality and smoothly by the agreed timeline.

What you will do:
•	Assist in planning all company marketing event
•	Brainstorming the event plans and concepts
•	Execute events with stakeholders, other Business Units, and agency
•	Monitor and keep marketing expenses within budget
•	Work with teams to ensure support event tools (POSM, beverages…) are ready, and media, transportation are well arranged
•	Execute events to a high standard whilst integrating brand principles
•	Handle post-event reports
•	Process documents with internal and external as required
•	Assist marketing team as required
Job Requirement:
What you should have:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
•	Minimum 1-year experience in event, marketing, and sales
•	Knowledge of computer programs, MS Officer, MS Office 365 is an advantage
•	Good time management
•	Knowledge of event planning and management 
•	Highly Organized & Multi-tasker
•	Ability to think creatively and innovatively
•	Able to travel to the province, and flexible schedule
•	Good behavior, and a good team player

What we offer:
We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including free meals, Seniority payment, bonus, and insurance, etc. with excellent career development opportunities to the right candidates.

More Information:
•	Recruiter: Vandy KEO, Tel: 067 222 949
•	Address: #137, Mao Tse Tung Blvd. Khan Chamkamorn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.
•	Website: http://www.chipmong.com

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.
Contact Info: Contact Information Vandy KEO  067 222 949 vandy.keo@chipmong.com #137, Mao Tse Tung Blvd, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia 067 222 949

Job Description: •Coordinating transportation providers to     ensure prompt and proper movement of shipments•Reviewing purchase orders and shipping documents to ensure accuracy•Making special shipping arrangements as necessary•Tracking and fixing shipping errors•Managing distribution and shipment budgets•Ensuring that the quality of all services provided meets the required standards•Developing processes that make the supply chain more efficient and organised•Planning and overseeing the work of Buyers and Purchasing Agents•Developing an organisation's procurement rules and regulations•Establishing guidelines on how often the company gets price quotes for items, the number of bids to accept and which vendors to consider•Buying goods and services for the company•Discussing contracts •Evaluating quality, price, reliability, technical support and availability of goods and services.

Job Description: • To initiate and prepare a preliminary design concept based on information and requirement provided;• To produce bills of quantities, labour, materials and equipment taking off from the final design;• To review sub-contractors’ shop drawings and construction drawings against the MEP design and specification;• To plan, oversee and manage the projects;• Attend project site progress meeting and technical meeting;• Manage the day to day work of the MEP team.• Achieve a detailed understanding of the Contract documents (drawings and specifications), phasing• plans, MEP systems interrelationships, construction sequencing and project schedule.• Facilitate problem solving, as may arise, between MEP Subcontractors during construction.• Validate design issues related to MEP and suggest alternative solutions.• Assist in the receipt and review of MEP submittals.• Log and post all MEP changes and as-built information on field drawings.• Assist in the scope review, budgeting and justification of MEP change work order.• Assist in the installation of MEP work.• Direct, monitor and control the activities of MEP Subcontractor.• Liaison with Consultant MEP supervisory Engineers, Inspectors and relevant staff.• Ensure that MEP Subcontractors provides and adheres to relevant Quality documentation/records.• Ensure that MEP Subcontractors adheres to Project safety regulations.• Assist in the testing and commissioning of MEP equipment.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor or Master degree in MEP Engineering (HAVC, Electrical, Sanitary & Plumbing) and other equivalent degree;• Working knowledge of plans, prints, specifications and schematics associated with trade• Min. 2 years experiences in construction industry;• Computer skills: Revit MEP, AutoCAD,…etc.;• Have good oral and written in English;• Have good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, and problem solving skills;• Ability to multi-task, work under pressure and meet deadlines required.• Ability to work under pressure and flexibility to work long hours, if situation demands.• Ability to work in a collaborative and diverse team environment.• Proficient In English• Proficient in Mandarin is a plus.

Job Description: ** Job Responsibilities:- Ability to handle full set of accounts- GL Entries Checking in Accounting System- Cash Flow Planning and Controlling- Financial Analysis and Cost Review- Oversees Financial Operation and Consolidated Reporting- Ensures the integrity of accounting information by ensuring   your team record, verify, consolidate, and enter transactions- Ensuring your team prepares and records asset, liability,   revenue, and expenses entries by compiling and analyzing   account information.- Ensuring your team maintains and balances subsidiary accounts   by verifying, allocating, posting, and reconciling   transactions and resolving discrepancies.- Ensuring your team maintains general ledger by transferring   subsidiary accounts, preparing a trial balance, and   reconciling entries.- Ensuring and checking your team post Accounting Entries in   Accounting System- Payment Checking and Approval- Payroll Checking and Signing-Off for Authorized Signatories- Weekly Payment Summary for Fund Request and Arrangement- Motivation, Education and Training for Accounting Team,   Performance Reviewing- Identification of Internal Control Weaknesses, Operational   Best Practice and Corporate Governance- Support in Decision Making and ensure Cost-Effective Benefits- Risk Assessment and Mitigation, Legal Docs Reviewing- Liaise with Banker, Auditor and Tax Agent- Month End Closing Stock, LIP Valuation and Verification- Monthly/Quarterly Tax Return Checking and Approval- Annual Tax Submission- AP Aging and Statement Reconciliation- Bank Reconciliation Statement- Interco Balance Sheet Reconciliation- Month End Closing Schedule Reviewing and Monitoring- Timely Monthly Financial Reporting- To Maintain and Improve on Internal Control, Company Policy   are in accordance with Accounting Standards- To Ensure Proper Filing and Keeping of Accounting Documents- Mentoring and Supervision of Accounts Staff, Performance   Reviewing- Liaise with Auditor and Tax Agent
Job Requirement: - Proven working experience as an Accountant or in a relevant   field- BSc degree in Finance, Accounting or Economics- CPA or CA preferred- Thorough knowledge of accounting and corporate finance   principles and procedures- Excellent accounting software user- Strong attention to detail and confidentiality- Self-motivation- Responsibility- Ability to reflect on one's own work as well as the wider   consequences of financial decisions- Organizational skills and ability to manage deadlines- Team Player- Analytical ability- A methodical approach and problem-solving skills- Advanced MS Excel skills- Knowledge of financial regulations- Excellent analytical and numerical skills- Sharp time management skills- Strong ethics, with an ability to manage confidential data- Proficiency in English both writing and speaking
