position: ប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកជាងជួសជុល
Job Description: 1. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារជួសជុលទូទៅ៖ តុ ទូ កៅអី ទ្វារ  បង្អួច ក្តារខៀន របងដែក រណាំងរុញ លាបថ្នាំជញ្ជំាង ពិដាន ធ្វើពិដានថ្មី   ម្នាងសិលា ស្មាតបត ចាប់ជ្រី ចាក់សាប ធ្វើគម្របលូ រៀបឥដ្ឋ ជួសជុលការ៉ូ   និងការងារផ្សេងៗ គ្រប់អគារទាំងអស់ឱ្យមានដំណើរការល្អ-ល-។2. ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗសិក្សា និងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។3. រៀបចំផែនការការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។4. រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារ នៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើជូនប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកផ្ទាល់ នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម (13. Maintenance Unit)។5. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណភាព។6. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសហការ ការងារជាមួយជាងខាងក្រៅពេលមានការងារពុំអាចធ្វើបាន ឬបន្ទាន់ច្រើន។7. ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំភ្ជាប់ជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារ។8. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញពេលយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោងការងារ បើមានការបាត់បង់ ត្រូវសន្សុំសំចៃ។9. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងពីចាប់ផ្ដើមរហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។10. ចូលរួមសហការ ការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។11. បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗ ដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ។12. ជួយសម្របសម្រួលការងារទូទៅមួយចំនួនជំនួសប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែក។ 13. ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃ្លាំងសម្ភារ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ។ 14. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ។15. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។ 16. ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែក ។
Job Requirement: - បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់ទី១២ឡើងទៅ - មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៥០ឆ្នាំ។- មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល ០៣ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។- ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់។- អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់។- មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ- ការលាយស៊ីម៉ងត៍- ការចាប់ជ្រី- ការរៀបការ៉ូ- ការបៀកជញ្ជាំង- ការបូកជញ្ជាំង- ការងារចាក់សាប- ការងាររៀបឥដ្ឋ- ការប្រើប្រាស់ពណ៌ថ្នាំ- ការលាយថ្នាំប្រភេទទឹក និងប្រភេទប្រេង- យល់ដឹងពីស្ថានភាពការងារមុនពេលបៀក និងរុញថ្នាំ- ការរុញថ្នាំ- ការធ្វើពិដានថ្មី- ការជួសជុលពិដាន- ការប៉ាន់ស្មានសម្ភារមុនពេលធ្វើគម្រោងការងារអ្វីមួយត្រូវឱ្យមានភាពច្បាស់លាស់- ការធ្វើតាមប្លង់ដែលប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ- ការពារសុវត្តិភាពក្នុងពេលបំពេញការងាររបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនងទូរស័ព្ទមកខាងយើងខ្ញុំតាមរយៈលេខ៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939
Contact Information HR Department   +855 86 666 176 hr@passiongroup.asia Phnom Penh. +855 86 666 176

Job Description:
•	Greet and escort customers to their tables
•	Present menu and provide detailed information when asked 
•	Prepare tables by setting up linens, silverware and glasses
•	Inform customers about the day’s specials
•	Offer menu recommendations upon request
•	Up-sell additional products when appropriate
•	Take accurate food and drinks orders, using a POS ordering software, order  slips or by memorization
•	Check customers’ IDs to ensure they meet minimum age requirements for consumption of alcoholic beverages
•	Communicate order details to the Kitchen Staff
•	Serve food and drink orders
•	Check dishes and kitchenware for cleanliness and presentation and report any problems
•	Arrange table settings and maintain a tidy dining area
•	Deliver checks and collect bill payments
•	Carry dirty plates, glasses and silverware to kitchen for cleaning
•	Meet with restaurant staff to review daily specials, changes on the menu and service specifications for reservations (e.g. parties)
•	Follow all relevant health department regulations
•	Provide excellent customer service to guests
Job Requirement:
•	Proven work experience as a Waiter or Waitress
•	Hands-on experience with cash register and ordering information system (e.g. Revel POS or Toast POS)
•	Basic math skills
•	Attentiveness and patience for customers
•	Excellent presentation skills
•	Strong organizational and multitasking skills, with the ability to perform well in a fast-paced environment
•	Active listening and effective communication skills
•	Team spirit
•	Flexibility to work in shifts
•	High school diploma; food safety training is a plus
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   +855 86 666 176 hr@passiongroup.asia Phnom Penh. +855 86 666 176

job title: ជាងជួសជុលទូទៅ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: ជាងជួសជុលទូទៅ
Job Description: 1. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារជួសជុលទូទៅ តុ ទូ កៅអី ទ្វារ  បង្អួច ក្តារខៀន របងដែក រណាំងរុញ លាបថ្នាំជញ្ជំា-ង ពិដាន ធ្វើពិដានថ្មី  ម្នាងសិលា ស្មាតបត ចាប់ជ្រី ចាក់សាប ធ្វើគម្របលូ រៀបឥដ្ឋ ជួសជុលការ៉ូ   និងការងារផ្សេងៗ គ្រប់អគារទាំងអស់ឱ្យមានដំណើរការល្អ-ល-។2. ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗសិក្សា និងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។3. រៀបចំផែនការការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។4. រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារ នៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើជូនប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកផ្ទាល់នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម (13. Maintenance Unit)។5. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណភាព។6. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសហការ ការងារជាមួយជាងខាងក្រៅពេលមានការងារពុំអាចធ្វើបាន ឬបន្ទាន់ច្រើន។7. ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំ ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារ។8. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងពីចាប់ផ្ដើម រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។9. ចូលរួមសហការ ការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។10. បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗ ដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ។11. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក។12. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលសាលាបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់ទទួលការងារពីថ្នាក់លើ។
Job Requirement: - បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់ទី១២ - អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់។- មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៥៥ឆ្នាំ។- មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល ០២ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។- ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់។- មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។ - ការលាយស៊ីម៉ងត៍។- ការចាប់ជ្រី។- ការរៀបការ៉ូ។- ការបៀកជញ្ជាំង។- ការបូកជញ្ជាំង។- ការងារចាក់សាប។- ការងាររៀបឥដ្ឋ។- ការប្រើប្រាស់ពណ៌ថ្នាំ។- ការលាយថ្នាំប្រភេទទឹក និងប្រភេទប្រេង។- យល់ដឹងពីស្ថានភាពការងារមុនពេលបៀក និងរុញថ្នាំ។- ការរុញថ្នាំ។- ការធ្វើពិដានថ្មី។- ការជួសជុលពិដាន។- ការប៉ាន់ស្មានសម្ភារមុនពេលធ្វើគម្រោងការងារអ្វីមួយត្រូវឱ្យមានភាពច្បាស់លាស់។- ការងារធ្វើតាមប្លង់ដែលប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ។- ការពារសុវត្តិភាពក្នុងពេលបំពេញការងារ។របៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEទំនាក់ទំនងទូរស័ព្ទមកខាងយើងខ្ញុំតាមរយៈលេខ៖ 012 797 939; 093 335 564ឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
Direct report to Recruitment and Branding Supervisor

Recruitment  Officer aim to provide all HR Service in term of on time delivery of recruitment operational and professional staffs 

Job Description:

-Responsible for all aspects of recruitment  from operational to professional staff
-Prepare the job offering , employment contracts for operational staff and professional staff
-To ensure that JD has been documented for all roles
-To ensure recruitment request has been approved and in number of approval headcounts 
-Handle and manage internal and external job announcement
-Responsible for  screening short-listed candidate from operational to professional staffs
-Contact all short-listed candidate in regarding to their application and kept them informed including referral program. 
-Participate in the recruitment communication , advertisement,  sourcing strategies
-Coordinate with recruitment panellist in setting up an interview appointment 
-Ensure that all the information related to all applications are input into the system and besides all hard copies are properly maintained
-Ensure that recruitment mailbox is maintained properly
-Conduct the reference checking for all operational and professional staffs 
-Assist in managing and running career fair exhibition
-Assist in employer branding activities to promote and attract talents candidates
-Update regularly to line manager for weekly recruitment status and recruitment tracking tool
-Other tasks assigned by line manager

Travel  Requirement:

- This position is based in head office and subject to travel to province to help recruitment as required
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement:

- Bachelor degree level in any related field
- At least one or two years experience in recruitment junior level
- outgoing personality
- Professional proficiency in written and spoken English and Khmer
- Good communication , presentation , negotiation and network skill
- Result focus with ability to take ownership of tasks
- Experienced in employer branding is a plus

Due to a large number of applicants, we will only be able to follow up with candidates who are shortlisted for an interview, and this will happen within 10 working days from the date of your application.
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information EFG Cambodia   017 888 349 efgcareer@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017 888 349

Company Profile:
We make use of our human resource networks and education system to provide consultations and match the needs of our customers.
We as an expert of human resources, offer a high level of service to our customers.

In order to meet the needs of our customers, we are particularly focused on building and education system of human resources network,
It is possible to quickly introduce a variety of talented workers.

In addition, efforts to improve service without having to settle for status quo, we will continue to strongly support our clients’ firms.
We will also support the growth and development of the manufacturing industry,
We will continue to contribute to society of Cambodia.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Designs, develops, test and maintain Aii, CSL Program, TESOL House website- Monitors Aii, CSL Program, TESOL House and other relevant websites - Keeps updating those websites (contents, layout, designs, etc. - Updates existing applications to meet the security and functionality standards as outlined in website policies- Reports to the President regarding the website status- Identify and manage problems arising during the development process- Maintain data confidentiality at all time- Assist in updating application development policies to ensure that all future applications meet the latest technical requirements- Coordinates with external website service providers if needed- Builds responsive web based applications Front-End and Back-End- Creates website layout/user interface by using standard HTML/CSS/JS practices and other front-end technologies- Setup and maintain required services including hardware, software and development- Takes care of database housekeeping- Develops new user interface features- Establishes and promote design guidelines, best practices and standards- Creates and maintains website documentation- Documents project build and maintenance- Work closely with the graphic design team- Collect and archive all the completed tasks.- Maintains technical knowledge by attending training, workshops; reviewing professional publications; participating in professional development- Other tasks assigned by Management Team
Job Requirement: - A bachelor degree in Information Technology or related fields.- Excellent problem solving skills, and able to use initiative - Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media- Ability to understand and keep within a budget- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative and organizational skillsHow to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564Due to high volume of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for the interview.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment and Job Management  092333020 jobs@amret.com.kh #80, Street 315, Sangkat Boeung Kak2, Khan Toul Kok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 092333020

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: ជាងអគ្គិសនី
Job Description: 1. ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែក ឬអនុប្រធានក្រុមលើការត្រួតពិនិត្យថែទំា ជួសជុលសម្ភារ ឧបករណ៍ គ្រឿងបរិក្ខារអគ្គិសនី និងរៀបចំប្រព័ន្ធថ្មីបន្ថែមតាមអគារនីមួយៗ ឱ្យស្របតាមស្តង់ដាបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេស និងមានដំណើរការល្អ។2. ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ សិក្សា និងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។3. រៀបចំផែនការការងារក្នុងក្រុមធ្វើប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។4. រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារ នៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើជូនប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកផ្ទាល់ នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម (13. Maintenance Unit)។5. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណភាព។6. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការសហការ ការងារជាមួយជាងខាងក្រៅពេលមានការងារពុំអាចធ្វើបាន ឬបន្ទាន់ច្រើន។7. ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំភ្ជាប់ជាមួយ និងបណ្ណការងារ។8. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញពេលយកទៅប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោងការងារ បើមានការបាត់បង់ ត្រូវសន្សុំសំចៃ។9. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងពីចាប់ផ្ដើមរហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។10. ចូលរួមសហការ ការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។11. បង្កើតនៅគំនិតថ្មីៗ ដែលជួយសម្រួលទៅដល់ការងារនៅក្នុងផ្នែកឱ្យដំណើរការបានល្អប្រសើរ។12. ត្រួតពិនិត្យឃ្លាំងសម្ភារ ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ។ 13. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ។14. ទទួលខុសត្រូវការថែរក្សាឧបករណ៍ ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបើកឱ្យប្រើប្រាស់។ 15. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការអនុវត្តការងារតាមបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យការងារ (Checklist) នៅតាមអគារ។ 16. ទទួលការងារពីថ្នាក់លើ ។
Job Requirement: - បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឯកទេស អគ្គិសនី និងពាក់ព័ន្ធ- មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៥០ឆ្នាំ។- មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល ០២ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ។- ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់។- អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់។- មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ។ - ធ្វើការងារដោយគោរពទៅតាមគោលការណ៍ដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនបានចែង។- ការចេញពីទីតាំងការងារដោយគ្មានការអនុញ្ញាត ពីប្រធានផ្នែកត្រូវបញ្ឈប់ពីការងារ។- ត្រូវមានសៀវភៅ ឬឯកសារកត់ត្រា រាល់មានការប្រជុំ ឬពេលមានការងារពីថ្នាក់លើដាក់ឱ្យ។- ពេលបំពេញការងារ ត្រូវមានសម្ភារបួនប្រភេទ សម្ភារការពារ សម្ភារការពារសុវត្ថិភាព សម្ភារធ្វើ និងសម្ភារសម្អាត។- ចេះចែករំលែករាល់ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ដែលបានទទួលទៅឱ្យបុគ្គលិកនៅក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់បានដឹង។- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។ - មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។- ការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៍អគ្គិសនីតាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេស។- គុណភាពការជួសជុលប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើង។- គុណភាព និងសោភ័ណភាពការដំឡើងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើង។- ការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រអប់ភ្លើងឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវជាមួយខ្សែភ្លើង។- គុណភាព និងសោភ័ណភាពការរត់ប្រអប់ភ្លើង។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile:
AEON MALL is the Japan’s Largest Specialist Shopping Mall Developer. We not only develop but also operate over 150 shopping malls throughout Japan and other countries. On expanding retail business across Asia, AEON MALL has opened our third biggest shopping mall in 2022.

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗក្រៅពីហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ / Non- Financial benefits:

Job Description:
•	Analyze sales trend, trend on social media and promotion results for better strategies and matching customers’ needs and satisfaction. 
•	Manage digital signage in posting and generating incomes.  
•	Manage all mall social media platforms. 
•	Work with social media agency to keep improving social media status of mall. 
•	Research and Develop Creative Sales & Marketing online campaigns. 
•	Excellent organizational skills to work independently and manage projects ongoing at the same time. 
•	Propose and implement promotional programs and public relation events. 
•	Engage with tenants regarding to Sales & Marketing Activities and promotion plans. 
•	Handle complaints and problems from customers, ensure that all claims are in line with company policy. 
•	Keep monitoring performance of competitors.
•	Other tasks assigned by management.
Job Requirement:
•	2-year experience related Sale and Marketing, Hospitality, or Public Relation field.
•	Bachelor Degree in Marketing and Media or Communications. 
•	Knowledge in Digital Marketing, Social Media and Microsoft Office. 
•	Knowledge in making data analysis reports and fluent in Presentation Skill. 
•	Be challenging, self-motivated, problem solving and able to work under pressure   Goal driven and be able to work with flexible working schedule.
Company Profile:
AEON MALL is the Japan’s Largest Specialist Shopping Mall Developer. We not only develop but also operate over 150 shopping malls throughout Japan and other countries. On expanding retail business across Asia, AEON MALL has opened our third biggest shopping mall in 2022.

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ / Financial benefits:
- ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់24ម៉ោង /​ Private 24/7 accident insurance after probation.

- ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តពីរដងក្នុងមួយឆ្នាំ / Bonus Twice per year
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសាំង / Gasoline Allowance
- ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ / Annual Salary Increment
- ប្រាក់ថែមម៉ោង / Overtime
- ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ / Seniority Payment
- ប្រាក់បំណាច់បញ្ចប់កិច្ចសន្យា / Severance Payment
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចូលរួមរំលែកទុក្ខពេលមានមរណភាព /Mourning Allowance
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភពេលសម្រាលកូន/ Maternity Allowance

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗក្រៅពីហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ / Non- Financial benefits:
- ការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំខែ ៨-៩ថ្ងៃក្នុង១ខែ / 8-9 days Off per month
- អាហារមួយពេលក្នុង០១ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ / 01 meal per working day
- ច្បាប់សម្រាកពិសេស / Special Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ១៨ថ្ងៃក្នុង ១ឆ្នាំ / Annual Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកមាតុភាព / Maternity Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកបុរសពេលភរិយាសម្រាលបុត្រ / Paternity Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកពេលរៀបអាពាពិពាហ៏/ Marriage Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកឈឺពេលខ្លី និងឈឺពេលវែង / Short term and long term Sick leave
- ការលើកទឹកចិត្តសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកដែលមានអតីតភាពការងារវែង ៥ឆ្នាំ ១០ឆ្នាំ .... / Long Year Service Award (5 years, 10 years,…)

ផ្សេងៗ / Others:

- ការជប់លៀងចុងឆ្នាំ / Year End Party
- ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ / Career Development Opportunity
- ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលក្នុង និងក្រៅប្រទេស / Local and Oversea Training

Job Description: • Prepares selection of Project Consultants• Briefs all Consultants on the client’s requirements and coordinates with the Lead Consultant and his team on the Design and other technical matters.• Conducts Client-Consultant Meetings and ensures flow of documentation/information is controlled.• Prepares the Development Schedule for the Project.• Reviews with Consultant QS on Cost Plans for Project with updates.• Liaises with Consultants on the provision of documents for the various submissions to authorities to ensure timely approval according to schedule.• Coordinates with Consultants to ensure calling and the award of tenders for various packages is done according to schedule and with the proper documentations and monitor the tendering process and tendering evaluation.• Establishes the contract administration procedures.• Prepares the Project Quality Plan and disseminates to Consultants, Contractors and Supervising Staff.• Monitors the Contractors ‘submissions and comments/replies by Construction Manager/Consultants• Ensures various critical milestones are incorporated in the Contractors’ programmes and are executed accordingly and to proper procedures.• Keeps track of the issued and potential variation orders and other controls to ensure that the project completes within budget.• Checks all payment claims by contractors and recommends for approval/payment.• Prepares monthly reports on site progress and other pertinent issues to the Employer.• Monitors various quality/safety control measures on site. Keeps tracks that all regulatory requirements to be adhered to by Contractors are followed.• Conducts regular meetings with Contractors on progress and other matters.• Ensures all procedures of handing over are complied with according to authorities and the Client’s requirements.• Monitors feedback on defects after handing over and the execution of the rectification works to address the complaints/defects.
Job Requirement: • Good attitude and energy level• Good communication• Good in budget planning• Good in management skill• Fluency English and other language is a plus• Proven experience as Project Manager or relevant role• Demonstrable competency in strategic project planning• Working knowledge of data analysis and performance/operation metrics• Working knowledge of IT/Business infrastructure and MS Office• Outstanding organizational and leadership abilities• Excellent interpersonal and public speaking skills• Aptitude in decision-making and problem-solving• BSc in Engineering; MSc/MBA is a plus

job title: បុគ្គលិកថែទាំអគារ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: បុគ្គលិកថែទាំអគារ
Job Description: 1. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការថែទាំ និងជួសជុល កម្រិតស្រាលលើ ប្រព័ន្ធទឹក អគ្គិសនី ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់  ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង ជួសជុលទូទៅ ព្រមទាំងសម្ភារបរិក្ខារ និងឧបករណ៍ប្រើប្រាស់ផ្សេងៗក្នុងអគារ ឱ្យមានសោភ័ណភាព និងមានដំណើរការល្អ និងយល់ពីវិធីសាស្ត្រទប់ស្កាត់ និងសង្រ្គោះពេលមានអគ្គិភ័យ ឬផ្ទុះសេខ្សែភ្លើងជាដើម។ 2. ទទួលខុសត្រូវគ្រប់គ្រងឧបករណ៍ និងសម្ភារសម្រាប់ជួសជុលដែលនៅក្នុងឃ្លាំងឱ្យមានភាពគង់វង្ស។3. ធ្វើជាជំនួយការ ការងារអ្នកបច្ចេកទេសដូចជា៖ ជាងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ជាងអគ្គិសនី ជាងសំណង់ ជាងជួសជុលទូទៅ ជាងដែក ជាងឈើ ជាងបាញ់ថ្នាំ ជាងសម្អាតលម្អិត កំចាត់សត្វល្អិត សួន នៅពេលណាមួយខ្វះកម្លាំងអាចយកទៅបំពេញបានពេលទំនេរពីការងារ។4. អនុវត្តផែនការដែលប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែក និងអនុប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ ឱ្យបាន១០០ ភាគរយ។5. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារដែលខ្លួនបានធ្វើឱ្យបាន១០០ ភាគរយ។6. ត្រូវមានទំនាក់ទំនង និងការសហការល្អជាមួយផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។I. ការងារទទួលខុសត្រូវប្រចាំថ្ងៃ1. ទទួលការងារផ្សេងៗពីផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដោះស្រាយឱ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា ទៅតាមទំហំការងារជាក់ស្តែង2. ធ្វើការងារជួសជុលសម្ភារផ្សេងៗប្រចាំថ្ងៃ នៅក្នុងអគារដែលមានបញ្ហា។3. ដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យមើល បរិវេណជុំវិញក្នុង និងក្រៅអគារ សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់  សោភ័ណភាព សុវត្ថិភាព ឧបករណ៍ប្រតិបត្តិការ និងបរិស្ថានក្នុងអគារទាំងមូល និងកត់ត្រារាល់ចំណុចខូចខាតត្រូវដោះស្រាយភ្លាមៗ ឬទុកធ្វើថ្ងៃបន្ទាប់ ជាក់ស្តែងហើយត្រូវរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែក និងផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ៖ - សោភ័ណភាពៈ ភាពគ្មានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ ស្នាមប្រឡាក់  ថ្នាំត្រូវជួសជុល សម្ភារដាក់ខុសកន្លែង ។ល។ - សុវត្ថិភាពៈ ការដ្ឋានមិនរៀបរយ  ខ្សែភ្លើង កុងតាក់ភ្លើង ឌុយដោត  ដែកស្រួច Smoke Alarm អំពូល អាសន្ន  ម៉ូទ័រទឹកពន្លត់អគ្គីភ័យ សម្ភារដែលអាចធ្លាក់ពីលើ ទ្វារ ទ្វាររមូរ ទ្វារជណ្តើរអាសន្ន បង្អួច របងជុំវិញអគារ (ចាក់សោរត្រឹមត្រូវ) ទូរសព្ទប្រកាសអាសន្ន និងកណ្តឹងក្នុងជណ្តើរយន្ត។ល។ - ឧបករណ៍ប្រតិបត្តិការៈ ជណ្តើរយន្ត ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ កង្ហារ អំពូលភ្លើង អំពូលហ្វារ អំពូលឡូហ្គូ អំពូលការពារយន្តហោះ ភ្លើងស្តែនបាយ ប្រព័ន្ធផ្តល់សញ្ញាពេលមានចោរផ្លោះរបងចូលអគារដំណើរការល្អ (Intruder Sensor) តុ និងកៅអីសិស្ស។ល។ - បរិស្ថានៈ ភាពកខ្វក់ ក្លិនមិនល្អ សំរាម ធុងសំរាម សត្វមូស បន្ទប់ទឹក និងទីតាំងចំណតត្រូវតែស្អាត ករណីបើពិនិត្យឃើញថាបើមានឃើញចំណុចបញ្ហា ត្រូវរបាយការណ៍ទៅក្រុមការងារផ្នែកសុវត្ថិភាពសាលា និងសាធារណៈ ដើម្បីឱ្យជួយដោះស្រាយ។4. ត្រួតពិនិត្យសម្ភារជាងមុនពេលចូលធ្វើ និងកំពុងធ្វើ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពការងារជាងពេលធ្វើរួច។5. ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក និងឆ្លើយតបទៅប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកពេលការងារបញ្ចប់។6. ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ ឬរៀបចំបណ្ណស្នើសុំ ហើយប្រគល់ជូនអនុប្រធាន ឬប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែក។7. ពេលទំនេរពីការងារ ត្រូវជួយតាមផ្នែកដែលត្រូវការកម្លាំង សម្រាប់ថ្ងៃស្អែក និងបន្ទាន់ខ្លំាងភ្លាមៗ។8. ឆែកតេលេក្រាម (Telegram) នៅតាមអគាររៀងៗខ្លួន ក្រុមដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីទទួលការងារ និងដើម្បីទទួលបានព័ត៌មាន។9. រៀងរាល់ពេលដែលមាន ភ្លៀងត្រូវដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យមើល ដំបូល បង្អួច ប្រព័ន្ធលូ ទីតាំងសំខាន់ៗ ចៀសវាងករណីលេចជ្រាប ឬសាចទឹក បណ្តាលឱ្យខូចសម្ភារ និងដើម្បីតាមដានហើយជួសជុលបន្ត។ល។10. បើកសម្ភារពីឃ្លាំងពេលមានតម្រូវការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។II. ការងារទទួលខុសត្រូវជាទម្លាប់1. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យអគារទូទៅប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍៖   - សម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកថែទំាអគារស្នាក់នៅសាលាត្រូវត្រួតពិនិត្យរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍។   - សម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកថែទំាអគារបុគ្គលិកខាងក្រៅត្រួតពិនិត្យថ្ងៃអាទិត្យ។2. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យឧបករណ៍បន្លឺសំឡេងពេលមានបញ្ហា  (Smoke Alarm) រៀងរាល់ (ថ្ងៃទី១៥ និងថ្ងៃទី៣០)។3. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យដំបូលអគាររៀងរាល់(ថ្ងៃទី១៥ និងថ្ងៃទី៣០)។4. ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យទីតាំងសំខាន់ៗ កន្លែងលោកប្រធាន រៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃចន្ទពេលរសៀល ចន្លោះម៉ោង (0២:00PM -0៥:00PM)។5. ផ្ញើរបាយការណ៍ ការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃផ្ញើចូលគ្រុប (13. Maintenance Unit) ប្រចាំថ្ងៃចុងម៉ោងពេលរសៀល។6. កត់ត្រារបាយការណ៍ ទឹក ភ្លើង អតិថិជនខាងក្រៅ (កាហ្វេ ស្មាតម៉ាត កន្លែងជួល...) រៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃទី២០ផ្ញើរបាយការណ៍ក្នុងគ្រុប (Space Rental Utilities Report) ។ 7. ផ្ញើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែមកប្រធានផ្នែករៀងរាល់ចន្លោះថ្ងៃទី០១ដល់ថ្ងៃទី០៦ ឱ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលបានកំណត់៖  - បញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យអគារទូទៅប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍។  - បញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យឧបករណ៍បន្លឺសំឡេងពេលមានបញ្ហា (Smoke Alarm)។    - បញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យដំបូលអគារ។  - បញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យទីតាំងសំខាន់ៗកន្លែងលោកប្រធាន។  - របាយការណ៍លទ្ធផលការងារប្រចាំខែ។
Job Requirement: - បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រឡើងទៅ- មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំឡើង ដល់៥៥ឆ្នាំ- មានបទពិសោធន៍ទាក់ទងការងារ ប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គិសនី ប្រព័ន្ធទឹក ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ថែទំាគ្រឿងបរិក្ខារ ការងារទូទៅផ្សេងៗ ក្នុងអគារយ៉ាងតិច ២ឆ្នាំ - អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់- មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ - មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. job title: Deputy Chief Operating Officer for MFI
position: Deputy Chief Operating Officer for MFI
Job Description: Job Responsibilities:•	Credit Operations – o	Lead Mango Finance’s credit operations team, comprising Regional Managers, Loan Officers, and Field Operations Executives, and maintain team disciplineo	Ensure payments to 3-wheeler dealers are made a timely manner, and guiding team to ensure minimal errors in loan fileso	Build strong relationships with 3-wheeler dealers so that Mango Finance is the preferred MFI, and help dealers resolve any issues•	Credit Management – o	Oversee loan approvals, ensuring all loans approved follow the company’s credit policy, and maintain PAR rates within acceptable levelso	Work closely with Credit Managers to understand why loans are late, and propose updates to existing credit policieso	Monitor Collections team to ensure collections are done on-time and late penalty fees are collected from customers•	Middle-Office Operations – o	Ensure that any repossessed vehicles are fixed as soon as possible, and sold to second-hand dealerso	Spot check daily team activities and loan fileso	Strong understanding of compliance and regulations about the Banking / MFI sector in Cambodia
Job Requirement: Job Requirements:•	At least 10 years working experience in bank or MFI is a must, with previous experience in Loan Operations or Credit Operations•	Good in spoken and written English and Khmer•	Must know how to use Microsoft Excel and email •	Have experience in leading at large teams•	Able to find solutions in difficult situations, and able to work under pressure
Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

Job Description: Be responsible for recruitment KPIs and manage well the recruitment process to ensure the hiring of various positions in Store Chain and Office Operations as well as being a partner with Commercial Team to deliver fulfillment commitment.Recruitment: • Be responsible for recruitment KPIs.• Update current and initiate to improve recruiting procedures (e.g. job application and on-boarding processes)• Keep track of recruiting metrics (e.g. time-to-hire and cost-per-hire)• Implement new sourcing methods.• Review recruitment software and suggest the best option for company needs.• Research and choose job advertising options.• Advise hiring managers on interviewing techniques.• Recommend ways to improve our employer brand.• Coordinate with department managers to forecast future hiring needs.• Stay up-to-date on labor legislation and inform recruiters and managers about changes in regulations.• Build the company’s professional network through relationships with HR professionals, colleges and other partners.• Keep up-to-date on trends in retail industry; overseeing competitor strategic to effectively execute manpower planning as an effective HR Plan to Business Unit.• Participate in job fairs and career events (if needed).Training:• Develop, coordinate, and/or conduct general/job-specific/soft skills training programs to ensure staffs are well- trained on their job functions.• Develop and conduct initial orientation programs to ensure all staffs are fully informed and engaged to company business and brands.• Coordinate and/or conduct corporate sponsored training programs for store personnel.• Build/maintain/implement training calendar/documents/database/records…• Work closely with HRBPs and store teams to provide training need analysis, identify training concerns and provide recommendations for continuous improvement.

At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Job Description: - Assist Security Manager in ensuring overall security in Chip Mong all shopping malls.- To supervise the security teams of the security contractors.- To patrol the mall for customer safety and report any incident security breach immediately to the Security Manager and to the Mall Manager.- Organise duties at all post and to prepare duty roster 24 hrs in advance.- Co-ordinate after hours security.- Ensure all center procedure and SOP is adhered to.- Conduct parade / drill and briefing 15 minutes before start shift or taking over for every shift.- Ensure adequate manpower for shift.-Organise and manage traffic in the event of traffic congestion at the center.- Check security personnel attendance daily.- Ensure proper handing over must be done before completion of normal shift duty.- To report and brief incidents of serious nature / criminal cases.- Ensure all Security personnel well versed in the area of Fire Fighting, crowd control and others aspect pertaining to the Security.- Submit incidents / cases within 24 hours for further action.- Maintain relationship with Mall teams, providing timely assistance on Security matters.
Job Requirement: - At least 2-year experience in a supervisory position.- Police At least 3 years work experience.- Security and safety procedures.- Proficient in MS-office.- Experience in shopping mall retail is an advantage.- Supervisory skills.- Strong verbal and written communication skills.- Be self-motivated and performance focused.- A team player with the ability to work independently and unsupervised.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
•	Supports the department by establishing a recruiting, testing, and interviewing program; candidate selection; conducting and analyzing exit interviews; and recommending changes for outsourcing staff.
•	Prepares outsourced employees for assignments by establishing and conducting orientation and training programs, including the preparation of project-based, outsourced, and secondment contracts.
•	Enhances the organization’s human resources for outsourcing by planning, implementing, and evaluating employee relations and human resources pool, policies, programs, and practices.
•	Maintains the work structure by updating job requirements and job descriptions for all outsourcing, secondment, and project-based employee positions.
•	Manages outsourced staff pay plan, including checking of timesheets, monitoring of overtime pay and leaves, administration of benefits, directing the processing of benefit claims.
•	Ensures planning, monitoring, and appraisal of outsourcing employee work and coordinates with clients.
•	Ensure legal compliance by monitoring and implementing applicable labor laws and regulations with respect to outsourcing, secondment, and project employees. Represent the organization with labor and/or government agencies.
•	Retains historical human resource records by designing a filing and retrieval system and keeping past and current records.
•	Other duties and responsibilities as may be delegated by manager.
Job Requirement:
	Education/Vocational Training
•	Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field required.
•	A minimum of three years of human resource management experience preferred.
•	Excellent English in term of speaking and writing

	Personal Qualities and Skills
•	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
•	Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and conflict resolution skills.
•	Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
•	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
•	Ability to prioritize tasks and to delegate them when appropriate.
•	Ability to act with integrity, professionalism, and confidentiality.
•	Thorough knowledge of employment-related laws and regulations.
•	Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite or related software.
•	Proficiency with or the ability to quickly learn the organization’s HRIS and talent management systems.

* Benefits:
•	Work Day: Monday -   Friday,Work Hour: 8:00am - 5:30pm
•	OT/ Seniority pay
•	Leaves (Annual leave, Sick Leave, Maternity leave, Special Leave...)
•	Public Holiday ( Follow Cambodian Labor Law)
•	Staff party (Annual, anniversary, Khmer New Year.)
•	NSSF insurance & Private insurance
•	Career development
•	Vocational Training.
* Salary Range:   800-1500 USD
Company Profile: CAMHR.COM was launched in 2009 by CAMHR INFORMATION (CAMBODIA) CO., LTD. as a professional Human Resource Service website. With an aim to become the best provider of human capital solutions in Cambodia, our dedicated team of international background and rich industrial experiences help organizations target and attract their most valuable asset – their people. We use state-of-the-art technology, data-analysis, a comprehensive partner network and superior customer service to match the right people with the right jobs.

job title: ផ្នែក លក់​(ខេត្ត​ កំពត)
position: ផ្នែក លក់​(ខេត្ត​ កំពត)
Job Description:
តួនាទី
•​​ ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងគ្រប់គ្រងការលក់បុគ្គល ដើម្បីសម្រេចបាននូវគោលដៅប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
•​​​ ចុះសួរសុខទុក្ខអតិថិជន និងដេប៉ូនៅក្នុងតំបន់ដើម្បីវាយតម្លៃតម្រូវការ ឬផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្ម
• បង្កើតទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអាជីវករ ឬដេប៉ូដែលមានសក្តានុពល
• ផ្តល់ផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មដែលមានគុណភាពល្អដល់អតិថិជន
• ស្វែងយល់ពីនិន្នាការទីផ្សារដោយប្រមូលព័ត៌មានទីផ្សារ និងការណែនាំទាំងអស់ ដើម្បីកែលម្អការលក់ 
• ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជូនអតិថិជន រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ និងរាយការណ៍ជូនអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង់
Job Requirement:
លក្ខខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស
•​​ កម្រិតវប្បធម៌៖ បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ទី១២ ឬថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ
• ចំណេះដឹងអំពីផលិតផល គ្រឿងសំណង់ ឬទុយោ និងក្បឿងកាន់តែប្រសើរ
• ស្គាល់ពីទីតាំងភូមិសាស្ត្រក្នុងខេត្តច្បាប់ និងអាចបើកបរ
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.
Contact Info: Contact Information Vandy KEO  067 222 949 vandy.keo@chipmong.com #137, Mao Tse Tung Blvd, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang III, Khan Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia 067 222 949

Join DKSH.DKSH’s strength lies in our great diversity of services, industries, clients, products, regions and employees from various nationalities. We are proud of our people: they are the reason we are successful. Our people are the best in the industry. They are passionate about their career growth and about business success. They work as part of an energetic and committed team, positively impacting millions of lives through the products and services we provide. Join us today if you are ready to “Drive growth. Be the Difference.” With DKSH, you will experience a world of learning and development, own your career and take business responsibility and have a positive impact that touches people’s lives.
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Company Profile:
Khmer Times, owned and published by Virtus Media Pte., Ltd., aims to bring its readers the latest news from Cambodia, the region and the world in print and digital formats, with the aim of reporting that news in an unbiased manner.

When Khmer Times started we felt English-language news in Cambodia needed a fresh perspective in the way events are reported in this country.

We publish five days a week, from Monday to Friday and our website is updated not only daily, but as news breaks. The readership of our website also grows daily and stories from our website are now regularly re-posted in media publications around the world, including with the Bangkok Post, Malay Mail Online, The Economist and The Sun. Our aim is to bring the latest news to our readers from a neutral stance.

Writers with opinions to express are also welcome and are published daily on our Opinion and Analysis pages. We do not take sides on any issues and will publish the opinions of people on all sides of politics, business, social issues or hard news. We dare claim our hard-hitting insightful editorials and opinions are keenly followed by the government, lawmakers, diplomats and business people alike.

It is up to the readers to make up their minds and the better informed they are from an objective analysis, the easier it becomes for them to decide which way they lean. We also listen to our readers and publish Letters to the Editor on a variety of subjects, to give readers a chance to have their say.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   +85523881591 jobs@khmertimeskh.com No. 1381, National Road 2, Sangkat Chak Angre Krom, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh +85523881591

- ​​​គ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិស្តុក និង ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍វត្ថុធាតុដើម និងផលិតផលគ្រប់ប្រភេទដែលផលិតបានប្រចាំថ្ងៃ,ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ,ប្រចាំខែ
និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ។
- ធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពរបាយការណ៍ស្តុកផលិតផលគ្រប់ប្រភេទដែលផលិតបានប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ ប្រចាំខែ
ហើយរាយការណ៍ជួនទៅផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ និងប្រធាននាយកដ្ឋានផលិតកម្មរបស់រោងចក្រ អោយបានទៀងទាត់តាមការកំណត់ ។
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍បូកសរុបលំអិតស្តុកប្រចាំខែ, វត្ថុធាតុដើម, ផលិតផលពាក់កណ្តាលសម្រេច, ផលិតផលសម្រេច និង
សមតុល្យស្តុកទាំងបីអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ ហើយរាយការណ៍ជួនផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ និង គណៈគ្រប់គ្រងរោងចក្របានទៀងទាត់តាមការកំណត់ ។
Job Requirement:
- ត្រូវមានអាយុចាប់ពី 25ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ចាប់ពី2ឆ្នាំ ក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងឃ្លាំងទំនិញាទូទៅ
- មានកម្រិតវប្បធម៌កំពុងបន្តបរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឆ្នាំទី៣ ឬ មានតម្លៃស្មើ
- មានកាយសម្បទាគ្រប់គ្រាន់ ,អត្តចរិកស្លូតបូត,​ ស្មោះត្រង់, សុភាពរាបសារ, រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់
- មានការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ និង មានស្មារតីធ្វើការជាក្រុម
- បើចេះនិយាយ,សរសេរ, អាន, ស្តាប់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានខ្លះៗកាន់តែប្រសើរ
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រ ដូចជាៈ Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point, Internet and E-mail ។

Job Description: General Job Functions• Observes all activities of casino guests and staff on the gaming floor, cash desk, electronic games, slot machines and auxiliary areas via the camera system;• Observes, records and reports on all matters relating to the casino and surveillance operations;• Monitors, detect and report on any irregular, suspicious and illegal activities;• Ensures integrity and security of the casino is maintained at all times;• Possesses a thorough knowledge of all table games operating in the casino;• Reviews and resolves gaming disputes and incidents giving the feedback to relevant external customer. Provide quality customer service by ensuring that all matters are resolved in an effective and timely manner. Assist the casino management in the resolving of complaints / disputes;• Writes Surveillance Incident Reports and Events in Trak;• Be responsible for monitoring players’ activity and target staff;• Assists Surveillance Supervisor with basic Surveillance administration;• Informs the Surveillance Supervisor of all actions being performed regarding casino activity;• Ensures that he / she is fully briefed by the out-going operator regarding any incidents or relevant information relating to the previous shift or shifts;• Reports immediately all surveillance equipment malfunctions to the Surveillance Supervisor;• Acquires up to date knowledge of cheat techniques and teams;• Builds trustworthiness with internal customers through professional behaviour;• Observes and analyses non-gaming, gaming and cash handling areas using IT systems in accordance with Standard Operating Procedures;• Assists Surveillance Management in all other tasks / duties required for effective CCTV office operation;
Job Requirement: Job Requirements- At least 1 years of experience at Casino Gaming- Good communication, friendly and welcoming person- Good EnglishBenefits and Working Conditions-Working 8h-Working 6day per week-Public holiday-Annual Bonus-Annual Increment-Seniority pay 2time per year-Salary: $300-$400Other benefits: Meal-, Transportation-, Health Care

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

job title: Auditors (Level : Managers, Senior, Semi-senior and junior)
company_name: MORISONKAK MKA AUDIT- ACCOUNTING CO., LTD
position: Auditors (Level : Managers, Senior, Semi-senior and junior)
Job Description:
We are also recruiting Senior, Semi-senior and junior auditors staff now.

You have acquired auditing, accounting and tax knowledge throughout years of experience OR you are a newly accounting graduate and you want to build a promising career in the reputable Firm,
Job Requirement:
** Please send your CV and cover letter through the following email addresses: mka.key@morisonkak.com or
mka.shuyi@morisonkak.com

** For more information please call Ms Shuyi at: 077 388 282 / 016 884 887
Company Profile:
Morisonkak MKA known as MKA, was established in 1996 by Cambodian nationals coming back to the country following the end of long and painful civil conflicts.

Founder of MKA, Key KAK is a holder of a French State diploma “diplôme d’expertise comptable” and of a Master degree in Economics. He has acquired solid and reliable experiences in managing accounting, auditing and consulting firms in France since 1989.

MKA is the first member of the Kampuchea Institute of Certified Public Accountants and Auditors (KICPAA) which is, in turn member of the International Federation of Accountants (IFAC). Key KAK, expert-comptable, has largely contributed in the inception of this Institute and has served two terms as KICPAA’s President until 2009.

MKA is proud to be currently one of the leading Cambodian accounting, auditing and tax consulting Firm of the country. We began our activities with only two professional staffs and have grown into a progressive CPA, audit and consulting Firm of more than forty employees now.

In 1999, MKA joined the Morison International network, a worldwide grouping of certified public accountants, auditors, lawyers and business advisors ranked top 10 among the international network of its kind, having currently more than 300 offices in more than 65 countries and territories around the world. Morison International head office is located in London, United Kingdom. Visit this webpage for more detail: www.morisoninternational.com.

Although we are member of the Morison International network, we still maintain our local brand name, autonomy and independence as a Cambodian owned and responsive auditing and accounting Firm responsible for our own client fee arrangements, our own delivery of services, and our own privilege of client relationships. As a local firm, decisions are made at the local level, so clients never have to wait for an answer from a remote country made by people with no direct involvement with their account.
Contact Info: Contact Information MKA.Audit  096 817 17 75 / 023 218 994 mka.audit@morisonkak.com No.10, St 500, Psah Doeum Thkov commune  Chamcarmon District, 120112 Phnom Penh Cambodia 096 817 17 75 / 023 218 994

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description:
** Objective
- Ensures safety rules are implemented in the daily job.
- Ensures the process and product related tasks are executed in an effective and efficient way (top performance).
- Improves the key performance indicators (KPI) and production losses, leading to a safe working environment on machine/area.
- Follows all company’s safety rules and food safety rules at all time
- Reports all work related issues to superior during production or maintenance
- Ensures production/maintenance delivers on time in full (OTIF) and packaged product is produced to meet a set of targets in relation to quality (First Time Right), productivity, and cost
- Leads and performs Instruments Inspection/Calibration process.

** Main Responsibility
- Operates the production machines (e.g. PET blow molding machine, filler/capper, carton setup machine, palletizer, RO and other utilities plants).
- Works in line with the defined and implemented safety and food safety standards i.e., 5S, Housekeeping (GMP) and HACCP related to the workplace.
- Makes all the quality checks in line with the standards and procedures on production machines.
- Executes Cleaning, Inspection, Lubrication and Tightening (CILT) of all machines and equipment.
- Executes repair and maintenance according to Maintenance Procedure.
- Follows superior’s instructions to make sure that packaged product is produced to meet a set of targets in relation to quality (i.e. First Time Right), productivity, and cost
- Mentors and trains newcomer.
- Covers for production and engineering manager during holidays/vacation.
- Supports the improvement of basic standards for safety, process, and quality and ensures compliance.
- Implements systematic breakdown analysis and reduction system (RCFA/BDA).
- Monitors impact of Planned Maintenance (PM) activities (MTBF, MTBS, MTBA)
Job Requirement:
- Minimum Bachelor degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering and/or similar.
- 1 year Production or Maintenance experience preferably in food and beverages
- General knowledge of maintenance engineering processes; i.e. have basic knowledge of cost driver and performance killer analysis, Equipment criticality ranking, preventive maintenance, critical spare parts selection, item segmentation & inventory management, asset performance management.
- Good knowledge of maintenance operations and CMMS (i.e. asset master data key-user and becoming/training for asset master data expert).
- Lean / 6 Sigma, etc.

** Salary & other Benefit
- Salary: Negotiation
- Working hour: Mon-Sat (Half)
- Day Off: Sunday
- Public Holiday & Annual Leave is Complied with labor law
- Seniority Pay & Annual Bonus
- Training & Development
- Insurance

- Process monthly claim promotion from Sub Distributor
- Setting up, announce and follow-up monthly promotion with Sales Admin in provinces after approval from Trade Marketing.

Job Description:

- Responsible for scheduled visit to assigned GT & MT channel accounts, territory, negotiating Sales Order & Payment Terms, distributing SKUs assortment to outlets, conducting merchandising activities and execute trade programs and activities to achieve the monthly targets and KPIs in the assigned territory.
- Managing MT & GT accounts to follow agreed process and agreement and developing and training Sales Team to achieve KPIs and targets.

- Working closely, training and follow up with Salesmen to ensure team achieve sales target and distribution objectives, planogram display, merchandising and store promotions.

- Ensure budget and time requirements are met

Job Description:
** Job Objective
Train an accounts payable team and oversees reports regarding cash flow; ensures correct payments are made in a timely manner. Develops guidelines for proper handling and coding of invoices to maintain general ledger expense account. Analyzes expense reports and other invoices for accuracy and eligibility for payment.

** Main Duties and Responsibilities
- Maintains accounts payable functions such as reviews and check all invoices for appropriate documentations and posting to the accounting system with proper filling and maintains records.
- Provides timely and accurate payment processing of accounts payable checks.
- Maintains check register, processes voids/reversals and approves all transactions, including check writes and positive pay transmissions
- Review the reconciliation between suppliers’ statement of accounts and internal records.
- Key in all financial transactions into accounting system with proper supporting documents.
- Prepares payment checks and obtains authorizations.
- Prepare reimbursements, advance payments, accrue expenses, deposit and other account current asset, and get necessary approval and process payments.
- Support day-to-day operations relating to Banking activities and fund transfers and prepare Bank and Cash expenditure Reconcile.
- Ensures monthly closing schedules related to accounts payable are met by finishing critical tasks ahead of deadlines and by supporting controller in order to consistently issue timely financial statements.
- Coordinate and deal with internal & external auditors.
- Performs other duties as assigned based on company needs.

- A Bachelor degree in Finance, Accounting or Business
Administration
- Three years’ experience
- Positive attitude, Critical thinking, and Leadership skills
- Proficient in accounting software and Microsoft Office Suite or related software.

- Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.

Job Description:
** Job Objective
The fixed asset accountant position is accountable for recording the cost of newly-acquired fixed assets (both tangible and intangible), tracking existing fixed assets, recording depreciation, and accounting for the disposition of fixed assets. Create and monitor a system of controls, procedures, and forms for the recordation of fixed assets.

** Main Duties and Responsibilities
- Ensure the development of and implement policies, systems and procedures to identify, record, value and depreciate account.
- Ensure consolidation of fixed asset information to enable a complete and accurate record of the identification, location and value of fixed assets.
- Preparing the reports required to monitor and provide information on the asset performance and capital expenditure.
- Carryout capital expenditure reconciliation to determine assets to be capitalized in a timely manner and amounts to be written off.
- Reporting utilizing the current asset management system
- Monitor assets ordering, purchasing, receiving, storing and distributing transactions
- Registering the assets ledger and managing the fixed assets with fixed assets management system.
- Responsible for fixed assets labelling & Counting
- Track assets transfer and recording.
- Prepare flow for control Fixed Asset
Job Requirement:
- A Bachelor degree in Finance, Accounting or Business
Administration
- Two years’ experience
- Positive attitude, Critical thinking, and Leadership skills 
- Proficient in accounting software and Microsoft Office Suite or related software.
- Excellent supervisory and analytical skills.
- Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.

Job Description:
** Objective
As Logistic Assistant you need to receiving and unpacking parcels, completing relevant documentation, and dispatching stock. Record and report breakages, major spills, and contaminations to the Warehouse Manager. Last but least to Pay close attention to the movement of stock to avoid losses

** Main Responsibility
- Receive & unload materials from the trucks to the warehouse;
- Coordinate and arrange the transferring of materials to production lines and bring Finish Good to store in Warehouse 
- Unpacking items and arranging these on shelves, if needed.
- Manage the Loading of finished goods onto the trucks;
- Manage and control all factory stocks (FIFO, safety level)
- Receiving, processing, labeling, and storing incoming stock.
- Maintaining clear records on all inventory and stock.
- Inspecting all stock for damages and keeping records of damages.
- Organizing the warehouse space.
- Preparing orders for shipment.
- Recording exact arrival and departure times for shipments.
- Operating stock management tools; for example, a forklift.
- Counting stock and keeping inventory records.
- Manage distribution/ transportation
- Handle and manage forklift trucks & vehicles
- Receiving and checking deliveries to ensure that the correct amount and type of stock is delivered.
- Signing delivery notes upon receipt of shipments.
- Ensuring that the facility remains clean, sanitary, and well-organized.
- Reporting all breakages and spills.
Job Requirement:
- High school diploma or equivalent.
- Male or Female.
- Prior experience as a logistics assistant at a medium or large warehouse.
- Strong communication, memorization, and teamwork skills.
- Hard working and self-motivated person, honest, reliable, loyal, responsible and very good team work;
- Able to work under pressure, Able to work independently;
- Has knowledge of Microsoft office, Computer , Word & Excel;
- Good organizational and investigative abilities.
- Capacity to perform your duties diligently, particularly during stressful periods.

Job Description:

Processing accounting receivables and incoming payments in compliance with financial policies and procedures and also performing day to day financial transactions, including verifying, classifying, computing, posting and recording accounts receivables data.

Job Description:
** Objective
As a Demand Planner you need handle a supply chain management process that forecasts demand for products to ensure they can be available and delivered for customers. The goal is to hit a balance between having sufficient inventory levels to meet customer needs without having a surplus and to ensure that these levels are consistently met in a cost-effective manner.

** Main Duties & Responsibility
- Tracking product inventory 
- Maintaining knowledge of and understanding of current and future trends
- Generating progress reports and presentations
- Identifying forecast changes
- Collecting data from internal and external sources on factors known to affect demand 
- Analyzing sales, stock, and other data statistics
- Reviewing historical sales trends
- Modeling the data to forecast future demand
- Obtaining information on occurrences that could impact demand like promotions and production delays
- Gathering updates on vendors, distributors, sales, and other stakeholders that can affect demand
- Developing demand forecasts at multiple levels of aggregation for multiple time horizons
- Coordinating cross-functional research activities to reconcile significant variances
- Interacting with sales, marketing, & finance to understand demand forecast drivers
- Using and maintaining the demand planning software 
- Providing input to the supply planning organization in developing inventory strategies on existing items, new products, and product phase-outs
- Refining systems and methods to improve forecasts in order to better anticipate customer needs
Job Requirement:
- BA in Business Administration/Supply Chain/ Logistic or related filed
- Experience with procurement, demand planning, replenishment; reduce inventory efficiency.
- Knowledge of sale forecasting & product segmentation
- Forecasting
- SAP & ERP
- Vendor management
- Procurement
- Inventory management
- Supply chain management
- Strong computer skills with proficiency in tools such as Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Power point, Word)
- Excellent organizational skills
- Attention to detail
- Strong written and verbal communication skills
- Ability to work with others
- Analysis and problem-solving skills such as the ability to question, accurately identify a need, and present an effective solution
- Time management skills

** Salary & other Benefit

- Working hour: Mon-Sat (Half)

Job Description:

As a Graphic Designer and Video Editor you need to be creative in providing best in class graphics design for our sales & marketing tool. You will be key person to develop our POSMs design, brand design, social media graphics design. You will need to support digital marketing and trade marketing team for any creative design art work.

Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effect, Adobe Premier. Adobe suite is a plus.

Job Description:
** PURPOSE OF THE JOB
An Accounts Receivable Supervisor generates revenue for the firm by initiating invoices, resolving missing or outstanding payments, supervising staffs and updating the financial records. The job description for accounts receivable supervisor includes – ensuring complete accounts receivable accountability, training other staffs, forecasting cash for financial planning, controlling bank remittances, monitoring and coordinating the sales orders, posting periodical accounting records, adhering to internal accounting controls and maintaining financial security.

** Main Duties and Responsibilities
- Develop professionals for account receivable teams and design performance indicators.
- Manage collection activities such as negotiating with past-due accounts, referring account to collection agencies, and sending follow-ups
- Update receivables by monitoring and coordinating all processing performed on orders that are delivered daily including transactions such as bank remittances
- Check all A/R Collection on Invoice every month
- Communicate and explain work procedures to subordinates
- Other operation posting in system
- Collects accounts by contacting customers referred by clerks; investigating circumstances of non-payment; negotiating and resolving conflicts
- Verify actual Cash collect with Income Statement
- Verify stock out with daily Invoices
- Posting Debit Note and Credit Note in system
- Posting Receipt from seller into system
- Check Credit Report distributor to collect AR
- Check out Invoices and daily cash collection, if necessary, further
- Reporting Daily Bank and Cash on Hand
- Bank Reconciliation every month (Income)
- Assist in the financial planning with the help of cash forecasting
- Direct and lead the work of others in the department
- Maintain company confidentiality at all times
Job Requirement:
- A Bachelor degree in Finance, Accounting or Business Administration
- Three years’ experience
- Positive attitude, Critical thinking, and Leadership skills
- English language proficiency
- Computer skills (MS Office and Accounting Software)

- Salary: Negotiation
- Working hour: Mon-Sat (Half)

Job Description:
** Objective
Ensuring the reliability and availability of all production and utilities equipment having a long term focus and providing input to planning and execution of production/
maintenance plans, keeping health and safety as a priority.
Leads continuous improvement using KPI- and improvement tools (5S, Kaizen, RCFA).

** Job Responsibility
- Lead the Production/Engineering Mechanical & Electrical Technicians and Facilities Team (Welder & Fitter);
- To assist Production and Engineering Manager and co-ordinate/plans resources on the Production Lines to ensure that packaged product is produced to meet a set of targets in relation to quality, productivity, and cost Supports Production & Engineering manager (PEM) in planning day-to-day production, initiating and driving the basic
maintenance processes, restoring assets to basic condition (fit for operation at all times)
- Ensures safe working in production and maintenance (is accountable).
- Leads Safety diagnostics based in safety reports and inspections.
- Ensures production/maintenance delivers on time in full (OTIF) and packaged product is produced to meet a set of targets in relation to quality, productivity, and cost
- Leads and performs Instruments Inspection/Calibration process.
- Plans staffing and resources to the appropriate production and maintenance activities and monitors the execution and progress of the production planning, including productivity, priority setting and daily adjustments/instructions
- Informs production & engineering manager of major breakdowns.
- Conducts RCFA or BDA analysis of major breakdown and establish PDCA to close the loop.
- Develops training materials, operation SOP and provides training to all technical staff.
- Manages and organizes asset master data, (preferably) within the CMMS. Sets up the asset breakdown structure down to required maintainable item level, defines all Planned Maintenance tasks and inventory items in CMMS according to the master data standards. Implements management system.
- Monitors asset performance (OEE or line availability). Responsible for plant availability (uptime).
- Introduces basic maintenance plans on all equipment on statutory, OEM or Global Maintenance Standards.
- Sets up basic spare part segmentation and defines critical spares.
- Collects and manages asset drawings, documents, permits (licenses), warranties.
Job Requirement:
- Minimum Bachelor degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering and/or similar.
- 2 - 5 years Production or Maintenance experience and
managing of people preferably in food and beverages
- Proven track record in people management (getting things done within a group/team).
- Minimum of 2 years experience & knowledge of maintenance (engineering) and/or production operations and ability to setup and drive (strategic) improvement initiatives and manage changes from the shop floor within the department.
- General knowledge of maintenance engineering processes; i.e. have basic knowledge of cost driver and performance killer analysis, Equipment criticality ranking, preventive maintenance, critical spare parts selection, item segmentation & inventory management, asset performance management.
- Good knowledge of maintenance operations and CMMS (i.e. asset master data key-user and becoming/training for asset master data expert).
- Excellent technical maintenance analysis, production planning and reporting skills.
- People management and leadership.
- Ability to organize and provide training to the technical teams i.e., new recruits.
- Lean / 6 Sigma, etc.

** Salary & other Benefit
- Salary: Negotiation
- Working hour: Mon-Sat (Half)
- Day Off: Sunday

- Seniority Pay & Annual Bonus
- Training & Development
