Job Description:
** Main Duties and Responsibilities
The Supply Chain & Demand Planning Manager is responsible for oversee the purchase of specific equipment relating to the bottling and transport of mineral water. To ensure the inventory and transport shipments to the warehouse, consumers or wholesalers in a safe environment. He/She oversees receiving goods, warehousing, distribution and maintenance operations. The duty includes analyzing logistics data, negotiating business relationships and communicating with suppliers and distributors.

** Job Requirements
- Manage the warehouse and the supply chain in compliance with company’s policies and SOP
- Create supply chain management strategies that increase efficiency and speed.
- Responsible to purchase specific equipment relating to the bottling and transport of mineral water.
- Oversee the reception, the warehousing, the distribution and the maintenance
operations in a safe environment.
- Setup the layout of the warehouse and ensure that efficient space is utilized to store the product.
- Prepare long-term schedules to ensure that the company has enough stock at anytime to meet demand.
- Manage stock control and reconcile with data storage system.
- Collaborate on how production, manufacturing and distribution process works together.
- Implement processes to reduce waste and implement costs control.
- Initiate, coordinate and enforce optimal operational policies by following HACCP procedures.
- Maintain standards of health and safety, hygiene and security at all times. Train the staff accordingly.
- Recruit, coach and motivate employees. Train and mentor employees, including reinforcement of safety guidelines.
- Collaborate with Production Dpt. and QC/QA Dpt. to avoid operational gaps.
- Handle communications and negotiations with suppliers and clients (whole sellers, retailers...)
- Attend meetings, submit reports, keep accurate documentation and analyze data to improve the efficiency of the Department.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree and proven expertise in Warehouse , Supply
chain , demand management procedures and best practices.
- Hands on experience with warehouse management software and databases.
- Hands on experience with purchasing processes and costs control.
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office, Word, Excel
- Understanding of procedural best practices in supply chain
management and warehousing management.
- Good knowledge of Health & Safety regulations.
- Leadership skills and ability manage staff.
- Strong decision making and problem solving skills; planning and organizational skills.
- Ability to work well under pressure in fast-paced environment.
- Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines.

Job Description: -Support manager in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources-Implement action plans (e.g. make regular calls/visits, take orders, etc.) to achieve sales targets for assigned businesses/territories-Track self/team progress against key performance indicators and sales plans. Prioritize and review daily sales activities performed-Execute sales activities for assigned businesses/territories, including product portfolios and marketing plan introductions, order taking, marketing display set-ups and in-store merchandising-Prepare quotation/tender prices, delivery and commercial terms, in accordance with company policies-Report on the activities and products of the competitors via inputs to the competition reports-Record sales data for reporting and tracking purposes. Maintain relevant customer data in appropriate customer relationship management databases
Job Requirement: -Demonstrate basic knowledge and understanding of the industry/market/competitors/customers-Demonstrate basic knowledge in assigned territories/products/services and strong selling skills-Demonstrate strong communication and negotiation skills-Demonstrate basic research and analytical skills-Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)-Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spoken-Soft skills: Good communication, Honesty-Diploma or professional qualification in Business Studies/Marketing/Economics or a related discipline-Work experience: Up to two years' experience in a similar role
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root
Contact Info: Contact Information Hok Rozanak HR Manager 093200278 jobs.kh@dksh.com No. 797, Corner Preah Monivong Boulevard and Street 484, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 093200278

Job Description:
HR Managers are HR professionals who work closely with an organization’s senior leaders in order to develop an HR agenda that closely supports the overall aims of the organization by acting as single of contact for internal clients. This role is focused on challenging HR goals, project management, HR project and initiatives, change management project, succession plans, cross-functional development management, and HR process in a full compliance with legal and regulatory framework. 

Human Resources

To be Strategic partner by working with line managers to institute and manage a process that creates an organization to meet the business requirement 

- Acting as a single point of contact for internal clients and keeps track of all requests and open items on the agenda and advisory roles to business unit related to HR
- Help to set the goals and objectives of Human Resources to reflect the real needs of the company
- Initiate and drive the HR agenda for specific business division to support operation 
- Work closely with HR back office to manage all aspects of HR Service to support assigned business division, including talent acquisition, Training, Compensation and employee relation	
- Work with potential partnership, and community, school for future recruitment channel 
- In charge of facilitating performance management review for assigned business and ensure that staffs have performance objective
- Succession and talent planning project or talent spotting 
- Employee engagement survey implementation & follow up/build an engaged workforce 
- Work closely with HR back office to initiated the HR agenda, such career path, IDP and so on
- Initiate the HR strategy to maintain or add value to core competency of company 
- Translate organizational commercial objective into HR initiatives 
- leads HR processes for the internal clients as all employees are hired, performance management is smoothly running, succession plans developed and the top talents are identified
- Responsible for employee relation, internal conflict and grievance
- Other tasks assigned by line manager

-	Sales/Marketing

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Join DKSH.DKSH’s strength lies in our great diversity of services, industries, clients, products, regions and employees from various nationalities. We are proud of our people: they are the reason we are successful. Our people are the best in the industry. They are passionate about their career growth and about business success. Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Job Description: The main purpose of the "Supervisor, Call Center" is responsible for receiving customer incoming call and responds to customer inquiries and complaints/issues through phone by providing customers with an easy and friendly banking experience through the identification and meeting their transactional needs. This position is required for night shift supports for banking product/service for efficiency & effectiveness operation.Location : Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Develop objectives for the call center’s day-to-day activities.Develop sales and service strategies to guarantee success and growth..Conduct effective resource planning to maximize the productivity of resources (people, technology etc.).Monitor and improve ordering, telephone handling and other procedures.Evaluate performance with key metrics (accuracy, call-waiting time etc.).Routes calls to appropriate resource.Complete Call Logs.Process Pin counter Reset, Card status change, Card validation, block, unblock card follow customer call request.Support Cardholder on Card Limit Adjustment.Monitor card activities and authorization (ATM, POS & VISA card).Follow up & confirm with customer on suspicious and high-risk relevant transaction VISA Card & POS transaction.Report card to Visa Exception system for Lost/Stolen/Fraud Cards..Support Cardholder and Merchant troubleshooting.Prompt response to internal and external customers’ enquiries over the phone..Solve customer complaint and problem or refer them to appropriate department for solution..Do/Telephone marketing relate to Deposit, Loan Product and Digital Products.Produce daily, monthly, quarterly reports.Performed other tasks assigned by supervisor or management.
Job Requirement: .Bachelor degree in Finance and Banking or equivalent professional qualifications..Creative, dynamic, flexible, self-direct and self-motivated team player and able to use Email..Good communication & interpersonal skills and Computer literacy..Good command of English, other foreign languages is a plus..Experience in Card Scheme is a plus..Required for night shift, weekends.

Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Having been operating for more than 26 years with MDI status in the market, with its rapidly success, Hattha Bank has transformed its status from MDI to commercial bank in 2020, and continue providing diversified financial services to individual and SME businesses; and jump into retail consumer financial market and corporate customer in urbanities.

Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

Job Description:
- Collect and follow-up all card applications from frontline personnel (CSA, RM as such) to process card issuance.
- Verify valid information for card/iBanking application according to internal process to prevent any fraud as well as to strengthen compliance.
- Scan and input card application in share drive for Customer Service Team to keep them informed of the application.
- Follow up and follow through if there is any error or pending files from related stakeholders to meet with due date.
- Handover card to customer and verify customer’s information (NID, Passport, Signature, Picture, etc…) to eliminate errors and ensure accuracy and timely manner of the card delivery.
- Accept physical card, pin code, iBanking and maintain confidentiality of the above-mentioned items to avoid any financial risks.
- Properly keep, store and manage stock control of card/iBanking materials to avoid any losses or damage of the materials.
- Receive captured card from branch key authorized person or Customer Service Department (CSD) and control captured card stock to ensure proper keeping of it.
- Prepare acceptance form and supporting document related to captured card (if required), send to CSD and forward to BOO in order to facilitate the customer with the return of accessible and functional card.
- Verify and check log delivery with actual card & iBanking and captured card to keep track on all delivery.
- Handle customer’s complaints with the card pickup and escalate the issues to higher authority if needed.
- Check the card/iBanking close card report from CSD in order to destroy them by complying with internal process and due dates for the purpose of efficient card/iBanking stock management.
- Provide card maintenance services to customers by preparing relevant documents and working closely with authorized party to ensure updated customers’ information.
Job Requirement:
- High school diploma or bachelor’s degree in finance and banking, accounting or any relevant field.
- Minimum one year of working experiences in banking and financial services industry.
- Basic understanding of the bank branch operations, rules and regulations, laws, and risk management.
- Good customer services skills.
- Good organizing, classifying, filing and recording skills.
- Ability to use and communicate in both Khmer and English.
- Basic Microsoft Office and Bank’s software.
- Good math skills and ability to spot numerical errors.
- Good team work, problem solving, negotiation and interpersonal skill.
- Strong dedication to accuracy and efficiency.

How to apply
Interested and qualified applicants should submit your updated Cover Letter and CV stating the position applied for with your current photo (4x6) through recruitment@ababank.com.

Job Description:
** Job Description
Card Processing Officer is responsible for Settlement of Master card, Visa Card, and Union Pay International, crediting and holding merchant transactions, controlling and reimbursing credit card, delivering credit card information to cardholder.

** Location
Head Office, Phnom Penh (1 post)

** Duties and Responsibilities
- Crediting and holding merchant transactions.
- Controlling and reimbursing credit card.
- Delivering credit card information to cardholder.
- ATM cash loading and adjustment.  
- Processing card clearing transactions.
- Settlement of Master card, Visa Card, and Union Pay International.
- Assisting in charge back flow.
- Processing Key-In for merchant transactions.
- EDC Settlement.
- Solving customer’s dispute transactions and merchant holder problems.
- Incoming and Outgoing file to/from intra-banks.
- Being a Trainer for staffs’ training.
- Annual fee charge of Master Card and Visa Card.
- Process Purchase order Pincode/Pinless from operators.
- Settle sold Pincode/Pinless/bill payment to operators.
- Collect payment from PayGo on sold prepaid products.
- Settle sold pinless by ABA to PayGo and reverse any declined top-up to customers.
- Resolve complaint related to error in top-up or bill payment.
- Deposit Merchant transactions.
- Monitor credit card settlement.
- Verify and post necessary adjustment for ATMs’ GL when Teller loads new cash Doing.
- Post billing transactions to cardholder accounts.
- Release block for unbilled transactions.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in business, communications, computer science, IT or equivalent work or educational experience.
2 to 3 years experience in Card operations.
- Good interpersonal skills and communications skills (oral and written) in English language.
- Willing to learn new things.
- Good conceptual, organizational, analytical, and problem solving skills.
- Good project management skills.
- Ability to collect operational data, establish facts and draw valid conclusions as well as formulate ideas and recommendations.
- Analytic, patient, attention and responsible.
- Able to work under pressure.

How to apply
Interested and qualified applicants should submit only your updated covering letter and CV stating the position you apply for with current photo (4x6) via application below.

- Backup Video and picture to Management as per request.
Site Survey installation plan for new branch and renovation building.
- Daily checking CCTV Camera Quality and working status.
Keep the management information system up to date and produce monthly/quarterly performance reports as required.

Job Description:
** Job Description
S/he is responsible for solving any sorts of dispute occurring on debit or credit cards of the customers, merchants, and ATM terminals. Besides, s/he has to deal with embossing cards and other tasks assigned by manager.

** Location
Head Office, Phnom Penh

** Duties and Responsibilities
- Check daily suspicious card transactions and notify cardholder(s) about those suspicious transactions in a timely manner.
- Follow up with Client Service Advisor or contact customer directly so as to inform them about dispute resolution cycle or ask for information and supporting documentation
- Control and monitor embossers and printers in terms of status, operation, connection and other support.
- Report immediately on any urgent case(s) which needs to be fixed to comply with bank operation or fulfill customer needs.
- Learn and Adapt to Operating Regulations set by each International Payment System.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Banking and Finance, English literature, or equivalence.
- Knowledge of banking operation, e-banking features and components.
- Basic knowledge of information technology.
- Good interpersonal skills and communications skills.
- Good at written and spoken English language.
- Good conceptual, organizational, analytical, and problem solving abilities.
- Strong abilities to work as a team member.
- Ability to work independently and have participative involvement in developing new initiatives.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description: * Strategy and Planning- Initiate, define, plan, communicate and follow up company's   business strategy regarding Private Banking business in order   to ensure company’s long-term viability and market share.- Develop an appropriate marketing plan with marketing team to   efficiently and effectively achieve goals and objectives   through design and implement workable and innovative   solutions for client’s needs.- Keep abreast of latest market trend, analyze customers'   behavior, key financial drivers and competitors'' strategy to   sustain a continuous service growth.* Customer Acquisition & Revenue Target- Present and provide highly professional consultations to   target corporate clients and HNWI to address their demands   and match with the Bank’s products and services.- Discuss credit-related issues and loan packaging to provide   sound financial advice and tailored solutions for the clients   as well as to take the opportunity to cross-sell other   banking products.- Closely monitor on recommended/processed loan for timely   repayment and to ensure Portfolio at Risk remains within   acceptable level.- Solicit, build and maintain new and existing local   corporate/HNW individual clients in accordance with the   guidelines stated in the Commercial Banking policies and   procedures to ensure sustainable and secure deposit and loan   portfolios and expending scope to investment and other   products/services as cross-selling.* Customer Relationship Management- Make regular site visits to existing clients to determine the   actual conditions of the business and loan collateral whether   it should remain the same or be downgraded as well as to   develop relationship with clients as part of retention   strategies.- Act as liaison between clients and internal operations team   to timely and effectively understand and provide all types of   banking products including but not limited to deposits,   loans, trade finances and remittance for the clients.- Handle complex clients’ issues or complaints to find an   amicable solution for all and process to higher authority if   needed.* Project Management & Process Improvement- Lead projects on developing and launching new   initiatives/services and creating new service features and   process regarding Private Banking as needed to improve/gain   market penetration/share.- Coordinate with different departments, including Operations,   Finance & IT in streamlining processes, Marketing to drive   business growth and Risk and Compliance in ensuring adherence   of relevant policies and guidelines.* Staff Management- Supervise staff in daily tasks, operations and quality   control.- Coordinate available resources for maximum outcomes.- Act as a role model within the team to question, listen and   give actionable feedback carefully in order to create a   productive work atmosphere towards “speak up culture”.
Job Requirement: - BA in Business, Economics, Accounting, Banking or Finance- Minimum 3 years' experience in Sales & Customers or Partners   Relationship Management / Business Analysis / Project   Management / Transformation / Digital , preferably gained in   Banking or Financial Services industry or consultancy and in   particular in Corporate, Retail Banking, Banking and Cash   Management, Lending / Investment is a plus- Good in spoken / written English and in another foreign   language is a plus- Strong customer/partner relationship, customer services and   deal/project structuring/implementation- Good analytical, communication and interpersonal skills- Having high level of confidentiality, integrity and business   ethic

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment and Job Management  092 333 020 / 070 700 123 jobs@amret.com.kh #80, Street 315, Sangkat Boeung Kak2, Khan Toul Kok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 092 333 020 / 070 700 123

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description:
I.	Position Summary:

HR & Admin Executive (HRE) manages and directs all human resources (HR) and Admin tasks for an organization or company. Additional HR Executive responsibilities include directing and overseeing the hiring, training, and dismissal processes and administering and monitoring benefit programs.

II. Duties and Main Responsibilities: 
• Supporting with recruitment, job announcements with agencies, compiling Candidate CVs for GM or other Senior Management’s reviews and screening.
• Identifying rich recruitment sources and utilizing the full recruitment potential of the organization.
• Preparing documents for interview process and scheduling, keeping candidate evaluation forms, contacting candidates for the job offers and maintaining personal files.
• Preparing Employment Contracts, Letter of Job Offers, Letter of Probationary Confirmation or Failure, Letter of Promotions/ Salary Increments…etc.
• Preparing List of Probationary Employee, new hire report, resignation, and termination reports.
• Updating monthly Master List of Employees including old, new, resigned, walk-out and terminated.
• Supporting GM for staff evaluations during probationary period, evaluations in 6-month time and performance appraisal at year end.
• Supporting GM for monthly and yearly HR Budgeting for recruitments, training and development, staff parties and HR external events for company branding and job fairs.
• Tracking and collecting monthly employee attendances either from Fingerprint scanners and attendance sheet given to the people at all project sites, collecting leaves and overtime records and preparing supporting documents to administer payroll process to Finance and Accounting.
• Maintaining and regularly updating master database (personal file, personal database...etc.) of each employee.
• Promoting job announcements and HR marketing for company branding in the Company’s Facebook, LinkedIn, and other social media networks if any.
• Supporting Company for CSR activities, welfare activities, community initiative programs.
• Setting simple and performance driven compensation strategies and policies to be consulted with GM.
• Liaising with all government agencies to ensure adherence to compliance.
• Conducting employee orientation and facilitating newcomers joining formalities.
• Acting as the first point of contact for HR-related queries from employees and external partners and resolving grievances or queries that any of the employees have.
• Conducting exit interviews for employees and recording them accordingly.
• Engaging with employees on regular basis to understand the motivation levels of people in the Company.
• Assist payroll by providing relevant employee information (e.g. leaves of absence, sick days and work schedules, overtimes, resignations, salary increments…etc.).
• Performing other tasks as assigned by superior.
• In-charge of all Admin related task and oversee all office matters.

III. Reports to be produced
• Monthly Employee Consensus/Master List of Employees.
• Monthly New Hiring Report & Probation List Update.
• Interview Plan & Schedule.
• Resignation, Termination and Walk-Out Report.
• Monthly Fingerprint Attendance, Payroll, OT, and Deduction Report.
• Personal Profile Update.
• Admin report
Job Requirement:
IV. Job Requirement
• Degree in Human Resources or related field.
• Minimum 5 years’ Human Resources experience in similar role. 
• Experience with Human Resources metrics.
• In-depth knowledge of employment law. 
• Knowledge of HR systems.
• Excellent communications and leadership skills.
• Strong influencing and negotiating skills.
• People oriented and results driven.
• Can-do attitude.
Company Profile:
Established in the early 1990s, UC has more than 10 years of experience in the construction industries. Stared out in building row shop house in Olympic Market, UC has evolved and move on to build many famous Villas in Boung Keng Kang District. With growing construction industry, UC gets more involved and cooperation with foreign investors and work closely with the government to help build a more vibrant city.
In The year 2000, UC has expanded into the market in Siem Reap building 5 Star Hotels equipped with large Spacious function halls, Khmer style design restaurants and exquisite swimming pools. At the same time, UC also constructed Bopha Angkor Restaurant with a massive area of 4000sqm. by mixing Khmer style Architecture exterior with modern classical interior. Bopha Angkor is highly well known for its Glass roof top design which allows natural light into the building to support the ever growing vast palm trees inside.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

company_name: ជាង បាក់ វណ្ណ ហុង
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
ជំនួយការជំនួយការប្រធានក្រុមហ៊ុន មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព និងតាមដានរបាយការណ៍ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធ ព្រមទាំងបង្កើតទម្រង់ផ្សេងៗតាមតម្រូវការរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់។

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
• Update និងតាមដានរបាយការណ៍លំហូរសាច់ប្រាក់ ភ្នំពេញ បាត់ដំបង និងសៀមរាប
• Update របាយការណ៍ផែនការប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់ផ្នែកលក់, ទីផ្សារ និងក្រុមជំនួយការអគ្គនាយិកា
• Update របាយការណ៍ស៊ីអាស៊ីតប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
• Update និងការងារចាំបាច់ជាក់ស្តែង
• បង្កើតទម្រង់ផ្សេងៗតាមតម្រូវការរបស់ប្រធានក្រុមហ៊ុន
• សរុបរបាយការណ៍ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុប្រចាំខែ 
- លំហូរសាច់ប្រាក់ទាំង៣សាខា
- របាយការណ៍ OB
- របាយការណ៍ A/R ទាំង៣សាខា
• Follow up របាយការណ៍សង្ខេបផែនការប្រចាំថ្ងៃរៀងរាលខែ
• Follow up និង Update របាយការណ៍
- ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុទាំង៣សាខា
- បញ្ជាទិញ
- ព័ត៌មានវិទ្យា
- លក់ (ច័ន្ទ បូរមី, ផ្នែកលក់គ្រឿងមានស្រាប់, ផ្នែកគ្រឿងកុម្ម៉ង់), លក់ទាំងពីរសាខា
- ទីផ្សារ
• ធានាអោយបាននូវការរក្សាទុកទិន្នន័យ និងក្រដាសស្នាមដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងមានសុវត្ថិភាព
• កូពី ស្កេន និងរត់ឯកសារ 
• បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការណែនាំរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង

Occasional Duties (ភារកិច្ចម្តងម្កាល):
• រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ និងលិខិតផ្សេងៗ
• ចុះត្រួតពិនិត្យការងារជាក់ស្តែងតាមការចង់បានរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់
Job Requirement:
Qualification (គុណវុឌ្ឍិដែលត្រូវការ):
• កម្រិតសិក្សាបរិញ្ញាបត្រ គណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សេដ្ឋកិច្ច ធនាគារ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើរ
• មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធយ៉ាងតិច២ឆ្នាំ

Skill (ជំនាញ):
• អាចប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រ (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Internet, Email)
• មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេស (អាចស្តាប់ សរសេរ បង្គួរ)
• ចេះពីរបៀបទុកដាក់ឯកសារ
• មានសមត្ថភាពធ្វើរបាយកាណ៍

Physical Fitness (កាយសម្បទា):
• មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន
• ស្មារតីវាងវៃ រហ័សរហួន

Personal Characteristics (បុគ្គលិកលក្ខិណៈផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន):
• ម៉ត់ចត់ និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ
• មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ  និងការសហការល្អ
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងទំនុកចិត្ត 
• តស៊ូព្យាយាម និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់
• ច្បាស់លាស់ និងគោរពពេលវេលា
• ចេះបត់បែន

Anti-bribery and Anti-corruption, HSE…)- Other tasks assigned by manager

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description: • Prepares selection of Project Consultants• Briefs all Consultants on the client’s requirements and coordinates with the Lead Consultant and his team on the Design and other technical matters.• Conducts Client-Consultant Meetings and ensures flow of documentation/information is controlled.• Prepares the Development Schedule for the Project.• Reviews with Consultant QS on Cost Plans for Project with updates.• Liaises with Consultants on the provision of documents for the various submissions to authorities to ensure timely approval according to schedule.• Coordinates with Consultants to ensure calling and the award of tenders for various packages is done according to schedule and with the proper documentations and monitor the tendering process and tendering evaluation.• Establishes the contract administration procedures.• Prepares the Project Quality Plan and disseminates to Consultants, Contractors and Supervising Staff.• Monitors the Contractors ‘submissions and comments/replies by Construction Manager/Consultants• Ensures various critical milestones are incorporated in the Contractors’ programmes and are executed accordingly and to proper procedures.• Keeps track of the issued and potential variation orders and other controls to ensure that the project completes within budget.• Checks all payment claims by contractors and recommends for approval/payment.• Prepares monthly reports on site progress and other pertinent issues to the Employer.• Monitors various quality/safety control measures on site. Keeps tracks that all regulatory requirements to be adhered to by Contractors are followed.• Conducts regular meetings with Contractors on progress and other matters.• Ensures all procedures of handing over are complied with according to authorities and the Client’s requirements.• Monitors feedback on defects after handing over and the execution of the rectification works to address the complaints/defects.

job title: បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈ ឧបករណ៏ និង សេវាកម្ម ($300-$450)
company_name: ជាង បាក់ វណ្ណ ហុង
position: បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈ ឧបករណ៏ និង សេវាកម្ម ($300-$450)
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈ ឧបករណ៏ និង សេវាកម្ម មានតួនាទីជួយសម្រួលការងារក្នុងផ្នែកដូចជា៖
- ​ធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងធ្វើការវិភាគសំណើពីអ្នកស្នើរសុំ
- ​វិភាគទីផ្សារ និងស្វែងរកអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ 
-​ ប្រៀបធៀប និងវិភាគសំនើរដែលបានពីអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់
-​ ចរចារកិច្ចសន្យាព្រមព្រៀងតម្លៃ និងធ្វើការបញ្ជាទិញ
-​ តាមដានលើការបញ្ជាទិញដែលនាំមកនូវគុណភាព និង សេវាកម្ម 
-​​ និងរៀបចំឯកសារនិងរបាយការណ៍ពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗ

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
- ស្វែងរកអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ដែលមានសក្កានុភាព
- ប្រៀបធៀប និងប៉ាន់ស្មានបានពីអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់
- ស្វែងយល់ពីលក្ខខណ្ឌនៃការដឹកជញ្ចូនទំនិញ និងការទូទាត់
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពនៃទំនិញដែលបានបញ្ជាទិញ
- ធានាអោយបាននូវការកត់ត្រាថ្មីៗនៃទំនិញដែលបានទិញ ពត៌មានការដឹកជញ្ជូន និងវិក័យបត្រ

Job Description:
** PURPOSE STATEMENT:
Head of Operation will oversee the daily activities across functions such as fleet, warehouse, workshop, quality control and batching plant to accomplish of the company strategic objectives by formulating operational plan, improving the processes and standards, designing business strategy, budgeting to oversee expenses for optimizing costs and benefits and monitoring performance and suggesting for improvements. 

** PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES:
•	Plan, execute and manage operational plans.
•	Coordinate, manage and monitor all function of various departments in the company or the group.
•	Review financial statements and data. Utilize financial ratios and analytics to improve profitability. Co-ordinate and control operational budgets. Plan effective strategies for the financial health of the company or the group.
•	Improve processes and policies in support of company or group business plan and goals.
•	Formulate and implement departmental and corporate policies and procedure to maximize output with the Management Team and HODs (Head of Department). Monitor adherence to rules, regulations and procedures.
•	Establish overall work schedules and supervise relevant functions to monitor and evaluate performance of key functions.
•	Construction & Project Development – Coordinate and monitor the work of various Profit Centers involved in design & build, develop, procurement, pricing and work-in-progress, distribution of the completed developments. Monitor performance and implement improvements. 
•	Ensure quality of developments. Manage quality and quantity of employee productivity. 
•	Manage maintenance of equipment and machinery. Provide technical support where necessary.
•	Communication – Monitor, manage and improve the efficiency of support services such as Fleet, Warehouse, Workshop, Quality Control and Batching Plant. Facilitate coordination and communication between support functions. 
•	Ensure and liaise with Sales & Marketing in managing customer support. Plan and support sales and marketing activities.
•	Oversee expenses and budgeting to help the organization optimize costs and benefits 
•	Evaluate risk and lead quality assurance efforts
•	Liaise with top management. Assist in the development of strategic plans for operational activity.
Job Requirement:
** Context/Environment
Yong Sheng Global Trading was established to serve Cambodia’s continuous rapid growth in property development. The company strategically partners with top international brands to provide access to high quality and world class construction materials such as structural steel, cement, pre-engineered steel buildings and transformers. We aim to become Cambodia’s leading construction supply and solutions partner in the industry in Cambodia.

** Knowledge, Skills & Experience
•	Bachelor / Master degree in business administration, commerce, management, industries technology or industrial engineering.
•	At least 5 – 7 years of experience in construction and property development in managerial level
•	Proven experience in organizational effectiveness and operations management
•	Outstanding knowledge of business management, coordination and information technology skills
•	Good at negotiation, communication, critical thinking, decision making, problem solving, planning and organizing skill.

** Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)
- Costs Efficiency in Operating
- Reducing Failures
- Reducing Downtime
- Increasing Work Planning, Timeline and Innovation 
- Effective Work Execution
- Customer Satisfaction
- Operation Organization structure (Fleet, Warehouse, Workshop, Batching Plant & QC)

position: បុគ្គលិករៀបចំឯកសាររុះរើ ($220-300$)
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
បុគ្គលិករៀបចំឯកសាររុះរើ មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងការបញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យ ចូលក្នុងសៀវភៅបញ្ជីប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងប្រព័ន្ធ NAV ធ្វើការ Reclass វត្ថុធាតុដើម ដាក់លេខកូដ និងផលិតរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ។

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
• បញ្វូលខ្នាតលីពេជ្រមុន និងក្រោយរុះរើតាម N ក្នុងតារាង Excel
• ធ្វើ Positive និង Negative ចំនួនគ្រាប់ពេជ្រ ខ្នាតលីវត្ថុធាតុដើម ក្រោយរុះរើ
• ធ្វើ Reclass វត្ថុធាតុដើមដូចជា៖
- ពេជ្រមូល ទៅស្តុកពេជ្រមូល (V-chi3)
- ពេជ្ររាង ទៅស្តុកពេជ្ររាង (K-Vin)
- ពេជ្រពណ៌ ( Kunthea ) 
- ពេជ្រគ្រាប់ធំ និងពេជ្ររាង មានGIA ( Mey-Bank )
- មាសចាក់រំលាយ ទៅស្តុកមាសអ៊ីធី (S-Chanthy)
- ពក្ស័ គុជផ្កា....... ទៅស្តុកព័ក្សចាស់ប្តូរទ្រង់ទ្រាយ (Old Pearl)
- ត្បូង ទៅស្តុកត្បូង (H-Heng)
• រាប់ ជូត វាស់ខ្នាតលីពេជ្រ
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍គ្រាប់ពេជ្ររុះរើប្រចាំថ្ងៃក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ Excel
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សរុបទិន្នន័យចំនួនគ្រឿងចូល ចំនួនគ្រាប់ពេជ្រ ចំនួនត្បូង ចំនួនព័ក្ស និងទម្ងន់មាសរុះរើប្រចាំខែ (គ្រឿងហាង       គ្រឿងភ្ញៀវទូទាត់ គ្រឿងភ្ញៀវផ្ញើរ គ្រឿងភ្ញៀវ CANCEL គ្រឿងបាត់ដំបង និងគ្រឿងសៀមរាប)
• បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការណែនាំរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង

Occasional Duties (ភារកិច្ចម្តងម្កាល):
• រៀបចំការស្នើសុំផ្សេងៗនៅពេលត្រូវការ
Job Requirement:
Qualification (គុណវុឌ្ឍិដែលត្រូវការ):
• កម្រិតសិក្សាយ៉ាងតិចមធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិ ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើរ
• ផ្តល់អាទិភាពសម្រាប់អ្នកមានបទពិសោធន៍

Skill (ជំនាញ):
• អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ Word, Excel, PowerPoint
• ចេះរៀបចំទុកដាក់ឯកសារ
• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការធ្វើការងារច្រើនមុខ

Physical Fitness (កាយសម្បទា):
• មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន
• ស្មារតីវាងវៃ រហ័សរហួន

Job Description: • Greet and welcome guests as soon as they arrive at the office.• Direct visitors to the appropriate person and office.• Answer, screen, and forward incoming phone calls.• Ensure the reception area is tidy and presentable, with all necessary stationery and material (e.g. pens, forms, and brochures).• Provide basic and accurate information in person and via phone/email.• Receive, sort, and distribute daily mail/deliveries.• Maintain office security by following safety procedures and controlling access via the reception desk (monitor logbook, issue visitor badges).• Order front office supplies and keep an inventory of stock.• Update calendars and schedule meetings.• Keep updated records of office expenses and costs• Perform other clerical receptionist duties such as filing, photocopying, transcribing and faxing.• Perform other duties assigned by the manager
Job Requirement: • Proven work experience as a Receptionist, Front Office Representative or similar role• Proficiency in Microsoft Office• Hands-on experience with office equipment (e.g. Printers)• Professional attitude and Good appearance, Single• Solid written and verbal communication skills• Ability to be resourceful and proactive when issues arise• Excellent organizational skills• Multitasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks• Customer service attitude• High school degree; additional certification in Office Management is a plus• Must Speak English and Chinese plusCompany condition:• Working days: Monday – Saturday ( Half Day )• Working hours: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM• Lunch time 12 PM – 1 PM• Public holiday complies labor law• Annual Leaves and Sick leaves• Salary: Negotiate + Allowance

Job Description:
** តួនាទី និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវៈ
1-	សម្របសម្រួលការងារផ្នែកលក់ជាមួយអតិថិជន និងការដឹកជញ្ជួនទំនិញជូនអតិថិជន។ 
2-	ទទួល និងឆ្លើយតបសំណូមពរអតិថិជន ដើម្បីឲ្យប្រព័ន្ធការងារបន្ទាប់ពីការលក់ដំណើរការបានរលូន។
3-	តាមដានការដឹកជញ្ជូនទំនិញធានាការប្រគល់ទំនិញជូនអតិថិជនបានទាន់ពេលវេលា។
4-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យដំណើរការដឹកជញ្ជួនធានាបាននូវប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់ និងចំណេញពេលវេលា។
5-	ដោះស្រាយនិងសម្របសម្រួលបញ្ហានានាដែលនាំឲ្យមានការយឺតយ៉ាវក្នុងដំណើរការងារដឹកជញ្ជូនការងារប្រគល់ទំនិញ និងការទទួលប្រាក់ពីអតិថិជន។
6-	ទំនាក់ទំនង និងស្វែងរកព័ត៌មានជាក់លាក់ និងឆ្លើយតប ការប្រគល់-ទទួលទំនិញខុសប្រក្រតី (លើស/ខ្វះ) ទំនិញខូចគុណភាព និងចូលរួមត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រគល់ទទួលទំនិញបង្វិលត្រលប់។
7-	ជំនួយឲ្យប្រធានផ្នែកក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនងអតិថិជនទូទាត់ប្រាក់មកក្រុមហ៊ុន
8-	ជំនួយឲ្យប្រធានផ្នែកក្នុងការផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានវិជ្ជមាន/អវិជ្ជមានរបស់អតិថជន ដើម្បីឈានដល់ការបិទការបញ្ជាទិញ ឬ ដើម្បីកំណត់ទំហំទឹកប្រាក់ឥណទានឲ្យអតិថិជន។
9-	បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
1-	មានបរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ / ធនាគារ / ពាណិជ្ជកម្ម / គ្រប់គ្រង រឺសញ្ញាបត្រប្រហាក់ប្រហែល
2-	មានបទពិសោធន៍លើការងារក្នុងតួនាទីនេះចាប់ពី ២ ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ 
3-	មានចំណេះដឹង/ជំនាញ ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងទំនាក់ទំនង 
4-	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ក្លាហាន មានទំនូលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការងារ និងតួនាទី
5-	គោរពពេលវេលាអោយបានទៀងទាត់មានភាពឆ្លាតវៃក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
6-	មានផ្នត់គំនិតរៀន និងអភិវឌ្ឍន៏ចំណេះដឹងជាប្រចាំ 
7-	សម្របខ្លួនធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និងកែលំអរការងារជាប្រចាំ
8-	ចេះប្រកុំព្យូទ័រ MS. Word, Excel, E-mail, and Accounting Software (ERP)

Company Profile:
HMC Broiler is our supply chain which is created to add value to the slaughtered-aged broilers from HMC farm*. The main business activities are slaughtering activity and supplying channels to the supermarket markets and retail stores.
Product portfolios, from slaughter house of HMC Broiler, guaranteed quality and safety to the consumers. Items ranging from whole bird to cut-up meats, wing, drumstick, half-chicken, chicken feet, etc., aiming to meet daily market demand. Products will be stored in a preserved environment such as cold showcases and cold rooms to maintain stable quality and increase consumers’ awareness on food safety for themselves as well as their loved ones. 
By collecting output from HMC Farm with cost efficient and healthy broilers, HMC supply channel will be able to sell their products with affordable price to our potential clients at various markets. 
Through client-first approach, HMC broiler will have networks of supply chain throughout the country aiming to make sure our product portfolio is nearby and within reach by clients to experience its high-quality products—which affordable price and hygiene is our non-negotiable unique proposition to our customers.

job title: Senior Officer, Enterprise Risk Management & Model Validation - 01 Post.
position: Senior Officer, Enterprise Risk Management & Model Validation - 01 Post.
Job Description: The main purpose of the “Senior Officer, Enterprise Risk Management & Model Validation” position is to be responsible for Risk Model Validation and Monitoring”. In addition, this position is also responsible for Enterprise Risk Management.Location : Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Assist in preparing and updating the model validation procedure, guideline, and framework..Assist in performing independent validations on statistical models mainly risk models. .Establish, maintain, and update the model risk governance policy and risk model development document..Manages timely and effective support to branch staff on operational issues, auditing and security maintenance..Assist to developing credit risk model validation reports and provide value-added recommendations to model owners and developers. .Assist & testing model performance and maintenance. .Assist in establishing enterprise risk management framework..Assist in developing enterprise risk management tools, policies, and practices to analyze and report enterprise risks, and to manage risks according to an enterprise risk management framework..Timely update the economic news to management and Perform model monitoring.Identifies and measures risk and develops strategies to manage and monitor risk..Assist in identification and assessing of enterprise risks, including strategic, business as well all other risk types, and key initiative risks, and works with the appropriate functional risk units and project teams to balance these risks with rewards and develop action plans to enhance the probability that desired objectives will be achieved..Oversees the enterprise risk management process and ensures alignment with organizational objectives..Monitor the top entity level risks and report the progress of mitigation action plans. .Other tasks as assigned by management.
Job Requirement: .Bachelor’s Degree in Mathematics, Computer Science, Economics, .Statistics Finance and banking, or Accounting..Strong analytical skills and sound knowledge of credit risk..Good command of MS Office applications..English proficiency is an advantage and statistic proficiency are an advantage..Active, dynamic and willing to travel to province.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description:
- ការត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងទទួលខុសត្រូវដើម្បីឱ្យមានស្តុកទំនិញនៅមានគ្រប់ពេលវេលា
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃ
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវអំពីគោលដៅលក់និងសកម្មភាពលក់នៅលើទីផ្សារ
- តាមដានទីផ្សារនិងអតិថិជនដោយផ្អែកលើកាលវិភាគបទបញ្ជាតាមតំបន់ដែលត្រូវលក់
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យចំណាយផ្នែកលក់ ដោយភាពត្រឹមត្រូវច្បាស់លាស់និងមានតម្លាភាព

Company Profile: Paragon International School (Paragon ISC) is one of Cambodia's international/bilingual schools, enrolling over 1100 students. Paragon ISC is controlled by The School Board. The administration and teaching staff represent over 20 different countries. The average teaching experience of Paragon ISC teachers is over 10 years. Our primary focus is on internationalism in order to create open-minded world citizens who have an international perspective, are self-confident and conscientious, and who can function as leaders and team members in societies all over the world.Paragon ISC is certified by the Cambodian Ministry of Education and it is accredited by CIS (Council of International Schools). Paragon ISC is also a  Cambridge Exams and PD Centre. Students may enter Cambridge tests and receive a certificate.Paragon ISC graduates have been accepted at many prestigious universities around the world, such as Australia, Japan, New Zealand, USA and more.

Job Description: The main purpose of the “Officer, Mobile Banking Support” position is responsible for performing operational support duties of Mobile Banking Unit in Channel Banking Department. The basic function of this position is to perform Mobile application status monitoring; assists in the installation process; and investigates Mobile application related customer disputes or fraudulent issues in accordance with policy and regulation. Performs a variety of routine daily tasks; prepares and reviews reports, prepares correspondence tasks and participates in related projects.Location : Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Deploys implements and maintains Mobile Application services..Ongoing monitoring Mobile services both operations and risk identification to minimize down-time and to identify suspicious subscriber /transactions..Ensures maximum “up-time” of Mobile application, security systems through efficient management of monitoring, support and maintenance..Oversees timely and effective resolution of issues on a 24/7 basis..Tracks issues and makes recommendations to address them..Manages timely and effective support to branch staff on operational issues, auditing and security maintenance..Oversees the daily administration of the Mobile Application function and the timely research and resolution of transaction issues within established performance goals..Ensures that proper security procedures are followed to minimize risk and loss..Find out any negative activities in operating Mobile service as well as non-compliance of policies, forms’ completion, or any other further mistakes in branches/merchant..Assist control in all aspects of local mobile operations by providing support to assigned branch Mobile personnel..Assist in implementation and ongoing training. Coordinate personnel transitions that may be needed to support the system and/or process..Perform Mobile systems audits and perform others tasks assigned by direct supervisor.
Job Requirement: .Minimum Bachelor in Computer Science or related fields..Experience in a systems administration and support environment..Experience in problem solving skills..Understanding of various system architectures including hardware and software..Computer literacy in particular database, Switch systems, .Mobile System and networking.

Hattha Bank is a leading bank in Cambodia, licensed by National Bank of Cambodia. Hattha Bank is a subsidiary of Bank of Ayudhya (Krungsri), the fifth largest commercial bank in Thailand, and a member of MUFG Bank, the Japan’s largest banking group, and one of the largest and most diversified financial groups in the world.

job title: Senior Unit Manager, System Analysis & QA - 01 Post.
position: Senior Unit Manager, System Analysis & QA - 01 Post.
Job Description: The main purpose of the “Senior Unit Manager, System Analysis & QA" position is responsible for leading requirements gathering efforts, analyze business and user needs, simplify and translate requirements into functional and technical specifications including Process Flow, UX/UI, System Architecture, Data Structure, and Security Compliancy, etc. He or she will also be responsible for quality assurance and testing to ensure the application software is developed to meet the business expectation.Location: Head Office, Phnom PenhDuties and Responsibilities.Interact and communicate with users and stakeholders to collect business requirements..Analyze and prepare functional and technical specification document as per business requirements..Communicate, translate, and simplify business requirements to developer team to develop application both front-end and back-end..Work with technical team to produce functional and technical specifications including System Architecture, Data Structure, .Process Flow, Data Flow, Network Diagram, UX/UI, and Security Compliancy, etc..Coordinate between Business team and Developer team and monitor the project status as well as communicating on technical requirements..Document user stories or requirements for the software project, and maintain and update the product backlog..Identify the current and future-state business processes..Assist development team to make sure the development meets the quality standards and requirements..Prepare test case, perform automated and manual testing and record test progress..Communicate with internal teams as needed to provide feedback and updates on changes, challenges, and progress in the software testing process..Prepare and frequency release on development issues report and follow-up on the status of the issues..Collaborate with the development team to assess or diagnose problems and suggest possible solutions..Perform other task as assigned by supervisor or management.
Job Requirement: .Bachelor’s degree in computer science, IT and Engineering or equivalent..A minimum of 3 years of experience with system analysis, QA or related field..Demonstrated leadership skills with strong planning and organization..Knowledgeable about industry trends, QA best practices, and change management..Experienced on Robot automation testing such as frameworks and JMeter..Strong problem-solving skills, and strongly analyze business requirements..Autonomous and proactive, quick learner..High proficiency spoken and written of English..Good in communication across departments and with external vendors.

Job Description:
- Support superior in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources
- Implement inventory management strategies, guidelines and processes to ensure inventory is planned at optimal level to meet target turns
- Consolidate and forecast inventory requirements with Sales, Operations and Finance
- Monitor and track stock movements into and between the warehouses to maintain optimal stockholding
- Supervise the inventory system updates to ensure the accuracy of inventory records between material requirements planning (MRP) and actual levels
- Analyze inventory turnover and focus on minimizing both shortages and cost of inventory
- Prepare and consolidate inventory reports and KPIs to measure the service level and progress against inventory KPIs
- Review efficiency of current processes and recommend improvements to enhance productivity and reduce costs
- Build and maintain good relationships with internal team on inventory operations
Job Requirement:
- Minimum three to five years’ experience in a similar role
- Diploma/certificate in Business, Supply Chain, Logistics or related field
- Demonstrate in-depth understanding of inventory planning methodologies and systems
- Demonstrate basic understanding of distribution centers, distribution and transport
- Proven experience in inventory management , procurement systems and logistics operations
- Demonstrate working knowledge of SAP - material requirements planning (MRP) system
-Proven experience in the consumer goods, healthcare and pharmaceutical industries
- Demonstrate strong analytical and quantitative skills
- Demonstrate appreciation and respect for cultural sensitivities especially in international/cross-cultural interactions
- Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)
- Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spoken


Drive Growth. Be the Difference. Join DKSH.

DKSH’s strength lies in our great diversity of services, industries, clients, products, regions and employees from various nationalities. We are proud of our people: they are the reason we are successful. Our people are the best in the industry. They are passionate about their career growth and about business success. They work as part of an energetic and committed team, positively impacting millions of lives through the products and services we provide. 
Join us today if you are ready to “Drive growth. Be the Difference.” With DKSH, you will experience a world of learning and development, own your career and take business responsibility and have a positive impact that touches people’s lives.
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities

The main role of the position is to be responsible for preparing project proposal.

To realize site inspection and project specifications & drawings analysis.
To issue with the design team preliminary design (in case that the design is not available in tender documents) & equipment selection.
To issue the design team the bill of quantities, labor, material and equipment etc.
To provide technical support to the sales team in the negotiation of the contract.
To liaise with the design office the detail design including single line diagram, load calculation, distribution and panel boards schematic diagrams, size cable and wiring layout, final selection if equipment.
To prepare construction document to be forwarded to the site including bill of quantity of equipment, construction drawings and technical specifications.
To perform other relevant tasks as required by Design Manager
Job Requirement:
* Job Requirement

1.Bachelor Degree in Mechanical/Electrical/Plumbing Engineering or related field
2.Have some knowledge of Air Distribution system, Hydraulic network, ACMV Equipment selection on chilled water system and direct expansion systems, Smoke exhaust system, water filtration system, hot water production, Electrical Engineering (Medium & Low Voltage Distribution, Telephone & Data systems, Fire Detection systems, CCTV systems, Public Address systems & MATV systems) Plumbing (Fire Protection System, Hot and Cold Water System, Sanitary and Sewer System, Storm Drain System).
3.Ability to communicate effectively in English both verbally and in writing.
4.Computer literacy and especially MS Offices, MS Project, AutoCAD, Projects 2000.
5.Project Management knowledge.
6.Negotiation skill.
7.Good interpersonal skill.

job title: Store Supervisor (Jelly Bunny and CCOO Brand)
position: Store Supervisor (Jelly Bunny and CCOO Brand)
Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall (Phnom Penh) N/A

Job Description: •	Manage in cassava planting operation from planting to harvesting (soil plough checking, harrowing, pesticide and herbicide spraying, fertilizer applying, harvesting, cassava stock…...)•	Manage the cassava stock, bride weight and make sure that cassava warehouse has no any insect  •	Manage harvesting and new planting planning with high seed quality    •	Make annual cassava growing planning for approval from the top management •	Participate in looking for sub-contractor and planting quotation for cassava planting according to the plan •	Compile the contract for cassava sub-contractor and improve from day to day •	Prepare budget and request claim for sub-contractor and arrange all document related for claiming (Make sure that all data is check and correctly)•	Compile procedure for sub-contractor to clear and claim planting (Planting land size measurement, job order, germination rate, size and height of the row, deep of plough)•	Make cross check with sub-contractors for their all activities•	 Research and develop to improve cassava yield and efficiency of planting operation    •	Improve the policies, organizations and systems in support of company's mission •	Liaise and interact with managers of other departments•	Train and manage employee to improve their working quality  •	Participate in staff recruitment and make a draft job description of staff under supervise  •	Coordinate and manage the work of subcontractors; inspect and verify that the work being carried out by the subcontractors is according to specification and contract•	Manage and supervise to construct of all infrastructure in the farm •	Take care and maintenance of all agriculture equipment and materials   •	Manage the day-to-day farm operation to ensure the operation runs smoothly •	Follow up and Report farm activities to the management•	Identify problem happened in the farm and solve the problems   •	Carry out other tasks assigned by management
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor or mater degree in agriculture or related field•	Cassava working experiences are encourage to apply for the position•	Have minimum 5 years working experience in agriculture farm management•	Open mine and willing to change for farm management style & yield improvement•	Able to manage budget for farm activities•	Have a good communication with multiple cultures•	Able to use GPS for land size calculation•	Able to speak Khmer and English•	Able to work with local communities•	Good in written and speak in English (Speaking and reporting)•	Able to stay and work in the farm•	Initiative do a research for new agriculture technology for yield improvement•	Have a good problem identify and solving•	Be honesty and working hard
Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

Job Description: ●	Produce well-researched content for publication online and in print●	Organize writing schedules to complete drafts of content or finished projects within deadlines●	Utilize industry best practices and familiarity with the organization's mission to inspire ideas and content●	Communicate and cooperate with a writing team, including a content manager, editors, and web publishers●	Follow an editorial calendar, collaborating with other members of the content production team to ensure timely delivery of materials●	Develop related content for multiple platforms, such as websites, email marketing, product descriptions, videos, and blogs●	Monitor and analyze the performance of key performance indicators (KPIs) to offer suggestions for improvement●	Use search engine optimization (SEO) strategies in writing to maximize the online visibility of a website in search results
Job Requirement: ●	Proven record of excellent writing demonstrated in a professional portfolio●	Impeccable grasp of the English language, including idioms and current trends in slang and expressions●	Ability to work independently with little or no daily supervision●	Strong interpersonal skills and willingness to communicate with clients, colleagues, and management●	Ability to work on multiple projects with different objectives simultaneously●	Strict adherence to the style guides of each company and their policies for publication●	Good time management skills, including prioritizing, scheduling, and adapting as necessary●	Proficiency with computers, especially writing programs, such as Google Docs and Microsoft Word, Excel, Outlook, and PowerPoint●	Familiarity with each client's requirements and the company's brand image, products, and services

Job Description:
•	To ensure all of purchases are arrange and scheduled, to arrive as per plan			
•	To ensure the items and materials coming with right quantity, quality and SPEC condition
•	Review shipping document from suppliers and process with the agency for the clearance
•	Regularly update of import & export regulatory from authority government				
•	Shipments tracking report, manual cost spending by each shipment, and other logistic reports.

•	Honest, highly committed and following the work ethics.

Company Profile:
A Singapore Brand, A Global Business 

With a corporate history that extends more than a hundred years, Yeo’s (also known as YHS or Yeo Hiap Seng) has grown from strength to strength, from its humble beginnings as a striving enterprise in pre-war Singapore, to its transformation as a food & beverage conglomerate with a global network that spans Asia-Pacific, Europe, North America and Oceanic regions. 

A category leader in the Asian drinks market, Yeo’s has broadened its customer reach and entrenched its industry presence through a combination of geographical expansion and product diversification. On the beverage business front, Yeo’s competitive advantage lies in the Group’s ability to stay true and current to consumers’ changing palettes and individual preferences based on lifestyle and cultural differences. 

With a century of heritage, the Yeo's brand bears the hallmark of superior product quality. Yeos is committed to meeting evolving consumer needs and growing market demands through continued product innovation. 

We are honored to have won following awards in the recent two years: 
2017 Singapore Prestige Brand Award - Most Popular Regional Brand Overall Winner; 
2017 Singapore Prestige Brand Award - Regional Brands; 
2018 The Brand Laureate World Halal Brand Award 2018 - Best Brands in FMCG - Food & Beverage.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin   023 989 181 hrkh@yeos.com Phnom Penh Special Economic Zone, National Road #4,  Phum Tachet, Sangkat Beung Thom, Khan Kambol, Phnom Penh 023 989 181
