Job Description:
** Job Purpose/Summary: 
A Maintenance Technician is responsible for ensuring smooth operation for overall Plant Production Machine, provides support in machine breakdowns, upgrading or modification and as per others designated and fix any problems when they are discovered before they have a chance to worsen. This position will be more responsible towards the production machines and process equipment.

• To attend in machine breakdown, troubleshoot problems, upgrading or modification, and ensure full compliance to safety procedure, food safety management, hygiene procedures and 5S execution.
• To ensure spare parts are available and highlight to Maintenance Manager on the requirements also to responsible to alert the Maintenance Manager of any unusual occurrence and /or damage that have taken place or may occur
•  To be fully responsible on performance of the machine and participate actively in problem solving and process improvement initiatives, identify, evaluate, analyze and implement actions required to achieve Mechanical Efficiency targets.
• Conduct performance evaluation and handles discipline of employees as needed and in accordance with company policy
• To execute maintenance plan, coaching maintenance staff and performs other related duties as assigned by Maintenance Manager

** Responsibilities:
• Ensuring smooth operation for overall Plant Production Machine and ensure full compliance to safety procedure, food safety management, hygiene procedures, and 5S execution
• To provides urgent support in machine breakdowns and drive the continuous improvement activities to increase the equipment performance
• To alert the Maintenance Supervisor of any unusual occurrence and /or damage that have taken place or may occur and monitor operation of machinery or equipment to detect malfunctions, the need for adjustments and repair
• To Handle discipline as needed and in accordance with company policy
• To performing routine maintenance (CM, PM…), work order, to ensure the maximum technical availability and other related duties as assigned by Maintenance Supervisor or Manager
• Execute any other engineering maintenance related activities as when required by superiors
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree in mechanical, electrical engineering from a recognized university, polytechnic or equivalent qualification
• Min. 2 years’ experience as technician in maintenance or utilities
• Technical knowledge and skills in mechanic, welding, electrical, hydraulic, pneumatic, basic of automation (PLC, HMI...), control system, instrumentation
• Basic knowledge in utilities system
• Knowledge of general maintenance processes and methods
• Working knowledge of tools, common appliances and devices
• Experience in problem solving skills, 5S, drive improvement
• Good physical condition and strength with a willingness to work overtime
• Flexible and be able to work on shift
• Computer knowledge (SAP, MS. Office, and AutoCAD drawing, PLC) and control system
• Be able to communicate in English (Speaking, Listening, Writing)
• Personality and attitude (Flexible, Strong commitment, Ownership, Good team player, Accountabilities, Patience, Initiative, Honesty, Good communication, Quick response)

- Penh Special Economic Zone (PPSEZ), National Road #4,
Phum Tachet, Sangkat Beung Thom, Khan Kambol, Phnom Penh.

- Tel: 023 989 181

Job Description:
** Job Purpose/Summary: 
Maintenance Supervisor will oversee managing and ensuring the effective execution of maintenance and repairing program that relate majority to mechanical and electrical issue. He/ She also in charge of machine/equipment performance monitoring and provide feedback for intervention. When necessary, he/she also works with maintain service provider to achieve the goal.

• To attend in machine breakdown, troubleshoot problems, upgrading or modification, and ensure full compliance to safety procedure, food safety management, hygiene procedures and 5S execution.
• To ensure spare parts are available and highlight to Maintenance Manager on the requirements also to responsible to alert the Maintenance Manager of any unusual occurrence and /or damage that have taken place or may occur
• To be fully responsible on performance of the machine and participate actively in problem solving and process improvement initiatives, identify, evaluate, analyze and implement actions required to achieve Mechanical Efficiency targets.
• Conduct performance evaluation and handles discipline of employees as needed and in accordance with company policy
• To execute maintenance plan, coaching maintenance staff and performs other related duties as assigned by Maintenance Manager
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s Degree in mechanical and electrical engineering from a recognized university or polytechnic or equivalent qualification
• At least 5 years of maintenance experience (mechanical and electrical in industrial) is required
• Extensive knowledge of industrial maintenance (mechanic, electrical, hydraulic, pneumatic, automation, control system, instrumentation)
• Excellent analytical, problem-solving skills, 5S, drive improvement, planning and leadership abilities
• Ability to identify issues and determine repairs that are needed.
• Good physical condition and strength with a willingness to work overtime
• Ability to plan maintenance schedules for building systems.
• Excellent management, communication and supervisory skills, interpersonal skills
• Good physical condition and strength with a willingness to work overtime
• Flexible and be able to work on shift
• Computer knowledge (SAP, MS. Office, and AutoCAD drawing, PLC) and control system
• Be able to communicate in English (Speaking, Listening, Writing)
• Personality and attitude (Reliable, Flexible, Strong commitment, Ownership, Accountabilities, Patience, Initiative, Honesty, Quick response)

job title: Sales Manager ($800-$1.2k) The Icon Professional Building
position: Sales Manager ($800-$1.2k) The Icon Professional Building
Job Description: •	Develop and manage business development strategies and plans for the assigned product range.•	Manage and monitor the implementation of business action plans to achieve the business targets.•	Manage team and coordinate to support from the marketing activities team (group presentation, customer meeting/ symposium etc.).•	Manage and supervise the Sales Team.•	 Analyse and evaluate the market changes, competitor’s activities and propose the amendment aligned with the company’s regulation.•	Allocate business targets to the assigned Area Sales Manager based on the business analysis, potential of the territories and resources.•	Prepare & approve the monthly work plan for team.•	Inform the supervised employees the relevant policies and regulations relating to business & customers, to ensure timely implementation.•	Build up customer development strategies to develop good relationship with them.   •	Handle customer feedback and requirement timely.•	Coach & develop team selling skills & other required competencies.•	Prepare annual budget & Control expenses aligned with approved annual budget effectively.•	Prepare monthly report to Business Unit Head. •	Other task assigned by Business Unit Head.

Company Profile:
The Dynamic Group has been supporting Cambodia's healthcare, agriculture, quality control industries for the last 20s years. Our vision is improving Quality of Life, Shaping Better Tomorrows. With over 400 highly-qualified staffs, the Dynamic Group leads in applying global technologies and delivering value to the various communities that we are serving.

With no fewer than seven companies in its stable, the Dynamic Group brings the world’s latest technological advancements to one of the world’s fastest growing economies.

All of our companies in Dynamic Group are:
-Dynamic Pharma
-Agrotech Vita
-Dynamic Scientific
-Dynamic Distribution
-Dynamic Chemicals

-Dynamic Technologies

Job Requirement: - ជំនាញសេវាកម្មអតិថិជនឆ្នើម- មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាលាយលក្ខណ៍អក្សរ និងពាក្យសំដី- ការយល់ដឹងអំពីគណិតវិទ្យាមូលដ្ឋាន- ជំនាញសុវត្ថិភាព និងការរៀបចំអាហារ និងចំណេះដឹងអំពីរបៀបដែលមេរោគ និងបាក់តេរីអាចរីករាលដាល- សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការបង្កើតភេសជ្ជៈកាហ្វេថ្មីៗ- ស្គាល់ពីបទប្បញ្ញត្តិសុវត្ថិភាពចំណីអាហារក្នុងតំបន់ការងារ Barista ភាគច្រើនទាមទារយ៉ាងហោចណាស់អនុវិទ្យាល័យមួយចំនួន រួមជាមួយនឹងការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលលើការងារ។ មុខតំណែងខ្លះទាមទារការបញ្ជាក់សុវត្ថិភាពចំណីអាហារផងដែរ។ និស្សិតសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ ឬអនុវិទ្យាល័យជាច្រើនធ្វើការជា Baristas ខណៈពេលដែលទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដែលត្រូវការសម្រាប់មុខរបរផ្សេងទៀត ប៉ុន្តែអ្នកផ្សេងទៀតធ្វើការក្នុងមុខតំណែងនេះព្រោះវាជាតួនាទីដ៏ល្អរបស់ពួកគេ។សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939,
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: Plumbing and Firefighting Design Engineer (2 Positions)
position: Plumbing and Firefighting Design Engineer (2 Positions)
Job Description:
Roles and Responsibilities: 
The Plumbing and Fire Fighting Design Engineer position will provide optimum design solutions for customer applications, designs for manufacturability and cost estimates for quotation purposes based on their designs.

- Produce concept design, Design Schematic, Design Development and Construction Design of plumbing and firefighting system as per architect layout, requirement of client and specification
- Produce tender drawing of plumbing and firefighting system (waste, soil and rain water, sprinkler, hose reel and fire extinguisher system…..
- Provide calculate note, if require
- Prepare shop drawing for submission and resubmission (Plumbing, Fire Fighting System drawing)
- Select and prepare some material for submission
- Contact with supplier to request some quotation and technical documents, if require
- Take off BOQ of firefighting and plumbing system (sprinkler head, pipe, sanitary fixture unit…)
- Prepared information regarding design, structure specification, material, equipment, estimated cost and construction time.
- Consult with the Consultant to determine function and spatial requirement of MEP.
- Coordinate closely with Electrical, Mechanical, Architect, Structure Team……
- Direct activities of workers engaged in preparing drawing and specification documents.
- Plan layout of project.
- Prepared scale drawings
- Collaborating with supervisor in preparing the technical report and installation on site.
- Perform other duties as assigned
- Prepare Project Schedule Design and Construction.
- Prepare Progress Report, Daily Report, Weekly Report and Monthly Report.
- Prepare Material List.
- Prepare Costing for Biding.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Mechanical/Plumbing Engineering; MBA is a plus
- Minimum 2 years experiences in Design
- Good interpersonal skill, have negotiation skill, Ability to analysis problems, Ability to work independently,
- Good oral and written English and Khmer communication skills;
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure.
- Computer literacy and especially Ms Office, Ms Project, AutoCAD (2D, 3D) etc.
- Being able to travel to sites/provinces and mobilize the workplace

Job Description:
** Roles and Responsibilities: 
MEP Design Manager will mainly be responsible for supporting the implementation and managing the control of the design process to ensure that the design and procurement of specialist packages are delivered to meet project requirements and are in line with cost parameters.
- Manage the development and implementation of design proposals ensuring they meet customer requirements including budget constraints, presenting proposals for approval to the customer. The design should deliver:
o Safety in construction,
o Use Quality within affordable parameters,
o Ease of maintenance, energy efficiency with minimum environmental impact,
o Innovation to meet customer goals and positive impact on the local community
- Manage and ensure effective briefing of the Design Team including M&E elements:
o This includes, where necessary, the management of any 3rd parties or design teams to
ensure that they meet all customer specifications,
o Where necessary, checking the competence and resources of any incumbent design teams or 3rd parties.
- Provide advice and guidance on the build ability of the design proposals to the design and construction teams on all packages.
- Liaise with all statutory bodies/authorities as required.
- Lead the development and management of the design deliverables program:
o Ensure there is a clear schedule of design deliverables
o Report regularly on MEP deliverables progress for inclusion in project reports
o Identify issues causing risk or delay to the project
o Attend design progress reviews and interface meetings
o Lead problem solving and resolution of design issues
- Review Client requirements and review consultant/supplier design deliverables against these and Consultant Design Agreement

* Management:
o Meet with design professional organizations and client to maintain exchange of ideas and information
o Follow mechanical, electrical, electronic, plumbing, and firefighting trends and advancements
o Participate and provide MEP expertise to project/technical teams.
o Participate in and provide advice to clients/technical teams
o Manage and ensure accountability for staff
o Provide direction and active participation on preparation of new design

* Administration:
o Work collaboratively with HR/Admin, Accounting & Finance, Procurement, BDD, Site Team
o Work collaboratively with stakeholders to coordinate design review

- Perform other duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
- At least holding Bachelor Degree in Mechanical/Electrical/
Electronics, Fire Fighting and Plumbing engineering, or other closely related field.
- Minimum of 5 years experienced in MEP with 3years experiences in supervisory
- Professional software skills: AutoCAD, 3Ds max Vray, Sketch up and Photoshop.
- Proven experience in delivering design services within a Work Winning environment and successfully implementing design strategies as well as relevant project experience.
- Good Communication and Interpersonal skills
- Be self–motivated, show confidence and professionalism
- Ability to work on initiative and able to cope with changing environments
- Multi–task, and excellent attention to detail
- Be a team player,
- Able to work independently under tight timelines and pressure.
- Good in English language in both written and spoken.
- Being able to travel to sites/provinces and mobilize the workplace

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

Job Description:
To build and maintain a strong and efficient team.
2. To create loyal and trustworthy staff, who take pride in their work and team to providing the highest

informed Sous Chef /Executive chef or the right person and take noted.

equipment are used correctly and kept in clean condition and reports defects promptly.

17. To assign staff to do their jobs which are follow MPS
18. Ensures that no food is given out without proper documentation or to unauthorized persons and reports
immediately any irregularities to the Executive Chef (General Manager)

Job Description:
* Strategic Summary
Khmer Cold Chain’s vision is to be the leading third-party provider of temperature-controlled logistics, delivering international quality services to the Cambodian and regional farmers, agribusiness, food processers, pharmaceutical companies, food retailers and hotels, restaurants and caterers/institutional (HORECA/HRI), at competitive prices.
* Job Summary
•	Able to work in provincial area around Phnom Penh independently.
•	Knowledge about area of Agriculture plantation fruits and vegetable.
•	Capable to work with Ministry of Agriculture provincial level
•	Ability to bargain price (knowledge of local retails prices of fruits and vegetable
•	Manage to gets community group as cooperative fruits and vegetable to supply products to KCC for value added for local distribution and export. 
•	(KCC work like NGO support local fruits and vegetable for sustainability growth of their community)
•	Have own transportation will be advantage (company pay of Gasoline and 
•	Traveling expenses) 

* Summary of Essential Job Outcomes:
Convince agriculture plantation, and local community to supply fruits and Vegetable to KCC, KCC will act as their representative distributor.
Job Requirement:
* Minimum Qualification
- Level of Job-related experience: Intermediate level of Experience (minimum 2 years of job-related 
experience)
- Level of Education: Bachelor’s Degree in Sales and Marketing, Business Administration or other related fields
- Licenses/Certificates: Trained by NGO organization which support agriproducts
Company Profile: The vision of Khmer Cold Chain Co., Ltd (KCCC) is to be the leading third-party provider of temperature-controlled logistics, delivering international quality services to the Cambodian and regional farmers, agribusiness, food processers, pharmaceutical companies, food retailers and hotels, restaurants and caterers/institutional (HORECA/HRI), at competitive prices.
